d_holland = {
	color = { 168 168 168 }
	color2 = { 255 255 255 }
	capital = 80
	gain_effect = {
		primary_title = { copy_title_laws = c_holland }
		
		IF = {
			limit = {
				d_holland = { is_titular = yes }
			}
			character_event = { 
		id = nivve.0 tooltip = "Kingdom of Europa becomes the de jure liege of d_holland" 
				}
			}
		any_demesne_title = {
			limit = {
				tier = COUNT
				location = { 
					AND = {
						has_province_modifier = no_liege
						OR = {
							is_primary_holder_title = yes
							any_neighbor_province = {
								owner = { character = ROOT }
							}
						}
					}
				}
				OR = {
					d_holland = { is_titular = yes }
					FROM = { has_character_flag = creating_title_loop }
				}
			}
			de_jure_liege = d_holland
			hidden_tooltip = {
				location = {
					add_province_modifier = {
						name = d_holland_de_jure_liege
						duration = -1
					}
					remove_province_modifier = no_liege
				}
			}
			hidden_tooltip = { FROM = {	set_character_flag = creating_title_loop } }
		}
		hidden_tooltip = { clr_character_flag = creating_title_loop }

	}
	allow = {
		OR = {
			AND = {
			
				primary_title = { title = c_holland }
				primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = no_liege } }
				OR = {
					AND = {
						num_of_count_titles = 3
						NOT = { num_of_count_titles = 6 }
					}
					primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = isolated } }
				}
			}
			d_holland = {
				is_titular = no
			}
		}

	}
}

k_holland = {
	color = { 168 168 168 }
	color2 = { 255 255 255 }
	capital = 80
	gain_effect = {
		primary_title = { copy_title_laws = d_holland }
		
		any_demesne_title = {
			limit = {
				title = d_holland
				OR = {
					k_holland = { is_titular = yes }
					FROM = { has_character_flag = creating_title_loop }
				}
			}
			de_jure_liege = k_holland
			hidden_tooltip = { FROM = {	set_character_flag = creating_title_loop } }
		}
		hidden_tooltip = { clr_character_flag = creating_title_loop }

	}
	allow = {
		OR = {
			AND = {
			
				primary_title = { title = d_holland }
				num_of_duke_titles = 3
			}
			k_holland = {
				is_titular = no
			}
		}

	}
}

e_holland = {
	color = { 168 168 168 }
	color2 = { 255 255 255 }
	capital = 80
	short_name = yes
	gain_effect = {
		primary_title = { copy_title_laws = k_holland }
		
		any_demesne_title = {
			limit = {
				title = k_holland
				OR = {
					e_holland = { is_titular = yes }
					FROM = { has_character_flag = creating_title_loop }
				}
			}
			de_jure_liege = e_holland
			hidden_tooltip = { FROM = {	set_character_flag = creating_title_loop } }
		}
		hidden_tooltip = { clr_character_flag = creating_title_loop }

	}
	allow = {
		OR = {
			AND = {
			
				primary_title = { title = k_holland }
				num_of_king_titles = 3
			}
			e_holland = {
				is_titular = no
			}
		}

	}
}

d_sticht = {
	color = { 156 156 156 }
	color2 = { 255 255 255 }
	capital = 82
	gain_effect = {
		primary_title = { copy_title_laws = c_sticht }
		
		IF = {
			limit = {
				d_sticht = { is_titular = yes }
			}
			character_event = { 
		id = nivve.0 tooltip = "Kingdom of Europa becomes the de jure liege of d_sticht" 
				}
			}
		any_demesne_title = {
			limit = {
				tier = COUNT
				location = { 
					AND = {
						has_province_modifier = no_liege
						OR = {
							is_primary_holder_title = yes
							any_neighbor_province = {
								owner = { character = ROOT }
							}
						}
					}
				}
				OR = {
					d_sticht = { is_titular = yes }
					FROM = { has_character_flag = creating_title_loop }
				}
			}
			de_jure_liege = d_sticht
			hidden_tooltip = {
				location = {
					add_province_modifier = {
						name = d_sticht_de_jure_liege
						duration = -1
					}
					remove_province_modifier = no_liege
				}
			}
			hidden_tooltip = { FROM = {	set_character_flag = creating_title_loop } }
		}
		hidden_tooltip = { clr_character_flag = creating_title_loop }

	}
	allow = {
		OR = {
			AND = {
			
				primary_title = { title = c_sticht }
				primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = no_liege } }
				OR = {
					AND = {
						num_of_count_titles = 3
						NOT = { num_of_count_titles = 6 }
					}
					primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = isolated } }
				}
			}
			d_sticht = {
				is_titular = no
			}
		}

	}

							}
						}
					}
				}
				OR = {
					d_frisia = { is_titular = yes }
					FROM = { has_character_flag = creating_title_loop }
				}
			}
			de_jure_liege = d_frisia
			hidden_tooltip = {
				location = {
					add_province_modifier = {
						name = d_frisia_de_jure_liege
						duration = -1
					}
					remove_province_modifier = no_liege
				}
			}
			hidden_tooltip = { FROM = {	set_character_flag = creating_title_loop } }
		}
		hidden_tooltip = { clr_character_flag = creating_title_loop }

	}
	allow = {
		OR = {
			AND = {
			
				primary_title = { title = c_frisia }
				primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = no_liege } }
				OR = {
					AND = {
						num_of_count_titles = 3
						NOT = { num_of_count_titles = 6 }
					}
					primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = isolated } }
				}
			}
			d_frisia = {
				is_titular = no
			}
		}

	}
}

d_brabant = {
	color = { 153 153 153 }
	color2 = { 255 255 255 }
	capital = 117
	gain_effect = {
		primary_title = { copy_title_laws = c_brabant }
		
		IF = {
			limit = {
				d_brabant = { is_titular = yes }
			}
			character_event = { 
		id = nivve.0 tooltip = "Kingdom of Europa becomes the de jure liege of d_brabant" 
				}
			}
		any_demesne_title = {
			limit = {
				tier = COUNT
				location = { 
					AND = {
						has_province_modifier = no_liege
						OR = {
							is_primary_holder_title = yes
							any_neighbor_province = {
								owner = { character = ROOT }
							}
						}
					}
				}
				OR = {
					d_brabant = { is_titular = yes }
					FROM = { has_character_flag = creating_title_loop }
				}
			}
			de_jure_liege = d_brabant
			hidden_tooltip = {
				location = {
					add_province_modifier = {
						name = d_brabant_de_jure_liege
						duration = -1
					}
					remove_province_modifier = no_liege
				}
			}
			hidden_tooltip = { FROM = {	set_character_flag = creating_title_loop } }
		}
		hidden_tooltip = { clr_character_flag = creating_title_loop }

	}
	allow = {
		OR = {
			AND = {
			
				primary_title = { title = c_brabant }
				primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = no_liege } }
				OR = {
					AND = {
						num_of_count_titles = 3
						NOT = { num_of_count_titles = 6 }
					}
					primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = isolated } }
				}
			}
			d_brabant = {
				is_titular = no
			}
		}

	}

		OR = {
			AND = {
			
				primary_title = { title = c_guines }
				primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = no_liege } }
				OR = {
					AND = {
						num_of_count_titles = 3
						NOT = { num_of_count_titles = 6 }
					}
					primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = isolated } }
				}
			}
			d_guines = {
				is_titular = no
			}
		}

	}
}

k_guines = {
	color = { 47 80 220 }
	color2 = { 255 255 255 }
	capital = 74
	gain_effect = {
		primary_title = { copy_title_laws = d_guines }
		
		any_demesne_title = {
			limit = {
				title = d_guines
				OR = {
					k_guines = { is_titular = yes }
					FROM = { has_character_flag = creating_title_loop }
				}
			}
			de_jure_liege = k_guines
			hidden_tooltip = { FROM = {	set_character_flag = creating_title_loop } }
		}
		hidden_tooltip = { clr_character_flag = creating_title_loop }

	}
	allow = {
		OR = {
			AND = {
			
				primary_title = { title = d_guines }
				num_of_duke_titles = 3
			}
			k_guines = {
				is_titular = no
			}
		}

	}

d_yperen = {
	color = { 51 84 224 }
	color2 = { 255 255 255 }
	capital = 76
	gain_effect = {
		primary_title = { copy_title_laws = c_yperen }
		
		IF = {
			limit = {
				d_yperen = { is_titular = yes }
			}
			character_event = { 
		id = nivve.0 tooltip = "Kingdom of Europa becomes the de jure liege of d_yperen" 
				}
			}
		any_demesne_title = {
			limit = {
				tier = COUNT
				location = { 
					AND = {
						has_province_modifier = no_liege
						OR = {
							is_primary_holder_title = yes
							any_neighbor_province = {
								owner = { character = ROOT }
							}
						}
					}
				}
				OR = {
					d_yperen = { is_titular = yes }
					FROM = { has_character_flag = creating_title_loop }
				}
			}
			de_jure_liege = d_yperen
			hidden_tooltip = {
				location = {
					add_province_modifier = {
						name = d_yperen_de_jure_liege
						duration = -1
					}
					remove_province_modifier = no_liege
				}
			}
			hidden_tooltip = { FROM = {	set_character_flag = creating_title_loop } }
		}
		hidden_tooltip = { clr_character_flag = creating_title_loop }

	}
	allow = {
		OR = {
			AND = {
			
				primary_title = { title = c_yperen }
				primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = no_liege } }
				OR = {
					AND = {
						num_of_count_titles = 3
						NOT = { num_of_count_titles = 6 }
					}
					primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = isolated } }
				}
			}
			d_yperen = {
				is_titular = no
			}
		}

	}
}

					FROM = { has_character_flag = creating_title_loop }
				}
			}
			de_jure_liege = k_julich
			hidden_tooltip = { FROM = {	set_character_flag = creating_title_loop } }
		}
		hidden_tooltip = { clr_character_flag = creating_title_loop }

	}
	allow = {
		OR = {
			AND = {
			
				primary_title = { title = d_julich }
				num_of_duke_titles = 3
			}
			k_julich = {
				is_titular = no
			}
		}

	}
}

e_julich = {
	color = { 138 138 138 }
	color2 = { 255 255 255 }
	capital = 90
	short_name = yes
	gain_effect = {
		primary_title = { copy_title_laws = k_julich }
		
		any_demesne_title = {
			limit = {
				title = k_julich
				OR = {
					e_julich = { is_titular = yes }
					FROM = { has_character_flag = creating_title_loop }
				}
			}
			de_jure_liege = e_julich
			hidden_tooltip = { FROM = {	set_character_flag = creating_title_loop } }
		}
		hidden_tooltip = { clr_character_flag = creating_title_loop }

	}
	allow = {
		OR = {
			AND = {
			
				primary_title = { title = k_julich }
				num_of_king_titles = 3
			}
			e_julich = {
				is_titular = no
			}
		}

	}
}

d_loon = {
	color = { 147 146 140 }
	color2 = { 255 255 255 }
	capital = 91
	gain_effect = {
		primary_title = { copy_title_laws = c_loon }
		
		IF = {
			limit = {
				d_loon = { is_titular = yes }
			}
			character_event = { 
		id = nivve.0 tooltip = "Kingdom of Europa becomes the de jure liege of d_loon" 
				}
			}
		any_demesne_title = {
			limit = {
				tier = COUNT
				location = { 
					AND = {
						has_province_modifier = no_liege
						OR = {
							is_primary_holder_title = yes
							any_neighbor_province = {
								owner = { character = ROOT }
							}
						}
					}
				}
				OR = {
					d_loon = { is_titular = yes }
					FROM = { has_character_flag = creating_title_loop }
				}
			}
			de_jure_liege = d_loon
			hidden_tooltip = {
				location = {
					add_province_modifier = {
						name = d_loon_de_jure_liege
						duration = -1
					}
					remove_province_modifier = no_liege
				}
			}
			hidden_tooltip = { FROM = {	set_character_flag = creating_title_loop } }
		}
		hidden_tooltip = { clr_character_flag = creating_title_loop }

	}
	allow = {
		OR = {
			AND = {
			
				primary_title = { title = c_loon }
				primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = no_liege } }
				OR = {
					AND = {
						num_of_count_titles = 3
						NOT = { num_of_count_titles = 6 }
					}
					primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = isolated } }
				}
			}
			d_loon = {
				is_titular = no
			}
		}

	}
}

k_loon = {
	color = { 147 146 140 }
	color2 = { 255 255 255 }
	capital = 91
	gain_effect = {
		primary_title = { copy_title_laws = d_loon }

			limit = {
				title = k_trier
				OR = {
					e_trier = { is_titular = yes }
					FROM = { has_character_flag = creating_title_loop }
				}
			}
			de_jure_liege = e_trier
			hidden_tooltip = { FROM = {	set_character_flag = creating_title_loop } }
		}
		hidden_tooltip = { clr_character_flag = creating_title_loop }

	}
	allow = {
		OR = {
			AND = {
			
				primary_title = { title = k_trier }
				num_of_king_titles = 3
			}
			e_trier = {
				is_titular = no
			}
		}

	}
}

d_metz = {
	color = { 114 114 114 }
	color2 = { 255 255 255 }
	capital = 128
	gain_effect = {
		primary_title = { copy_title_laws = c_metz }
		
		IF = {
			limit = {
				d_metz = { is_titular = yes }
			}
			character_event = { 
		id = nivve.0 tooltip = "Kingdom of Europa becomes the de jure liege of d_metz" 
				}
			}
		any_demesne_title = {
			limit = {
				tier = COUNT
				location = { 
					AND = {
						has_province_modifier = no_liege
						OR = {
							is_primary_holder_title = yes
							any_neighbor_province = {
								owner = { character = ROOT }
							}
						}
					}
				}
				OR = {
					d_metz = { is_titular = yes }
					FROM = { has_character_flag = creating_title_loop }
				}
			}
			de_jure_liege = d_metz
			hidden_tooltip = {
				location = {
					add_province_modifier = {
						name = d_metz_de_jure_liege
						duration = -1
					}
					remove_province_modifier = no_liege
				}
			}
			hidden_tooltip = { FROM = {	set_character_flag = creating_title_loop } }
		}
		hidden_tooltip = { clr_character_flag = creating_title_loop }

	}
	allow = {
		OR = {
			AND = {
			
				primary_title = { title = c_metz }
				primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = no_liege } }
				OR = {
					AND = {
						num_of_count_titles = 3
						NOT = { num_of_count_titles = 6 }
					}
					primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = isolated } }
				}
			}
			d_metz = {
				is_titular = no
			}
		}

	}
}

			e_oberbayern = {
				is_titular = no
			}
		}

	}
}

d_salzburg = {
	color = { 63 63 63 }
	color2 = { 255 255 255 }
	capital = 448
	gain_effect = {
		primary_title = { copy_title_laws = c_salzburg }
		
		IF = {
			limit = {
				d_salzburg = { is_titular = yes }
			}
			character_event = { 
		id = nivve.0 tooltip = "Kingdom of Europa becomes the de jure liege of d_salzburg" 
				}
			}
		any_demesne_title = {
			limit = {
				tier = COUNT
				location = { 
					AND = {
						has_province_modifier = no_liege
						OR = {
							is_primary_holder_title = yes
							any_neighbor_province = {
								owner = { character = ROOT }
							}
						}
					}
				}
				OR = {
					d_salzburg = { is_titular = yes }
					FROM = { has_character_flag = creating_title_loop }
				}
			}
			de_jure_liege = d_salzburg
			hidden_tooltip = {
				location = {
					add_province_modifier = {
						name = d_salzburg_de_jure_liege
						duration = -1
					}
					remove_province_modifier = no_liege
				}
			}
			hidden_tooltip = { FROM = {	set_character_flag = creating_title_loop } }
		}
		hidden_tooltip = { clr_character_flag = creating_title_loop }

	}
	allow = {
		OR = {
			AND = {
			
				primary_title = { title = c_salzburg }
				primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = no_liege } }
				OR = {
					AND = {
						num_of_count_titles = 3
						NOT = { num_of_count_titles = 6 }
					}
					primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = isolated } }
				}
			}
			d_salzburg = {
				is_titular = no
			}
		}

	}
}

		any_demesne_title = {
			limit = {
				tier = COUNT
				location = { 
					AND = {
						has_province_modifier = no_liege
						OR = {
							is_primary_holder_title = yes
							any_neighbor_province = {
								owner = { character = ROOT }
							}
						}
					}
				}
				OR = {
					d_steiermark = { is_titular = yes }
					FROM = { has_character_flag = creating_title_loop }
				}
			}
			de_jure_liege = d_steiermark
			hidden_tooltip = {
				location = {
					add_province_modifier = {
						name = d_steiermark_de_jure_liege
						duration = -1
					}
					remove_province_modifier = no_liege
				}
			}
			hidden_tooltip = { FROM = {	set_character_flag = creating_title_loop } }
		}
		hidden_tooltip = { clr_character_flag = creating_title_loop }

	}
	allow = {
		OR = {
			AND = {
			
				primary_title = { title = c_steiermark }
				primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = no_liege } }
				OR = {
					AND = {
						num_of_count_titles = 3
						NOT = { num_of_count_titles = 6 }
					}
					primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = isolated } }
				}
			}
			d_steiermark = {
				is_titular = no
			}
		}

	}
}

			hidden_tooltip = {
				location = {
					add_province_modifier = {
						name = d_krain_de_jure_liege
						duration = -1
					}
					remove_province_modifier = no_liege
				}
			}
			hidden_tooltip = { FROM = {	set_character_flag = creating_title_loop } }
		}
		hidden_tooltip = { clr_character_flag = creating_title_loop }

	}
	allow = {
		OR = {
			AND = {
			
				primary_title = { title = c_krain }
				primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = no_liege } }
				OR = {
					AND = {
						num_of_count_titles = 3
						NOT = { num_of_count_titles = 6 }
					}
					primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = isolated } }
				}
			}
			d_krain = {
				is_titular = no
			}
		}

	}
}

d_karnten = {
	color = { 244 247 160 }
	color2 = { 255 255 255 }
	capital = 456
	gain_effect = {
		primary_title = { copy_title_laws = c_karnten }
		
		IF = {
			limit = {
				d_karnten = { is_titular = yes }
			}
			character_event = { 
		id = nivve.0 tooltip = "Kingdom of Europa becomes the de jure liege of d_karnten" 
				}
			}
		any_demesne_title = {
			limit = {
				tier = COUNT
				location = { 
					AND = {
						has_province_modifier = no_liege
						OR = {
							is_primary_holder_title = yes
							any_neighbor_province = {
								owner = { character = ROOT }
							}
						}
					}
				}
				OR = {
					d_karnten = { is_titular = yes }
					FROM = { has_character_flag = creating_title_loop }
				}
			}
			de_jure_liege = d_karnten
			hidden_tooltip = {
				location = {
					add_province_modifier = {
						name = d_karnten_de_jure_liege
						duration = -1
					}
					remove_province_modifier = no_liege
				}
			}
			hidden_tooltip = { FROM = {	set_character_flag = creating_title_loop } }
		}
		hidden_tooltip = { clr_character_flag = creating_title_loop }

	}
	allow = {
		OR = {
			AND = {
			
				primary_title = { title = c_karnten }
				primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = no_liege } }
				OR = {
					AND = {
						num_of_count_titles = 3
						NOT = { num_of_count_titles = 6 }
					}
					primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = isolated } }
				}
			}

			AND = {
			
				primary_title = { title = c_oldenburg }
				primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = no_liege } }
				OR = {
					AND = {
						num_of_count_titles = 3
						NOT = { num_of_count_titles = 6 }
					}
					primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = isolated } }
				}
			}
			d_oldenburg = {
				is_titular = no
			}
		}

	}
}

k_oldenburg = {
	color = { 214 214 214 }
	color2 = { 255 255 255 }
	capital = 86
	gain_effect = {
		primary_title = { copy_title_laws = d_oldenburg }
		
		any_demesne_title = {
			limit = {
				title = d_oldenburg
				OR = {
					k_oldenburg = { is_titular = yes }
					FROM = { has_character_flag = creating_title_loop }
				}
			}
			de_jure_liege = k_oldenburg
			hidden_tooltip = { FROM = {	set_character_flag = creating_title_loop } }
		}
		hidden_tooltip = { clr_character_flag = creating_title_loop }

	}

			AND = {

				num_of_duke_titles = 3
			}
			k_oldenburg = {

d_osnabruck = {
	color = { 213 213 213 }
	color2 = { 255 255 255 }
	capital = 87
	gain_effect = {
		primary_title = { copy_title_laws = c_osnabruck }
		
		IF = {
			limit = {
				d_osnabruck = { is_titular = yes }
			}
			character_event = { 
		id = nivve.0 tooltip = "Kingdom of Europa becomes the de jure liege of d_osnabruck" 
				}
			}
		any_demesne_title = {
			limit = {
				tier = COUNT
				location = { 
					AND = {
						has_province_modifier = no_liege
						OR = {
							is_primary_holder_title = yes
							any_neighbor_province = {
								owner = { character = ROOT }
							}
						}
					}
				}
				OR = {
					d_osnabruck = { is_titular = yes }
					FROM = { has_character_flag = creating_title_loop }
				}
			}
			de_jure_liege = d_osnabruck
			hidden_tooltip = {
				location = {
					add_province_modifier = {
						name = d_osnabruck_de_jure_liege
						duration = -1
					}
					remove_province_modifier = no_liege
				}
			}
			hidden_tooltip = { FROM = {	set_character_flag = creating_title_loop } }
		}
		hidden_tooltip = { clr_character_flag = creating_title_loop }

	}
	allow = {
		OR = {
			AND = {
			
				primary_title = { title = c_osnabruck }
				primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = no_liege } }
				OR = {
					AND = {
						num_of_count_titles = 3
						NOT = { num_of_count_titles = 6 }
					}
					primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = isolated } }
				}
			}
			d_osnabruck = {
				is_titular = no
			}
		}

	}
}

	gain_effect = {
		primary_title = { copy_title_laws = d_munster }
		
		any_demesne_title = {
			limit = {
				title = d_munster
				OR = {
					k_munster = { is_titular = yes }
					FROM = { has_character_flag = creating_title_loop }
				}
			}
			de_jure_liege = k_munster
			hidden_tooltip = { FROM = {	set_character_flag = creating_title_loop } }
		}
		hidden_tooltip = { clr_character_flag = creating_title_loop }

	}
	allow = {
		OR = {
			AND = {
			
				primary_title = { title = d_munster }
				num_of_duke_titles = 3
			}
			k_munster = {
				is_titular = no
			}
		}

	}
}

e_munster = {
	color = { 212 212 212 }
	color2 = { 255 255 255 }
	capital = 88
	short_name = yes
	gain_effect = {
		primary_title = { copy_title_laws = k_munster }
		
		any_demesne_title = {
			limit = {
				title = k_munster
				OR = {
					e_munster = { is_titular = yes }
					FROM = { has_character_flag = creating_title_loop }
				}
			}
			de_jure_liege = e_munster
			hidden_tooltip = { FROM = {	set_character_flag = creating_title_loop } }
		}
		hidden_tooltip = { clr_character_flag = creating_title_loop }

	}
	allow = {
		OR = {
			AND = {
			
				primary_title = { title = k_munster }
				num_of_king_titles = 3
			}
			e_munster = {
				is_titular = no
			}
		}

	}
}

d_kleve = {
	color = { 132 132 132 }
	color2 = { 255 255 255 }
	capital = 89
	gain_effect = {
		primary_title = { copy_title_laws = c_kleve }
		
		IF = {
			limit = {
				d_kleve = { is_titular = yes }
			}
			character_event = { 
		id = nivve.0 tooltip = "Kingdom of Europa becomes the de jure liege of d_kleve" 
				}
			}
		any_demesne_title = {
			limit = {
				tier = COUNT
				location = { 
					AND = {
						has_province_modifier = no_liege
						OR = {
							is_primary_holder_title = yes
							any_neighbor_province = {
								owner = { character = ROOT }
							}
						}
					}
				}
				OR = {
					d_kleve = { is_titular = yes }
					FROM = { has_character_flag = creating_title_loop }
				}
			}
			de_jure_liege = d_kleve
			hidden_tooltip = {
				location = {
					add_province_modifier = {
						name = d_kleve_de_jure_liege
						duration = -1
					}
					remove_province_modifier = no_liege
				}
			}
			hidden_tooltip = { FROM = {	set_character_flag = creating_title_loop } }
		}
		hidden_tooltip = { clr_character_flag = creating_title_loop }

	}
	allow = {
		OR = {
			AND = {
			
				primary_title = { title = c_kleve }
				primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = no_liege } }
				OR = {
					AND = {
						num_of_count_titles = 3
						NOT = { num_of_count_titles = 6 }
					}
					primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = isolated } }
				}
			}
			d_kleve = {
				is_titular = no
			}
		}

	}
}

k_kleve = {
	color = { 132 132 132 }
	color2 = { 255 255 255 }
	capital = 89
	gain_effect = {
		primary_title = { copy_title_laws = d_kleve }
		
		any_demesne_title = {

			}
			k_kleve = {

			}
		}

	}

			k_baden = {
				is_titular = no
			}
		}

	}

d_breisgau = {
	color = { 105 94 105 }
	color2 = { 255 255 255 }
	capital = 250
	gain_effect = {
		primary_title = { copy_title_laws = c_breisgau }
		
		IF = {
			limit = {
				d_breisgau = { is_titular = yes }
			}
			character_event = { 
		id = nivve.0 tooltip = "Kingdom of Europa becomes the de jure liege of d_breisgau" 
				}
			}
		any_demesne_title = {
			limit = {
				tier = COUNT
				location = { 
					AND = {
						has_province_modifier = no_liege
						OR = {
							is_primary_holder_title = yes
							any_neighbor_province = {
								owner = { character = ROOT }
							}
						}
					}
				}
				OR = {
					d_breisgau = { is_titular = yes }
					FROM = { has_character_flag = creating_title_loop }
				}
			}
			de_jure_liege = d_breisgau
			hidden_tooltip = {
				location = {
					add_province_modifier = {
						name = d_breisgau_de_jure_liege
						duration = -1
					}
					remove_province_modifier = no_liege
				}
			}
			hidden_tooltip = { FROM = {	set_character_flag = creating_title_loop } }
		}
		hidden_tooltip = { clr_character_flag = creating_title_loop }

	}
	allow = {
		OR = {
			AND = {
			
				primary_title = { title = c_breisgau }
				primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = no_liege } }
				OR = {
					AND = {
						num_of_count_titles = 3
						NOT = { num_of_count_titles = 6 }
					}
					primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = isolated } }
				}
			}
			d_breisgau = {
				is_titular = no
			}
		}

	}
}

	gain_effect = {
		primary_title = { copy_title_laws = k_nikaea }
		
		any_demesne_title = {
			limit = {
				title = k_nikaea
				OR = {
					e_nikaea = { is_titular = yes }
					FROM = { has_character_flag = creating_title_loop }
				}
			}
			de_jure_liege = e_nikaea
			hidden_tooltip = { FROM = {	set_character_flag = creating_title_loop } }
		}
		hidden_tooltip = { clr_character_flag = creating_title_loop }

	}
	allow = {
		OR = {
			AND = {
			
				primary_title = { title = k_nikaea }
				num_of_king_titles = 3
			}
			e_nikaea = {
				is_titular = no
			}
		}

	}
}

d_nikomedeia = {
	color = { 208 107 173 }
	color2 = { 255 255 20 }
	capital = 741
	turkish = "Izmit"
	gain_effect = {
		primary_title = { copy_title_laws = c_nikomedeia }
		
		IF = {
			limit = {
				d_nikomedeia = { is_titular = yes }
			}
			character_event = { 
		id = nivve.0 tooltip = "Kingdom of Europa becomes the de jure liege of d_nikomedeia" 
				}
			}
		any_demesne_title = {
			limit = {
				tier = COUNT
				location = { 
					AND = {
						has_province_modifier = no_liege
						OR = {
							is_primary_holder_title = yes
							any_neighbor_province = {
								owner = { character = ROOT }
							}
						}
					}
				}
				OR = {
					d_nikomedeia = { is_titular = yes }
					FROM = { has_character_flag = creating_title_loop }
				}
			}
			de_jure_liege = d_nikomedeia
			hidden_tooltip = {
				location = {
					add_province_modifier = {
						name = d_nikomedeia_de_jure_liege
						duration = -1
					}
					remove_province_modifier = no_liege
				}
			}
			hidden_tooltip = { FROM = {	set_character_flag = creating_title_loop } }
		}
		hidden_tooltip = { clr_character_flag = creating_title_loop }

	}
	allow = {
		OR = {
			AND = {
			
				primary_title = { title = c_nikomedeia }
				primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = no_liege } }
				OR = {
					AND = {
						num_of_count_titles = 3
						NOT = { num_of_count_titles = 6 }
					}
					primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = isolated } }
				}
			}
			d_nikomedeia = {
				is_titular = no
			}
		}

	}
}

	color = { 211 110 176 }
	color2 = { 255 255 20 }
	capital = 742
	turkish = "Bursa"
	gain_effect = {
		primary_title = { copy_title_laws = c_prusa }
		
		IF = {
			limit = {
				d_prusa = { is_titular = yes }
			}
			character_event = { 
		id = nivve.0 tooltip = "Kingdom of Europa becomes the de jure liege of d_prusa" 
				}
			}
		any_demesne_title = {
			limit = {
				tier = COUNT
				location = { 
					AND = {
						has_province_modifier = no_liege
						OR = {
							is_primary_holder_title = yes
							any_neighbor_province = {
								owner = { character = ROOT }
							}
						}
					}
				}
				OR = {
					d_prusa = { is_titular = yes }
					FROM = { has_character_flag = creating_title_loop }
				}
			}
			de_jure_liege = d_prusa
			hidden_tooltip = {
				location = {
					add_province_modifier = {
						name = d_prusa_de_jure_liege
						duration = -1
					}
					remove_province_modifier = no_liege
				}
			}
			hidden_tooltip = { FROM = {	set_character_flag = creating_title_loop } }
		}
		hidden_tooltip = { clr_character_flag = creating_title_loop }

	}
	allow = {

			AND = {
			
				primary_title = { title = c_prusa }
				primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = no_liege } }
				OR = {
					AND = {
						num_of_count_titles = 3
						NOT = { num_of_count_titles = 6 }
					}
					primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = isolated } }
				}
			}

e_chios = {
	color = { 243 48 177 }
	color2 = { 255 255 20 }
	capital = 486
	short_name = yes
	turkish = "Sisam"
	gain_effect = {
		primary_title = { copy_title_laws = k_chios }
		
		any_demesne_title = {
			limit = {
				title = k_chios
				OR = {
					e_chios = { is_titular = yes }
					FROM = { has_character_flag = creating_title_loop }
				}
			}
			de_jure_liege = e_chios
			hidden_tooltip = { FROM = {	set_character_flag = creating_title_loop } }
		}
		hidden_tooltip = { clr_character_flag = creating_title_loop }

	}
	allow = {
		OR = {
			AND = {
			
				primary_title = { title = k_chios }
				num_of_king_titles = 3
			}
			e_chios = {
				is_titular = no
			}
		}

	}
}

d_abydos = {
	color = { 147 55 115 }
	color2 = { 255 255 20 }
	capital = 744
	turkish = "Balakhisar"
	gain_effect = {
		primary_title = { copy_title_laws = c_abydos }
		
		IF = {
			limit = {
				d_abydos = { is_titular = yes }
			}
			character_event = { 
		id = nivve.0 tooltip = "Kingdom of Europa becomes the de jure liege of d_abydos" 
				}
			}
		any_demesne_title = {
			limit = {
				tier = COUNT
				location = { 
					AND = {
						has_province_modifier = no_liege
						OR = {
							is_primary_holder_title = yes
							any_neighbor_province = {
								owner = { character = ROOT }
							}
						}
					}
				}
				OR = {
					d_abydos = { is_titular = yes }
					FROM = { has_character_flag = creating_title_loop }
				}
			}
			de_jure_liege = d_abydos
			hidden_tooltip = {
				location = {
					add_province_modifier = {
						name = d_abydos_de_jure_liege
						duration = -1
					}
					remove_province_modifier = no_liege
				}
			}
			hidden_tooltip = { FROM = {	set_character_flag = creating_title_loop } }
		}
		hidden_tooltip = { clr_character_flag = creating_title_loop }

	}
	allow = {
		OR = {
			AND = {
			
				primary_title = { title = c_abydos }
				primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = no_liege } }
				OR = {
					AND = {
						num_of_count_titles = 3
						NOT = { num_of_count_titles = 6 }
					}
					primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = isolated } }
				}
			}
			d_abydos = {
				is_titular = no
			}
		}

	}
}

k_abydos = {
	color = { 147 55 115 }
	color2 = { 255 255 20 }
	capital = 744
	turkish = "Balakhisar"
	gain_effect = {
		primary_title = { copy_title_laws = d_abydos }
		
		any_demesne_title = {
			limit = {
				title = d_abydos
				OR = {
					k_abydos = { is_titular = yes }
					FROM = { has_character_flag = creating_title_loop }
				}
			}
			de_jure_liege = k_abydos
			hidden_tooltip = { FROM = {	set_character_flag = creating_title_loop } }
		}
		hidden_tooltip = { clr_character_flag = creating_title_loop }

	}
	allow = {
		OR = {
			AND = {
			
				primary_title = { title = d_abydos }
				num_of_duke_titles = 3
			}
			k_abydos = {
				is_titular = no
			}
		}

	}
}

e_abydos = {
	color = { 147 55 115 }
	color2 = { 255 255 20 }
	capital = 744
	short_name = yes
	turkish = "Balakhisar"

				}
			}
			de_jure_liege = e_abydos

	}

d_naxos = {
	color = { 149 57 117 }
	color2 = { 255 255 20 }
	capital = 484
	turkish = "Kiklad"
	italian = "Egeopelagi"
	gain_effect = {
		primary_title = { copy_title_laws = c_naxos }
		
		IF = {
			limit = {
				d_naxos = { is_titular = yes }
			}
			character_event = { 
		id = nivve.0 tooltip = "Kingdom of Europa becomes the de jure liege of d_naxos" 
				}
			}
		any_demesne_title = {
			limit = {
				tier = COUNT
				location = { 
					AND = {
						has_province_modifier = no_liege
						OR = {
							is_primary_holder_title = yes
							any_neighbor_province = {
								owner = { character = ROOT }
							}
						}
					}
				}
				OR = {
					d_naxos = { is_titular = yes }
					FROM = { has_character_flag = creating_title_loop }
				}
			}
			de_jure_liege = d_naxos
			hidden_tooltip = {
				location = {
					add_province_modifier = {
						name = d_naxos_de_jure_liege
						duration = -1
					}
					remove_province_modifier = no_liege
				}
			}
			hidden_tooltip = { FROM = {	set_character_flag = creating_title_loop } }
		}
		hidden_tooltip = { clr_character_flag = creating_title_loop }

	}
	allow = {
		OR = {
			AND = {
			
				primary_title = { title = c_naxos }
				primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = no_liege } }
				OR = {
					AND = {
						num_of_count_titles = 3
						NOT = { num_of_count_titles = 6 }
					}
					primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = isolated } }
				}
			}
			d_naxos = {
				is_titular = no
			}
		}

	}
}

	color2 = { 255 255 20 }

d_byzantion = {
	color = { 180 84 147 }
	color2 = { 255 255 20 }
	capital = 496
	orthodox = 500
	catholic = 250
	gain_effect = {
		primary_title = { copy_title_laws = c_byzantion }

			limit = {

			}

						name = d_byzantion_de_jure_liege

					}

				}
			}
			hidden_tooltip = { FROM = {	set_character_flag = creating_title_loop } }

			hidden_tooltip = { FROM = {	set_character_flag = creating_title_loop } }
		}
		hidden_tooltip = { clr_character_flag = creating_title_loop }

	}
	allow = {
		OR = {
			AND = {
			
				primary_title = { title = d_byzantion }
				num_of_duke_titles = 3
			}
			k_byzantion = {
				is_titular = no
			}
		}

	}
}

e_byzantion = {
	color = { 180 84 147 }
	color2 = { 255 255 20 }
	capital = 496
	short_name = yes
	orthodox = 500
	catholic = 250
	gain_effect = {
		primary_title = { copy_title_laws = k_byzantion }
		
		any_demesne_title = {
			limit = {
				title = k_byzantion
				OR = {
					e_byzantion = { is_titular = yes }
					FROM = { has_character_flag = creating_title_loop }
				}

d_thrake = {
	color = { 184 88 151 }
	color2 = { 255 255 20 }
	capital = 497
	gain_effect = {
		primary_title = { copy_title_laws = c_thrake }
		
		IF = {
			limit = {
				d_thrake = { is_titular = yes }
			}
			character_event = { 
		id = nivve.0 tooltip = "Kingdom of Europa becomes the de jure liege of d_thrake" 
				}
			}
		any_demesne_title = {
			limit = {
				tier = COUNT
				location = { 
					AND = {
						has_province_modifier = no_liege
						OR = {
							is_primary_holder_title = yes
							any_neighbor_province = {
								owner = { character = ROOT }
							}
						}
					}
				}
				OR = {
					d_thrake = { is_titular = yes }
					FROM = { has_character_flag = creating_title_loop }
				}
			}
			de_jure_liege = d_thrake
			hidden_tooltip = {
				location = {
					add_province_modifier = {
						name = d_thrake_de_jure_liege
						duration = -1
					}
					remove_province_modifier = no_liege
				}
			}
			hidden_tooltip = { FROM = {	set_character_flag = creating_title_loop } }
		}
		hidden_tooltip = { clr_character_flag = creating_title_loop }

	}
	allow = {
		OR = {
			AND = {
			
				primary_title = { title = c_thrake }
				primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = no_liege } }
				OR = {
					AND = {
						num_of_count_titles = 3
						NOT = { num_of_count_titles = 6 }
					}
					primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = isolated } }
				}
			}
			d_thrake = {
				is_titular = no
			}
		}

	}
}

				}
			}
			de_jure_liege = k_thessalia
			hidden_tooltip = { FROM = {	set_character_flag = creating_title_loop } }
		}
		hidden_tooltip = { clr_character_flag = creating_title_loop }

	}
	allow = {
		OR = {
			AND = {
			
				primary_title = { title = d_thessalia }
				num_of_duke_titles = 3
			}
			k_thessalia = {
				is_titular = no
			}
		}

	}
}

e_thessalia = {
	color = { 198 28 139 }
	color2 = { 255 255 20 }
	capital = 489
	short_name = yes
	turkish = "Tesalya"

d_strymon = {
	color = { 139 29 101 }
	color2 = { 255 255 20 }
	capital = 492
	gain_effect = {
		primary_title = { copy_title_laws = c_strymon }
		
		IF = {
			limit = {
				d_strymon = { is_titular = yes }
			}
			character_event = { 
		id = nivve.0 tooltip = "Kingdom of Europa becomes the de jure liege of d_strymon" 
				}
			}
		any_demesne_title = {
			limit = {
				tier = COUNT
				location = { 
					AND = {
						has_province_modifier = no_liege
						OR = {
							is_primary_holder_title = yes
							any_neighbor_province = {
								owner = { character = ROOT }
							}
						}
					}
				}
				OR = {
					d_strymon = { is_titular = yes }
					FROM = { has_character_flag = creating_title_loop }
				}
			}
			de_jure_liege = d_strymon
			hidden_tooltip = {
				location = {
					add_province_modifier = {
						name = d_strymon_de_jure_liege
						duration = -1
					}
					remove_province_modifier = no_liege
				}
			}
			hidden_tooltip = { FROM = {	set_character_flag = creating_title_loop } }
		}
		hidden_tooltip = { clr_character_flag = creating_title_loop }

	}
	allow = {
		OR = {
			AND = {
			
				primary_title = { title = c_strymon }
				primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = no_liege } }
				OR = {
					AND = {
						num_of_count_titles = 3
						NOT = { num_of_count_titles = 6 }
					}
					primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = isolated } }
				}
			}
			d_strymon = {
				is_titular = no
			}
		}

	}
}

	color = { 209 69 161 }
	color2 = { 255 255 20 }
	capital = 488

		primary_title = { copy_title_laws = c_demetrias }
		
		IF = {
			limit = {
				d_demetrias = { is_titular = yes }
			}
			character_event = { 
		id = nivve.0 tooltip = "Kingdom of Europa becomes the de jure liege of d_demetrias" 
				}
			}
		any_demesne_title = {
			limit = {
				tier = COUNT
				location = { 
					AND = {
						has_province_modifier = no_liege
						OR = {
							is_primary_holder_title = yes
							any_neighbor_province = {
								owner = { character = ROOT }
							}
						}
					}
				}
				OR = {
					d_demetrias = { is_titular = yes }
					FROM = { has_character_flag = creating_title_loop }
				}
			}
			de_jure_liege = d_demetrias
			hidden_tooltip = {
				location = {
					add_province_modifier = {
						name = d_demetrias_de_jure_liege
						duration = -1
					}
					remove_province_modifier = no_liege
				}
			}
			hidden_tooltip = { FROM = {	set_character_flag = creating_title_loop } }
		}
		hidden_tooltip = { clr_character_flag = creating_title_loop }

	}
	allow = {
		OR = {
			AND = {
			
				primary_title = { title = c_demetrias }
				primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = no_liege } }
				OR = {
					AND = {
						num_of_count_titles = 3
						NOT = { num_of_count_titles = 6 }
					}
					primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = isolated } }
				}
			}
			d_demetrias = {

			}

			hidden_tooltip = { FROM = {	set_character_flag = creating_title_loop } }
		}
		hidden_tooltip = { clr_character_flag = creating_title_loop }

	}
	allow = {
		OR = {
			AND = {
			
				primary_title = { title = k_methone }
				num_of_king_titles = 3
			}
			e_methone = {
				is_titular = no
			}
		}

	}
}

d_monemvasia = {
	color = { 198 37 142 }
	color2 = { 255 255 20 }
	capital = 478
	gain_effect = {
		primary_title = { copy_title_laws = c_monemvasia }
		
		IF = {
			limit = {
				d_monemvasia = { is_titular = yes }
			}
			character_event = { 
		id = nivve.0 tooltip = "Kingdom of Europa becomes the de jure liege of d_monemvasia" 
				}
			}
		any_demesne_title = {
			limit = {
				tier = COUNT
				location = { 
					AND = {
						has_province_modifier = no_liege
						OR = {
							is_primary_holder_title = yes
							any_neighbor_province = {
								owner = { character = ROOT }
							}
						}
					}
				}
				OR = {
					d_monemvasia = { is_titular = yes }
					FROM = { has_character_flag = creating_title_loop }
				}
			}
			de_jure_liege = d_monemvasia
			hidden_tooltip = {
				location = {
					add_province_modifier = {
						name = d_monemvasia_de_jure_liege
						duration = -1
					}
					remove_province_modifier = no_liege
				}
			}
			hidden_tooltip = { FROM = {	set_character_flag = creating_title_loop } }
		}
		hidden_tooltip = { clr_character_flag = creating_title_loop }

	}
	allow = {
		OR = {
			AND = {
			
				primary_title = { title = c_monemvasia }
				primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = no_liege } }
				OR = {
					AND = {
						num_of_count_titles = 3
						NOT = { num_of_count_titles = 6 }
					}
					primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = isolated } }
				}
			}
			d_monemvasia = {
				is_titular = no
			}
		}

	}
}

d_kaneia = {
	color = { 178 11 120 }
	color2 = { 255 255 20 }
	capital = 479
	bedouin_arabic = "Al-Hanim"
	maghreb_arabic = "Al-Hanim"
	levantine_arabic = "Al-Hanim"
	egyptian_arabic = "Al-Hanim"
	andalusian_arabic = "Al-Hanim"
	turkish = "Hanya"
	gain_effect = {
		primary_title = { copy_title_laws = c_kaneia }
		
		IF = {
			limit = {
				d_kaneia = { is_titular = yes }
			}
			character_event = { 
		id = nivve.0 tooltip = "Kingdom of Europa becomes the de jure liege of d_kaneia" 
				}
			}
		any_demesne_title = {
			limit = {
				tier = COUNT
				location = { 
					AND = {
						has_province_modifier = no_liege
						OR = {
							is_primary_holder_title = yes
							any_neighbor_province = {
								owner = { character = ROOT }
							}
						}
					}
				}
				OR = {
					d_kaneia = { is_titular = yes }
					FROM = { has_character_flag = creating_title_loop }
				}
			}
			de_jure_liege = d_kaneia
			hidden_tooltip = {
				location = {
					add_province_modifier = {
						name = d_kaneia_de_jure_liege
						duration = -1
					}
					remove_province_modifier = no_liege
				}
			}
			hidden_tooltip = { FROM = {	set_character_flag = creating_title_loop } }
		}
		hidden_tooltip = { clr_character_flag = creating_title_loop }

	}
	allow = {
		OR = {
			AND = {
			
				primary_title = { title = c_kaneia }
				primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = no_liege } }
				OR = {
					AND = {
						num_of_count_titles = 3
						NOT = { num_of_count_titles = 6 }
					}
					primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = isolated } }
					AND = {
						has_landed_title = c_chandax
						has_landed_title = c_kaneia
					}
				}
			}
			d_kaneia = {
				is_titular = no
			}
		}

	}
}

				title = d_attaleia
				OR = {
					k_attaleia = { is_titular = yes }
					FROM = { has_character_flag = creating_title_loop }
				}
			}
			de_jure_liege = k_attaleia
			hidden_tooltip = { FROM = {	set_character_flag = creating_title_loop } }
		}
		hidden_tooltip = { clr_character_flag = creating_title_loop }

	}
	allow = {
		OR = {
			AND = {
			
				primary_title = { title = d_attaleia }
				num_of_duke_titles = 3
			}
			k_attaleia = {
				is_titular = no
			}
		}

	}
}

e_attaleia = {
	color = { 112 33 84 }
	color2 = { 255 255 20 }
	capital = 755
	short_name = yes

	gain_effect = {

d_rhodos = {
	color = { 116 37 88 }
	color2 = { 255 255 20 }
	capital = 483
	gain_effect = {
		primary_title = { copy_title_laws = c_rhodos }
		
		IF = {
			limit = {
				d_rhodos = { is_titular = yes }
			}
			character_event = { 
		id = nivve.0 tooltip = "Kingdom of Europa becomes the de jure liege of d_rhodos" 
				}
			}
		any_demesne_title = {
			limit = {
				tier = COUNT
				location = { 
					AND = {
						has_province_modifier = no_liege
						OR = {
							is_primary_holder_title = yes
							any_neighbor_province = {
								owner = { character = ROOT }
							}
						}
					}
				}
				OR = {
					d_rhodos = { is_titular = yes }
					FROM = { has_character_flag = creating_title_loop }
				}
			}
			de_jure_liege = d_rhodos
			hidden_tooltip = {
				location = {
					add_province_modifier = {
						name = d_rhodos_de_jure_liege
						duration = -1
					}
					remove_province_modifier = no_liege
				}
			}
			hidden_tooltip = { FROM = {	set_character_flag = creating_title_loop } }
		}
		hidden_tooltip = { clr_character_flag = creating_title_loop }

	}
	allow = {
		OR = {
			AND = {
			
				primary_title = { title = c_rhodos }
				primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = no_liege } }
				OR = {
					AND = {
						num_of_count_titles = 3
						NOT = { num_of_count_titles = 6 }
					}
					primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = isolated } }
				}
			}
			d_rhodos = {
				is_titular = no
			}
		}

	}
}

	turkish = "Alasehir"
	gain_effect = {
		primary_title = { copy_title_laws = d_laodikeia }
		
		any_demesne_title = {
			limit = {
				title = d_laodikeia
				OR = {
					k_laodikeia = { is_titular = yes }
					FROM = { has_character_flag = creating_title_loop }
				}
			}
			de_jure_liege = k_laodikeia
			hidden_tooltip = { FROM = {	set_character_flag = creating_title_loop } }
		}
		hidden_tooltip = { clr_character_flag = creating_title_loop }

	}
	allow = {
		OR = {
			AND = {
			
				primary_title = { title = d_laodikeia }
				num_of_duke_titles = 3
			}
			k_laodikeia = {
				is_titular = no
			}
		}

	}
}

e_laodikeia = {
	color = { 162 51 124 }
	color2 = { 255 255 20 }
	capital = 748
	short_name = yes
	turkish = "Alasehir"
	gain_effect = {
		primary_title = { copy_title_laws = k_laodikeia }

d_kaisereia = {
	color = { 240 71 181 }
	color2 = { 255 255 20 }
	capital = 737
	turkish = "Kayseri"
	gain_effect = {
		primary_title = { copy_title_laws = c_kaisereia }
		
		IF = {
			limit = {
				d_kaisereia = { is_titular = yes }
			}
			character_event = { 
		id = nivve.0 tooltip = "Kingdom of Europa becomes the de jure liege of d_kaisereia" 
				}
			}
		any_demesne_title = {
			limit = {
				tier = COUNT
				location = { 
					AND = {
						has_province_modifier = no_liege
						OR = {
							is_primary_holder_title = yes
							any_neighbor_province = {
								owner = { character = ROOT }
							}
						}
					}
				}
				OR = {
					d_kaisereia = { is_titular = yes }
					FROM = { has_character_flag = creating_title_loop }
				}
			}
			de_jure_liege = d_kaisereia
			hidden_tooltip = {
				location = {
					add_province_modifier = {
						name = d_kaisereia_de_jure_liege
						duration = -1
					}
					remove_province_modifier = no_liege
				}
			}
			hidden_tooltip = { FROM = {	set_character_flag = creating_title_loop } }
		}
		hidden_tooltip = { clr_character_flag = creating_title_loop }

	}
	allow = {
		OR = {
			AND = {
			
				primary_title = { title = c_kaisereia }
				primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = no_liege } }
				OR = {
					AND = {
						num_of_count_titles = 3
						NOT = { num_of_count_titles = 6 }
					}
					primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = isolated } }
				}
			}
			d_kaisereia = {
				is_titular = no
			}
		}

	}
}

k_kaisereia = {
	color = { 240 71 181 }
	color2 = { 255 255 20 }

d_galatia = {
	color = { 243 74 184 }
	color2 = { 255 255 20 }
	capital = 752
	turkish = "Kirsehir"
	gain_effect = {
		primary_title = { copy_title_laws = c_galatia }
		
		IF = {
			limit = {
				d_galatia = { is_titular = yes }
			}
			character_event = { 
		id = nivve.0 tooltip = "Kingdom of Europa becomes the de jure liege of d_galatia" 
				}
			}
		any_demesne_title = {
			limit = {
				tier = COUNT
				location = { 
					AND = {
						has_province_modifier = no_liege
						OR = {
							is_primary_holder_title = yes
							any_neighbor_province = {
								owner = { character = ROOT }
							}
						}
					}
				}
				OR = {
					d_galatia = { is_titular = yes }
					FROM = { has_character_flag = creating_title_loop }
				}
			}
			de_jure_liege = d_galatia
			hidden_tooltip = {
				location = {
					add_province_modifier = {
						name = d_galatia_de_jure_liege
						duration = -1
					}
					remove_province_modifier = no_liege
				}
			}
			hidden_tooltip = { FROM = {	set_character_flag = creating_title_loop } }
		}
		hidden_tooltip = { clr_character_flag = creating_title_loop }

	}
	allow = {
		OR = {
			AND = {
			
				primary_title = { title = c_galatia }
				primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = no_liege } }
				OR = {
					AND = {
						num_of_count_titles = 3
						NOT = { num_of_count_titles = 6 }
					}
					primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = isolated } }
				}
			}
			d_galatia = {
				is_titular = no
			}

	turkish = "Kastamonu"
	gain_effect = {
		primary_title = { copy_title_laws = d_paphlagonia }
		
		any_demesne_title = {
			limit = {
				title = d_paphlagonia
				OR = {
					k_paphlagonia = { is_titular = yes }
					FROM = { has_character_flag = creating_title_loop }
				}
			}
			de_jure_liege = k_paphlagonia
			hidden_tooltip = { FROM = {	set_character_flag = creating_title_loop } }
		}
		hidden_tooltip = { clr_character_flag = creating_title_loop }

	}
	allow = {
		OR = {
			AND = {
			
				primary_title = { title = d_paphlagonia }
				num_of_duke_titles = 3
			}
			k_paphlagonia = {
				is_titular = no
			}
		}

	}
}

e_paphlagonia = {
	color = { 231 74 177 }
	color2 = { 255 255 20 }
	capital = 751
	short_name = yes
	turkish = "Kastamonu"
	gain_effect = {

				num_of_king_titles = 3
			}
			e_paphlagonia = {

d_herakleia = {
	color = { 235 78 181 }
	color2 = { 255 255 20 }
	capital = 740
	turkish = "Eregli"
	gain_effect = {
		primary_title = { copy_title_laws = c_herakleia }
		
		IF = {
			limit = {
				d_herakleia = { is_titular = yes }
			}
			character_event = { 
		id = nivve.0 tooltip = "Kingdom of Europa becomes the de jure liege of d_herakleia" 
				}
			}
		any_demesne_title = {
			limit = {
				tier = COUNT
				location = { 
					AND = {
						has_province_modifier = no_liege
						OR = {
							is_primary_holder_title = yes
							any_neighbor_province = {
								owner = { character = ROOT }
							}
						}
					}
				}
				OR = {
					d_herakleia = { is_titular = yes }
					FROM = { has_character_flag = creating_title_loop }
				}
			}
			de_jure_liege = d_herakleia
			hidden_tooltip = {
				location = {
					add_province_modifier = {
						name = d_herakleia_de_jure_liege
						duration = -1
					}
					remove_province_modifier = no_liege
				}
			}
			hidden_tooltip = { FROM = {	set_character_flag = creating_title_loop } }
		}
		hidden_tooltip = { clr_character_flag = creating_title_loop }

	}
	allow = {
		OR = {
			AND = {
			
				primary_title = { title = c_herakleia }
				primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = no_liege } }
				OR = {
					AND = {
						num_of_count_titles = 3
						NOT = { num_of_count_titles = 6 }
					}
					primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = isolated } }
				}
			}
			d_herakleia = {
				is_titular = no
			}
		}

	}
}

d_ankyra = {
	color = { 239 82 185 }
	color2 = { 255 255 20 }
	capital = 753
	turkish = "Ankara"
	gain_effect = {
		primary_title = { copy_title_laws = c_ankyra }
		
		IF = {
			limit = {
				d_ankyra = { is_titular = yes }
			}
			character_event = { 
		id = nivve.0 tooltip = "Kingdom of Europa becomes the de jure liege of d_ankyra" 
				}
			}
		any_demesne_title = {
			limit = {
				tier = COUNT
				location = { 
					AND = {
						has_province_modifier = no_liege
						OR = {
							is_primary_holder_title = yes
							any_neighbor_province = {
								owner = { character = ROOT }
							}
						}
					}
				}
				OR = {
					d_ankyra = { is_titular = yes }
					FROM = { has_character_flag = creating_title_loop }
				}
			}
			de_jure_liege = d_ankyra
			hidden_tooltip = {
				location = {
					add_province_modifier = {
						name = d_ankyra_de_jure_liege
						duration = -1
					}
					remove_province_modifier = no_liege
				}
			}
			hidden_tooltip = { FROM = {	set_character_flag = creating_title_loop } }
		}
		hidden_tooltip = { clr_character_flag = creating_title_loop }

	}
	allow = {
		OR = {
			AND = {
			
				primary_title = { title = c_ankyra }
				primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = no_liege } }
				OR = {
					AND = {
						num_of_count_titles = 3
						NOT = { num_of_count_titles = 6 }
					}
					primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = isolated } }
				}
			}
			d_ankyra = {
				is_titular = no
			}
		}

k_lykandos = {
	color = { 131 192 44 }
	color2 = { 255 255 255 }
	capital = 736
	turkish = "Elbistan"
	gain_effect = {
		primary_title = { copy_title_laws = d_lykandos }
		
		any_demesne_title = {
			limit = {
				title = d_lykandos
				OR = {
					k_lykandos = { is_titular = yes }
					FROM = { has_character_flag = creating_title_loop }
				}
			}
			de_jure_liege = k_lykandos
			hidden_tooltip = { FROM = {	set_character_flag = creating_title_loop } }
		}
		hidden_tooltip = { clr_character_flag = creating_title_loop }

	}
	allow = {
		OR = {
			AND = {
			
				primary_title = { title = d_lykandos }
				num_of_duke_titles = 3
			}
			k_lykandos = {
				is_titular = no
			}
		}

	}

d_tarsos = {
	color = { 135 196 48 }
	color2 = { 255 255 255 }
	capital = 761
	turkish = "Mersin"
	armenian = "Darson"
	gain_effect = {
		primary_title = { copy_title_laws = c_tarsos }
		
		IF = {
			limit = {
				d_tarsos = { is_titular = yes }
			}
			character_event = { 
		id = nivve.0 tooltip = "Kingdom of Europa becomes the de jure liege of d_tarsos" 
				}
			}
		any_demesne_title = {
			limit = {
				tier = COUNT
				location = { 
					AND = {
						has_province_modifier = no_liege
						OR = {
							is_primary_holder_title = yes
							any_neighbor_province = {
								owner = { character = ROOT }
							}
						}
					}
				}
				OR = {
					d_tarsos = { is_titular = yes }
					FROM = { has_character_flag = creating_title_loop }
				}
			}
			de_jure_liege = d_tarsos
			hidden_tooltip = {
				location = {
					add_province_modifier = {
						name = d_tarsos_de_jure_liege
						duration = -1
					}
					remove_province_modifier = no_liege
				}
			}
			hidden_tooltip = { FROM = {	set_character_flag = creating_title_loop } }
		}
		hidden_tooltip = { clr_character_flag = creating_title_loop }

	}
	allow = {
		OR = {
			AND = {
			
				primary_title = { title = c_tarsos }
				primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = no_liege } }
				OR = {
					AND = {
						num_of_count_titles = 3
						NOT = { num_of_count_titles = 6 }
					}
					primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = isolated } }
				}
			}
			d_tarsos = {
				is_titular = no
			}
		}

	}
}

					AND = {
						num_of_count_titles = 3
						NOT = { num_of_count_titles = 6 }
					}
					primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = isolated } }
				}
			}
			d_dwin = {
				is_titular = no
			}
		}

	}
}

d_ani = {
	color = { 168 87 50 }
	color2 = { 255 255 255 }
	capital = 681
	turkish = "Kars"
	gain_effect = {
		primary_title = { copy_title_laws = c_ani }
		
		IF = {
			limit = {
				d_ani = { is_titular = yes }
			}
			character_event = { 
		id = nivve.0 tooltip = "Kingdom of Europa becomes the de jure liege of d_ani" 
				}
			}
		any_demesne_title = {
			limit = {
				tier = COUNT
				location = { 
					AND = {
						has_province_modifier = no_liege
						OR = {
							is_primary_holder_title = yes
							any_neighbor_province = {
								owner = { character = ROOT }
							}
						}
					}
				}
				OR = {
					d_ani = { is_titular = yes }
					FROM = { has_character_flag = creating_title_loop }
				}
			}
			de_jure_liege = d_ani
			hidden_tooltip = {
				location = {
					add_province_modifier = {
						name = d_ani_de_jure_liege
						duration = -1
					}
					remove_province_modifier = no_liege
				}
			}
			hidden_tooltip = { FROM = {	set_character_flag = creating_title_loop } }
		}
		hidden_tooltip = { clr_character_flag = creating_title_loop }

	}
	allow = {
		OR = {
			AND = {
			
				primary_title = { title = c_ani }
				primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = no_liege } }
				OR = {
					AND = {
						num_of_count_titles = 3
						NOT = { num_of_count_titles = 6 }
					}
					primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = isolated } }
				}
			}
			d_ani = {
				is_titular = no
			}
		}

	}
}

		any_demesne_title = {
			limit = {
				title = d_tell_bashir
				OR = {
					k_tell_bashir = { is_titular = yes }
					FROM = { has_character_flag = creating_title_loop }
				}
			}
			de_jure_liege = k_tell_bashir
			hidden_tooltip = { FROM = {	set_character_flag = creating_title_loop } }
		}
		hidden_tooltip = { clr_character_flag = creating_title_loop }

	}
	allow = {
		OR = {
			AND = {
			
				primary_title = { title = d_tell_bashir }
				num_of_duke_titles = 3
			}
			k_tell_bashir = {
				is_titular = no
			}
		}

	}
}

e_tell_bashir = {
	color = { 155 255 7 }
	color2 = { 255 255 255 }
	capital = 708
	short_name = yes
	gain_effect = {
		primary_title = { copy_title_laws = k_tell_bashir }
		
		any_demesne_title = {

				OR = {

			AND = {

				num_of_king_titles = 3
			}

			}

d_aintab = {
	color = { 157 255 9 }
	color2 = { 255 255 255 }
	capital = 734
	gain_effect = {
		primary_title = { copy_title_laws = c_aintab }
		
		IF = {
			limit = {
				d_aintab = { is_titular = yes }
			}
			character_event = { 
		id = nivve.0 tooltip = "Kingdom of Europa becomes the de jure liege of d_aintab" 
				}
			}
		any_demesne_title = {
			limit = {
				tier = COUNT
				location = { 
					AND = {
						has_province_modifier = no_liege
						OR = {
							is_primary_holder_title = yes
							any_neighbor_province = {
								owner = { character = ROOT }
							}
						}
					}
				}
				OR = {
					d_aintab = { is_titular = yes }
					FROM = { has_character_flag = creating_title_loop }
				}
			}
			de_jure_liege = d_aintab
			hidden_tooltip = {
				location = {
					add_province_modifier = {
						name = d_aintab_de_jure_liege
						duration = -1
					}
					remove_province_modifier = no_liege
				}
			}
			hidden_tooltip = { FROM = {	set_character_flag = creating_title_loop } }
		}
		hidden_tooltip = { clr_character_flag = creating_title_loop }

	}
	allow = {
		OR = {
			AND = {
			
				primary_title = { title = c_aintab }
				primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = no_liege } }
				OR = {
					AND = {
						num_of_count_titles = 3
						NOT = { num_of_count_titles = 6 }
					}
					primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = isolated } }
				}
			}
			d_aintab = {
				is_titular = no
			}
		}

	}
}

	color = { 157 255 9 }

				}
			}
			de_jure_liege = k_tyrnovo
			hidden_tooltip = { FROM = {	set_character_flag = creating_title_loop } }
		}
		hidden_tooltip = { clr_character_flag = creating_title_loop }

	}
	allow = {
		OR = {
			AND = {
			
				primary_title = { title = d_tyrnovo }
				num_of_duke_titles = 3
			}
			k_tyrnovo = {
				is_titular = no
			}
		}

	}
}

d_serdica = {
	color = { 158 43 201 }
	color2 = { 255 255 255 }
	capital = 500
	bulgarian = "Sofia"
	serbian = "Sofia"
	croatian = "Sofia"
	russian = "Sofia"
	polish = "Sofia"
	gain_effect = {
		primary_title = { copy_title_laws = c_serdica }
		
		IF = {
			limit = {
				d_serdica = { is_titular = yes }
			}
			character_event = { 
		id = nivve.0 tooltip = "Kingdom of Europa becomes the de jure liege of d_serdica" 
				}
			}
		any_demesne_title = {
			limit = {
				tier = COUNT
				location = { 
					AND = {
						has_province_modifier = no_liege
						OR = {
							is_primary_holder_title = yes
							any_neighbor_province = {
								owner = { character = ROOT }
							}
						}
					}
				}
				OR = {
					d_serdica = { is_titular = yes }
					FROM = { has_character_flag = creating_title_loop }
				}
			}
			de_jure_liege = d_serdica
			hidden_tooltip = {
				location = {
					add_province_modifier = {
						name = d_serdica_de_jure_liege
						duration = -1
					}
					remove_province_modifier = no_liege
				}
			}
			hidden_tooltip = { FROM = {	set_character_flag = creating_title_loop } }
		}
		hidden_tooltip = { clr_character_flag = creating_title_loop }

	}
	allow = {
		OR = {
			AND = {
			
				primary_title = { title = c_serdica }
				primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = no_liege } }
				OR = {
					AND = {
						num_of_count_titles = 3
						NOT = { num_of_count_titles = 6 }
					}
					primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = isolated } }
				}
			}
			d_serdica = {
				is_titular = no
			}
		}

	}
}

					FROM = { has_character_flag = creating_title_loop }
				}
			}
			de_jure_liege = k_constantia
			hidden_tooltip = { FROM = {	set_character_flag = creating_title_loop } }
		}
		hidden_tooltip = { clr_character_flag = creating_title_loop }

	}
	allow = {
		OR = {
			AND = {
			
				primary_title = { title = d_constantia }
				num_of_duke_titles = 3
			}
			k_constantia = {
				is_titular = no
			}
		}

	}
}

d_rashka = {
	color = { 172 139 61 }
	color2 = { 255 255 255 }
	capital = 502
	greek = "Rascia"
	gain_effect = {
		primary_title = { copy_title_laws = c_rashka }
		
		IF = {
			limit = {
				d_rashka = { is_titular = yes }
			}
			character_event = { 
		id = nivve.0 tooltip = "Kingdom of Europa becomes the de jure liege of d_rashka" 
				}
			}
		any_demesne_title = {
			limit = {
				tier = COUNT
				location = { 
					AND = {
						has_province_modifier = no_liege
						OR = {
							is_primary_holder_title = yes
							any_neighbor_province = {
								owner = { character = ROOT }
							}
						}
					}
				}
				OR = {
					d_rashka = { is_titular = yes }
					FROM = { has_character_flag = creating_title_loop }
				}
			}
			de_jure_liege = d_rashka
			hidden_tooltip = {
				location = {
					add_province_modifier = {
						name = d_rashka_de_jure_liege
						duration = -1
					}
					remove_province_modifier = no_liege
				}
			}
			hidden_tooltip = { FROM = {	set_character_flag = creating_title_loop } }
		}
		hidden_tooltip = { clr_character_flag = creating_title_loop }

	}
	allow = {
		OR = {
			AND = {
			
				primary_title = { title = c_rashka }
				primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = no_liege } }
				OR = {
					AND = {
						num_of_count_titles = 3
						NOT = { num_of_count_titles = 6 }
					}
					primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = isolated } }
				}
			}
			d_rashka = {
				is_titular = no
			}
		}

	}
}

			de_jure_liege = k_krizevci
			hidden_tooltip = { FROM = {	set_character_flag = creating_title_loop } }
		}
		hidden_tooltip = { clr_character_flag = creating_title_loop }

	}
	allow = {
		OR = {
			AND = {
			
				primary_title = { title = d_krizevci }
				num_of_duke_titles = 3
			}
			k_krizevci = {
				is_titular = no
			}
		}

	}
}

d_zagreb = {
	color = { 189 141 141 }
	color2 = { 255 255 255 }
	capital = 461
	gain_effect = {
		primary_title = { copy_title_laws = c_zagreb }
		
		IF = {
			limit = {
				d_zagreb = { is_titular = yes }
			}
			character_event = { 
		id = nivve.0 tooltip = "Kingdom of Europa becomes the de jure liege of d_zagreb" 
				}
			}
		any_demesne_title = {
			limit = {
				tier = COUNT
				location = { 
					AND = {
						has_province_modifier = no_liege
						OR = {
							is_primary_holder_title = yes
							any_neighbor_province = {
								owner = { character = ROOT }
							}
						}
					}
				}
				OR = {
					d_zagreb = { is_titular = yes }
					FROM = { has_character_flag = creating_title_loop }
				}
			}
			de_jure_liege = d_zagreb
			hidden_tooltip = {
				location = {
					add_province_modifier = {
						name = d_zagreb_de_jure_liege
						duration = -1
					}
					remove_province_modifier = no_liege
				}
			}
			hidden_tooltip = { FROM = {	set_character_flag = creating_title_loop } }
		}
		hidden_tooltip = { clr_character_flag = creating_title_loop }

	}
	allow = {
		OR = {
			AND = {
			
				primary_title = { title = c_zagreb }
				primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = no_liege } }
				OR = {
					AND = {
						num_of_count_titles = 3
						NOT = { num_of_count_titles = 6 }
					}
					primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = isolated } }
				}
			}
			d_zagreb = {
				is_titular = no
			}
		}

	}
}

		}

d_veglia = {
	color = { 174 65 65 }
	color2 = { 255 255 255 }
	capital = 459
	greek = "Kyrikon"
	german = "Vegl"
	gain_effect = {
		primary_title = { copy_title_laws = c_veglia }
		
		IF = {
			limit = {
				d_veglia = { is_titular = yes }
			}
			character_event = { 
		id = nivve.0 tooltip = "Kingdom of Europa becomes the de jure liege of d_veglia" 
				}
			}
		any_demesne_title = {
			limit = {
				tier = COUNT
				location = { 
					AND = {
						has_province_modifier = no_liege
						OR = {
							is_primary_holder_title = yes
							any_neighbor_province = {
								owner = { character = ROOT }
							}
						}
					}
				}
				OR = {
					d_veglia = { is_titular = yes }
					FROM = { has_character_flag = creating_title_loop }
				}
			}
			de_jure_liege = d_veglia
			hidden_tooltip = {
				location = {
					add_province_modifier = {
						name = d_veglia_de_jure_liege
						duration = -1
					}
					remove_province_modifier = no_liege
				}
			}
			hidden_tooltip = { FROM = {	set_character_flag = creating_title_loop } }
		}
		hidden_tooltip = { clr_character_flag = creating_title_loop }

	}
	allow = {
		OR = {
			AND = {
			
				primary_title = { title = c_veglia }
				primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = no_liege } }
				OR = {
					AND = {
						num_of_count_titles = 3
						NOT = { num_of_count_titles = 6 }
					}
					primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = isolated } }
				}
			}
			d_veglia = {
				is_titular = no
			}
		}

e_capua = {
	color = { 186 202 251 }
	color2 = { 255 255 255 }
	capital = 851
	short_name = yes
	greek = "Gaeta"
	gain_effect = {
		primary_title = { copy_title_laws = k_capua }
		
		any_demesne_title = {
			limit = {
				title = k_capua
				OR = {
					e_capua = { is_titular = yes }
					FROM = { has_character_flag = creating_title_loop }
				}
			}
			de_jure_liege = e_capua
			hidden_tooltip = { FROM = {	set_character_flag = creating_title_loop } }
		}
		hidden_tooltip = { clr_character_flag = creating_title_loop }

	}
	allow = {
		OR = {
			AND = {
			
				primary_title = { title = k_capua }
				num_of_king_titles = 3
			}
			e_capua = {
				is_titular = no
			}
		}

	}
}

d_napoli = {
	color = { 207 206 251 }
	color2 = { 255 255 255 }
	capital = 334
	greek = "Neapolis"
	gain_effect = {
		primary_title = { copy_title_laws = c_napoli }
		
		IF = {
			limit = {
				d_napoli = { is_titular = yes }
			}
			character_event = { 
		id = nivve.0 tooltip = "Kingdom of Europa becomes the de jure liege of d_napoli" 
				}
			}
		any_demesne_title = {
			limit = {
				tier = COUNT
				location = { 
					AND = {
						has_province_modifier = no_liege
						OR = {
							is_primary_holder_title = yes
							any_neighbor_province = {
								owner = { character = ROOT }
							}
						}
					}
				}
				OR = {
					d_napoli = { is_titular = yes }
					FROM = { has_character_flag = creating_title_loop }
				}
			}
			de_jure_liege = d_napoli
			hidden_tooltip = {
				location = {
					add_province_modifier = {
						name = d_napoli_de_jure_liege
						duration = -1
					}
					remove_province_modifier = no_liege
				}
			}
			hidden_tooltip = { FROM = {	set_character_flag = creating_title_loop } }
		}
		hidden_tooltip = { clr_character_flag = creating_title_loop }

	}
	allow = {
		OR = {
			AND = {
			
				primary_title = { title = c_napoli }
				primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = no_liege } }
				OR = {
					AND = {
						num_of_count_titles = 3
						NOT = { num_of_count_titles = 6 }
					}
					primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = isolated } }
				}
			}
			d_napoli = {
				is_titular = no
			}
		}

	}
}

k_napoli = {
	color = { 207 206 251 }
	color2 = { 255 255 255 }
	capital = 334
	greek = "Neapolis"
	gain_effect = {
		primary_title = { copy_title_laws = d_napoli }
		
		any_demesne_title = {
			limit = {
				title = d_napoli
				OR = {
					k_napoli = { is_titular = yes }
					FROM = { has_character_flag = creating_title_loop }
				}
			}
			de_jure_liege = k_napoli
			hidden_tooltip = { FROM = {	set_character_flag = creating_title_loop } }
		}
		hidden_tooltip = { clr_character_flag = creating_title_loop }

	}
	allow = {
		OR = {
			AND = {
			
				primary_title = { title = d_napoli }
				num_of_duke_titles = 3
			}
			k_napoli = {
				is_titular = no
			}
		}

	}
}

					FROM = { has_character_flag = creating_title_loop }
				}
			}
			de_jure_liege = e_taranto
			hidden_tooltip = { FROM = {	set_character_flag = creating_title_loop } }
		}
		hidden_tooltip = { clr_character_flag = creating_title_loop }

	}
	allow = {
		OR = {
			AND = {
			
				primary_title = { title = k_taranto }
				num_of_king_titles = 3
			}
			e_taranto = {
				is_titular = no
			}
		}

	}
}

d_amalfi = {
	color = { 120 200 225 }
	color2 = { 255 255 255 }
	capital = 935
	gain_effect = {
		primary_title = { copy_title_laws = c_amalfi }
		
		IF = {
			limit = {
				d_amalfi = { is_titular = yes }
			}
			character_event = { 
		id = nivve.0 tooltip = "Kingdom of Europa becomes the de jure liege of d_amalfi" 
				}
			}
		any_demesne_title = {
			limit = {
				tier = COUNT
				location = { 
					AND = {
						has_province_modifier = no_liege
						OR = {
							is_primary_holder_title = yes
							any_neighbor_province = {
								owner = { character = ROOT }
							}
						}
					}
				}
				OR = {
					d_amalfi = { is_titular = yes }
					FROM = { has_character_flag = creating_title_loop }
				}
			}
			de_jure_liege = d_amalfi
			hidden_tooltip = {
				location = {
					add_province_modifier = {
						name = d_amalfi_de_jure_liege
						duration = -1
					}
					remove_province_modifier = no_liege
				}
			}
			hidden_tooltip = { FROM = {	set_character_flag = creating_title_loop } }
		}
		hidden_tooltip = { clr_character_flag = creating_title_loop }

	}
	allow = {
		OR = {
			AND = {
			
				primary_title = { title = c_amalfi }
				primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = no_liege } }
				OR = {
					AND = {
						num_of_count_titles = 3
						NOT = { num_of_count_titles = 6 }
					}
					primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = isolated } }
				}
			}
			d_amalfi = {
				is_titular = no
			}
		}

	}
}

e_siracusa = {
	color = { 150 231 143 }
	color2 = { 255 255 255 }
	capital = 343
	short_name = yes
	greek = "Syrakousa"
	gain_effect = {
		primary_title = { copy_title_laws = k_siracusa }
		
		any_demesne_title = {
			limit = {
				title = k_siracusa
				OR = {
					e_siracusa = { is_titular = yes }
					FROM = { has_character_flag = creating_title_loop }
				}
			}
			de_jure_liege = e_siracusa
			hidden_tooltip = { FROM = {	set_character_flag = creating_title_loop } }
		}
		hidden_tooltip = { clr_character_flag = creating_title_loop }

	}
	allow = {
		OR = {
			AND = {
			
				primary_title = { title = k_siracusa }
				num_of_king_titles = 3
			}
			e_siracusa = {
				is_titular = no
			}
		}

	}
}

d_agrigento = {
	color = { 251 234 253 }
	color2 = { 255 255 255 }
	capital = 342
	greek = "Agrigenton"
	andalusian_arabic = "Kerkent"
	maghreb_arabic = "Kerkent"
	bedouin_arabic = "Kerkent"
	egyptian_arabic = "Kerkent"
	levantine_arabic = "Kerkent"
	gain_effect = {
		primary_title = { copy_title_laws = c_agrigento }
		
		IF = {
			limit = {
				d_agrigento = { is_titular = yes }
			}
			character_event = { 
		id = nivve.0 tooltip = "Kingdom of Europa becomes the de jure liege of d_agrigento" 
				}
			}
		any_demesne_title = {
			limit = {
				tier = COUNT
				location = { 
					AND = {
						has_province_modifier = no_liege
						OR = {
							is_primary_holder_title = yes
							any_neighbor_province = {
								owner = { character = ROOT }
							}
						}
					}
				}
				OR = {
					d_agrigento = { is_titular = yes }
					FROM = { has_character_flag = creating_title_loop }
				}
			}
			de_jure_liege = d_agrigento
			hidden_tooltip = {
				location = {
					add_province_modifier = {
						name = d_agrigento_de_jure_liege
						duration = -1
					}
					remove_province_modifier = no_liege
				}
			}
			hidden_tooltip = { FROM = {	set_character_flag = creating_title_loop } }
		}
		hidden_tooltip = { clr_character_flag = creating_title_loop }

	}
	allow = {
		OR = {
			AND = {
			
				primary_title = { title = c_agrigento }
				primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = no_liege } }
				OR = {
					AND = {
						num_of_count_titles = 3
						NOT = { num_of_count_titles = 6 }
					}
					primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = isolated } }
				}
			}
			d_agrigento = {
				is_titular = no
			}
		}

	}
}

k_agrigento = {
	color = { 251 234 253 }
	color2 = { 255 255 255 }

	}
	allow = {
		OR = {
			AND = {
			
				primary_title = { title = d_agrigento }
				num_of_duke_titles = 3
			}
			k_agrigento = {
				is_titular = no
			}
		}

	}

	color = { 150 237 120 }
	color2 = { 255 255 255 }
	capital = 341
	greek = "Drepanon"
	andalusian_arabic = "Mazar"
	maghreb_arabic = "Mazar"
	bedouin_arabic = "Mazar"
	egyptian_arabic = "Mazar"
	levantine_arabic = "Mazar"
	gain_effect = {
		primary_title = { copy_title_laws = c_trapani }
		
		IF = {
			limit = {
				d_trapani = { is_titular = yes }
			}
			character_event = { 
		id = nivve.0 tooltip = "Kingdom of Europa becomes the de jure liege of d_trapani" 
				}
			}
		any_demesne_title = {
			limit = {
				tier = COUNT
				location = { 
					AND = {
						has_province_modifier = no_liege
						OR = {
							is_primary_holder_title = yes
							any_neighbor_province = {
								owner = { character = ROOT }
							}
						}
					}
				}
				OR = {
					d_trapani = { is_titular = yes }
					FROM = { has_character_flag = creating_title_loop }
				}
			}
			de_jure_liege = d_trapani
			hidden_tooltip = {
				location = {
					add_province_modifier = {
						name = d_trapani_de_jure_liege
						duration = -1
					}
					remove_province_modifier = no_liege
				}
			}
			hidden_tooltip = { FROM = {	set_character_flag = creating_title_loop } }
		}
		hidden_tooltip = { clr_character_flag = creating_title_loop }

	}
	allow = {
		OR = {
			AND = {
			
				primary_title = { title = c_trapani }
				primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = no_liege } }
				OR = {
					AND = {
						num_of_count_titles = 3
						NOT = { num_of_count_titles = 6 }
					}
					primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = isolated } }
				}
			}
			d_trapani = {
				is_titular = no
			}
		}

	}

			}

				is_titular = no
			}
		}

	}
}

k_guria = {
	color = { 240 185 185 }
	color2 = { 255 255 255 }
	capital = 677
	greek = "Lazike"
	turkish = "Batum"
	armenian = "Yeger"
	gain_effect = {
		primary_title = { copy_title_laws = d_guria }
		
		any_demesne_title = {
			limit = {
				title = d_guria
				OR = {
					k_guria = { is_titular = yes }
					FROM = { has_character_flag = creating_title_loop }
				}
			}
			de_jure_liege = k_guria

		}

				num_of_duke_titles = 3
			}

d_kakheti = {
	color = { 202 147 147 }
	color2 = { 255 255 255 }
	capital = 676
	gain_effect = {
		primary_title = { copy_title_laws = c_kakheti }
		
		IF = {
			limit = {
				d_kakheti = { is_titular = yes }
			}
			character_event = { 
		id = nivve.0 tooltip = "Kingdom of Europa becomes the de jure liege of d_kakheti" 
				}
			}
		any_demesne_title = {
			limit = {
				tier = COUNT
				location = { 
					AND = {
						has_province_modifier = no_liege
						OR = {
							is_primary_holder_title = yes
							any_neighbor_province = {
								owner = { character = ROOT }
							}
						}
					}
				}
				OR = {
					d_kakheti = { is_titular = yes }
					FROM = { has_character_flag = creating_title_loop }
				}
			}
			de_jure_liege = d_kakheti
			hidden_tooltip = {
				location = {
					add_province_modifier = {
						name = d_kakheti_de_jure_liege
						duration = -1
					}
					remove_province_modifier = no_liege
				}
			}
			hidden_tooltip = { FROM = {	set_character_flag = creating_title_loop } }
		}
		hidden_tooltip = { clr_character_flag = creating_title_loop }

	}
	allow = {
		OR = {
			AND = {
			
				primary_title = { title = c_kakheti }
				primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = no_liege } }
				OR = {
					AND = {
						num_of_count_titles = 3
						NOT = { num_of_count_titles = 6 }
					}
					primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = isolated } }
				}
			}
			d_kakheti = {
				is_titular = no
			}
		}

	}
}

	capital = 600
	gain_effect = {
		primary_title = { copy_title_laws = d_abkhazia }
		
		any_demesne_title = {
			limit = {
				title = d_abkhazia
				OR = {
					k_abkhazia = { is_titular = yes }
					FROM = { has_character_flag = creating_title_loop }
				}
			}
			de_jure_liege = k_abkhazia
			hidden_tooltip = { FROM = {	set_character_flag = creating_title_loop } }
		}
		hidden_tooltip = { clr_character_flag = creating_title_loop }

	}
	allow = {
		OR = {
			AND = {
			
				primary_title = { title = d_abkhazia }
				num_of_duke_titles = 3
			}
			k_abkhazia = {
				is_titular = no
			}
		}

	}
}

e_abkhazia = {
	color = { 254 160 160 }
	color2 = { 255 255 255 }
	capital = 600
	short_name = yes
	gain_effect = {
		primary_title = { copy_title_laws = k_abkhazia }
		
		any_demesne_title = {
			limit = {
				title = k_abkhazia
				OR = {
					e_abkhazia = { is_titular = yes }
					FROM = { has_character_flag = creating_title_loop }
				}
			}
			de_jure_liege = e_abkhazia
			hidden_tooltip = { FROM = {	set_character_flag = creating_title_loop } }
		}
		hidden_tooltip = { clr_character_flag = creating_title_loop }

	}
	allow = {
		OR = {
			AND = {
			
				primary_title = { title = k_abkhazia }
				num_of_king_titles = 3
			}
			e_abkhazia = {
				is_titular = no
			}
		}

	}
}

d_venezia = {
	color = { 40 143 132 }
	color2 = { 255 255 255 }
	capital = 356
	gain_effect = {
		primary_title = { copy_title_laws = c_venezia }
		
		IF = {
			limit = {
				d_venezia = { is_titular = yes }
			}
			character_event = { 
		id = nivve.0 tooltip = "Kingdom of Europa becomes the de jure liege of d_venezia" 
				}
			}
		any_demesne_title = {
			limit = {
				tier = COUNT
				location = { 
					AND = {
						has_province_modifier = no_liege
						OR = {
							is_primary_holder_title = yes
							any_neighbor_province = {
								owner = { character = ROOT }
							}
						}
					}
				}
				OR = {
					d_venezia = { is_titular = yes }
					FROM = { has_character_flag = creating_title_loop }
				}
			}
			de_jure_liege = d_venezia
			hidden_tooltip = {
				location = {
					add_province_modifier = {
						name = d_venezia_de_jure_liege
						duration = -1
					}
					remove_province_modifier = no_liege
				}
			}
			hidden_tooltip = { FROM = {	set_character_flag = creating_title_loop } }
		}
		hidden_tooltip = { clr_character_flag = creating_title_loop }

	}
	allow = {
		OR = {
			AND = {
			
				primary_title = { title = c_venezia }
				primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = no_liege } }
				OR = {
					AND = {
						num_of_count_titles = 3
						NOT = { num_of_count_titles = 6 }
					}
					primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = isolated } }
				}
			}
			d_venezia = {
				is_titular = no
			}
		}

	}
}

k_venezia = {
	color = { 40 143 132 }
	color2 = { 255 255 255 }
	capital = 356
	gain_effect = {
		primary_title = { copy_title_laws = d_venezia }

			}
		}

	}
