d_saluzzo = {
	color = { 155 46 76 }
	color2 = { 255 255 255 }
	capital = 231
	gain_effect = {
		primary_title = { copy_title_laws = c_saluzzo }
		
		IF = {
			limit = {
				d_saluzzo = { is_titular = yes }
			}
			character_event = { 
		id = nivve.0 tooltip = "Kingdom of Europa becomes the de jure liege of d_saluzzo" 
				}
			}
		any_demesne_title = {
			limit = {
				tier = COUNT
				location = { 
					AND = {
						has_province_modifier = no_liege
						OR = {
							is_primary_holder_title = yes
							any_neighbor_province = {
								owner = { character = ROOT }
							}
						}
					}
				}
				OR = {
					d_saluzzo = { is_titular = yes }
					FROM = { has_character_flag = creating_title_loop }
				}
			}
			de_jure_liege = d_saluzzo
			hidden_tooltip = {
				location = {
					add_province_modifier = {
						name = d_saluzzo_de_jure_liege
						duration = -1
					}
					remove_province_modifier = no_liege
				}
			}
			hidden_tooltip = { FROM = {	set_character_flag = creating_title_loop } }
		}
		hidden_tooltip = { clr_character_flag = creating_title_loop }

	}
	allow = {
		OR = {
			AND = {
			
				primary_title = { title = c_saluzzo }
				primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = no_liege } }
				OR = {
					AND = {
						num_of_count_titles = 3
						NOT = { num_of_count_titles = 6 }
					}
					primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = isolated } }
				}
			}
			d_saluzzo = {
				is_titular = no
			}
		}

	}
}

		}
		hidden_tooltip = { clr_character_flag = creating_title_loop }

	}
	allow = {
		OR = {
			AND = {
			
				primary_title = { title = k_pavia }
				num_of_king_titles = 3
			}
			e_pavia = {
				is_titular = no
			}
		}

	}
}

d_cremona = {
	color = { 255 245 234 }
	color2 = { 255 255 255 }
	capital = 320
	gain_effect = {
		primary_title = { copy_title_laws = c_cremona }
		
		IF = {
			limit = {
				d_cremona = { is_titular = yes }
			}
			character_event = { 
		id = nivve.0 tooltip = "Kingdom of Europa becomes the de jure liege of d_cremona" 
				}
			}
		any_demesne_title = {
			limit = {
				tier = COUNT
				location = { 
					AND = {
						has_province_modifier = no_liege
						OR = {
							is_primary_holder_title = yes
							any_neighbor_province = {
								owner = { character = ROOT }
							}
						}
					}
				}
				OR = {
					d_cremona = { is_titular = yes }
					FROM = { has_character_flag = creating_title_loop }
				}
			}
			de_jure_liege = d_cremona
			hidden_tooltip = {
				location = {
					add_province_modifier = {
						name = d_cremona_de_jure_liege
						duration = -1
					}
					remove_province_modifier = no_liege
				}
			}
			hidden_tooltip = { FROM = {	set_character_flag = creating_title_loop } }
		}
		hidden_tooltip = { clr_character_flag = creating_title_loop }

	}
	allow = {
		OR = {
			AND = {
			
				primary_title = { title = c_cremona }
				primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = no_liege } }
				OR = {
					AND = {
						num_of_count_titles = 3
						NOT = { num_of_count_titles = 6 }
					}
					primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = isolated } }
				}
			}
			d_cremona = {
				is_titular = no
			}
		}

	}
}

			character_event = { 
		id = nivve.0 tooltip = "Kingdom of Europa becomes the de jure liege of d_ravenna" 
				}
			}
		any_demesne_title = {
			limit = {
				tier = COUNT
				location = { 
					AND = {
						has_province_modifier = no_liege
						OR = {
							is_primary_holder_title = yes
							any_neighbor_province = {
								owner = { character = ROOT }
							}
						}
					}
				}
				OR = {
					d_ravenna = { is_titular = yes }
					FROM = { has_character_flag = creating_title_loop }
				}
			}
			de_jure_liege = d_ravenna
			hidden_tooltip = {
				location = {
					add_province_modifier = {
						name = d_ravenna_de_jure_liege
						duration = -1
					}
					remove_province_modifier = no_liege
				}
			}
			hidden_tooltip = { FROM = {	set_character_flag = creating_title_loop } }
		}
		hidden_tooltip = { clr_character_flag = creating_title_loop }

	}
	allow = {
		OR = {
			AND = {
			
				primary_title = { title = c_ravenna }
				primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = no_liege } }
				OR = {
					AND = {
						num_of_count_titles = 3
						NOT = { num_of_count_titles = 6 }
					}
					primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = isolated } }
				}
			}
			d_ravenna = {
				is_titular = no
			}
		}

	}
}

			de_jure_liege = d_ancona
			hidden_tooltip = {
				location = {
					add_province_modifier = {
						name = d_ancona_de_jure_liege
						duration = -1
					}
					remove_province_modifier = no_liege
				}
			}
			hidden_tooltip = { FROM = {	set_character_flag = creating_title_loop } }
		}
		hidden_tooltip = { clr_character_flag = creating_title_loop }

	}
	allow = {
		OR = {
			AND = {
			
				primary_title = { title = c_ancona }
				primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = no_liege } }
				OR = {
					AND = {
						num_of_count_titles = 3
						NOT = { num_of_count_titles = 6 }
					}
					primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = isolated } }
				}
			}
			d_ancona = {
				is_titular = no
			}
		}

	}
}

d_urbino = {
	color = { 226 251 226 }
	color2 = { 255 255 255 }
	capital = 329
	gain_effect = {
		primary_title = { copy_title_laws = c_urbino }
		
		IF = {
			limit = {
				d_urbino = { is_titular = yes }
			}
			character_event = { 
		id = nivve.0 tooltip = "Kingdom of Europa becomes the de jure liege of d_urbino" 
				}
			}
		any_demesne_title = {
			limit = {
				tier = COUNT
				location = { 
					AND = {
						has_province_modifier = no_liege
						OR = {
							is_primary_holder_title = yes
							any_neighbor_province = {
								owner = { character = ROOT }
							}
						}
					}
				}
				OR = {
					d_urbino = { is_titular = yes }
					FROM = { has_character_flag = creating_title_loop }
				}
			}
			de_jure_liege = d_urbino
			hidden_tooltip = {
				location = {
					add_province_modifier = {
						name = d_urbino_de_jure_liege
						duration = -1
					}
					remove_province_modifier = no_liege
				}
			}
			hidden_tooltip = { FROM = {	set_character_flag = creating_title_loop } }
		}
		hidden_tooltip = { clr_character_flag = creating_title_loop }

	}
	allow = {
		OR = {
			AND = {
			
				primary_title = { title = c_urbino }
				primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = no_liege } }
				OR = {
					AND = {
						num_of_count_titles = 3
						NOT = { num_of_count_titles = 6 }
					}
					primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = isolated } }
				}
			}
			d_urbino = {
				is_titular = no
			}
		}

	}

			AND = {
			
				primary_title = { title = c_orbetello }
				primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = no_liege } }
				OR = {
					AND = {
						num_of_count_titles = 3
						NOT = { num_of_count_titles = 6 }
					}
					primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = isolated } }
				}
			}
			d_orbetello = {
				is_titular = no
			}
		}

	}
}

k_orbetello = {
	color = { 240 255 234 }
	color2 = { 255 255 255 }
	capital = 332
	gain_effect = {
		primary_title = { copy_title_laws = d_orbetello }
		
		any_demesne_title = {
			limit = {
				title = d_orbetello
				OR = {
					k_orbetello = { is_titular = yes }
					FROM = { has_character_flag = creating_title_loop }
				}
			}
			de_jure_liege = k_orbetello
			hidden_tooltip = { FROM = {	set_character_flag = creating_title_loop } }
		}
		hidden_tooltip = { clr_character_flag = creating_title_loop }

	}
	allow = {
		OR = {
			AND = {
			
				primary_title = { title = d_orbetello }
				num_of_duke_titles = 3
			}
			k_orbetello = {
				is_titular = no
			}
		}

	}

d_corsica = {
	color = { 226 248 251 }
	color2 = { 255 255 255 }
	capital = 324
	gain_effect = {
		primary_title = { copy_title_laws = c_corsica }
		
		IF = {
			limit = {
				d_corsica = { is_titular = yes }
			}
			character_event = { 
		id = nivve.0 tooltip = "Kingdom of Europa becomes the de jure liege of d_corsica" 
				}
			}
		any_demesne_title = {
			limit = {
				tier = COUNT
				location = { 
					AND = {
						has_province_modifier = no_liege
						OR = {
							is_primary_holder_title = yes
							any_neighbor_province = {
								owner = { character = ROOT }
							}
						}
					}
				}
				OR = {
					d_corsica = { is_titular = yes }
					FROM = { has_character_flag = creating_title_loop }
				}
			}
			de_jure_liege = d_corsica
			hidden_tooltip = {
				location = {
					add_province_modifier = {
						name = d_corsica_de_jure_liege
						duration = -1
					}
					remove_province_modifier = no_liege
				}
			}
			hidden_tooltip = { FROM = {	set_character_flag = creating_title_loop } }
		}
		hidden_tooltip = { clr_character_flag = creating_title_loop }

	}
	allow = {
		OR = {
			AND = {
			
				primary_title = { title = c_corsica }
				primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = no_liege } }
				OR = {
					AND = {
						num_of_count_titles = 3
						NOT = { num_of_count_titles = 6 }
					}
					primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = isolated } }
				}
			}
			d_corsica = {
				is_titular = no
			}
		}

	}
}

k_aland = {
	color = { 140 20 215 }
	color2 = { 255 255 255 }
	capital = 291
	gain_effect = {
		primary_title = { copy_title_laws = d_aland }
		
		any_demesne_title = {
			limit = {
				title = d_aland
				OR = {
					k_aland = { is_titular = yes }
					FROM = { has_character_flag = creating_title_loop }
				}
			}
			de_jure_liege = k_aland
			hidden_tooltip = { FROM = {	set_character_flag = creating_title_loop } }
		}
		hidden_tooltip = { clr_character_flag = creating_title_loop }

	}
	allow = {
		OR = {
			AND = {
			
				primary_title = { title = d_aland }
				num_of_duke_titles = 3
			}
			k_aland = {
				is_titular = no
			}
		}

	}
}

	color = { 140 20 215 }
	color2 = { 255 255 255 }

				}

	}

		OR = {
			AND = {
			
				primary_title = { title = k_aland }
				num_of_king_titles = 3
			}
			e_aland = {
				is_titular = no
			}

d_sodermanland = {
	color = { 100 15 225 }
	color2 = { 255 255 255 }
	capital = 292
	norwegian = "Sdermanland"
	danish = "Sdermanland"
	norse = "Sudermanland"
	gain_effect = {
		primary_title = { copy_title_laws = c_sodermanland }
		
		IF = {
			limit = {
				d_sodermanland = { is_titular = yes }
			}
			character_event = { 
		id = nivve.0 tooltip = "Kingdom of Europa becomes the de jure liege of d_sodermanland" 
				}
			}
		any_demesne_title = {
			limit = {
				tier = COUNT
				location = { 
					AND = {
						has_province_modifier = no_liege
						OR = {
							is_primary_holder_title = yes
							any_neighbor_province = {
								owner = { character = ROOT }
							}
						}
					}
				}
				OR = {
					d_sodermanland = { is_titular = yes }
					FROM = { has_character_flag = creating_title_loop }
				}
			}
			de_jure_liege = d_sodermanland
			hidden_tooltip = {
				location = {
					add_province_modifier = {
						name = d_sodermanland_de_jure_liege
						duration = -1
					}
					remove_province_modifier = no_liege
				}
			}
			hidden_tooltip = { FROM = {	set_character_flag = creating_title_loop } }
		}
		hidden_tooltip = { clr_character_flag = creating_title_loop }

	}
	allow = {
		OR = {
			AND = {
			
				primary_title = { title = c_sodermanland }
				primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = no_liege } }
				OR = {
					AND = {
						num_of_count_titles = 3
						NOT = { num_of_count_titles = 6 }
					}
					primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = isolated } }
				}
			}
			d_sodermanland = {
				is_titular = no
			}
		}

	}
}

					AND = {
						num_of_count_titles = 3
						NOT = { num_of_count_titles = 6 }
					}
					primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = isolated } }
				}
			}
			d_vastergotland = {
				is_titular = no
			}
		}

	}
}

d_dal = {
	color = { 10 160 255 }
	color2 = { 255 255 255 }
	capital = 295
	gain_effect = {
		primary_title = { copy_title_laws = c_dal }
		
		IF = {
			limit = {
				d_dal = { is_titular = yes }
			}
			character_event = { 
		id = nivve.0 tooltip = "Kingdom of Europa becomes the de jure liege of d_dal" 
				}
			}
		any_demesne_title = {
			limit = {
				tier = COUNT
				location = { 
					AND = {
						has_province_modifier = no_liege
						OR = {
							is_primary_holder_title = yes
							any_neighbor_province = {
								owner = { character = ROOT }
							}
						}
					}
				}
				OR = {
					d_dal = { is_titular = yes }
					FROM = { has_character_flag = creating_title_loop }
				}
			}
			de_jure_liege = d_dal
			hidden_tooltip = {
				location = {
					add_province_modifier = {
						name = d_dal_de_jure_liege
						duration = -1
					}
					remove_province_modifier = no_liege
				}
			}
			hidden_tooltip = { FROM = {	set_character_flag = creating_title_loop } }
		}
		hidden_tooltip = { clr_character_flag = creating_title_loop }

	}
	allow = {
		OR = {
			AND = {
			
				primary_title = { title = c_dal }
				primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = no_liege } }
				OR = {
					AND = {
						num_of_count_titles = 3
						NOT = { num_of_count_titles = 6 }
					}
					primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = isolated } }
				}
			}
			d_dal = {
				is_titular = no
			}
		}

	}
}

						duration = -1

					remove_province_modifier = no_liege
				}
			}
			hidden_tooltip = { FROM = {	set_character_flag = creating_title_loop } }
		}
		hidden_tooltip = { clr_character_flag = creating_title_loop }

	}
	allow = {
		OR = {
			AND = {
			
				primary_title = { title = c_medelpad }
				primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = no_liege } }
				OR = {
					AND = {
						num_of_count_titles = 3
						NOT = { num_of_count_titles = 6 }
					}
					primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = isolated } }
				}
			}
			d_medelpad = {
				is_titular = no
			}
		}

	}
}

d_halsingland = {
	color = { 40 20 255 }
	color2 = { 255 255 255 }
	capital = 285
	norwegian = "Helsingland"
	danish = "Helsingland"
	norse = "Helsingland"
	gain_effect = {
		primary_title = { copy_title_laws = c_halsingland }
		
		IF = {
			limit = {
				d_halsingland = { is_titular = yes }
			}
			character_event = { 
		id = nivve.0 tooltip = "Kingdom of Europa becomes the de jure liege of d_halsingland" 
				}
			}
		any_demesne_title = {
			limit = {
				tier = COUNT
				location = { 
					AND = {
						has_province_modifier = no_liege
						OR = {
							is_primary_holder_title = yes
							any_neighbor_province = {
								owner = { character = ROOT }
							}
						}
					}
				}
				OR = {
					d_halsingland = { is_titular = yes }
					FROM = { has_character_flag = creating_title_loop }
				}
			}
			de_jure_liege = d_halsingland
			hidden_tooltip = {
				location = {
					add_province_modifier = {
						name = d_halsingland_de_jure_liege
						duration = -1
					}
					remove_province_modifier = no_liege
				}
			}
			hidden_tooltip = { FROM = {	set_character_flag = creating_title_loop } }
		}
		hidden_tooltip = { clr_character_flag = creating_title_loop }

	}
	allow = {
		OR = {
			AND = {
			
				primary_title = { title = c_halsingland }
				primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = no_liege } }
				OR = {
					AND = {
						num_of_count_titles = 3
						NOT = { num_of_count_titles = 6 }
					}
					primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = isolated } }
				}
			}
			d_halsingland = {
				is_titular = no
			}
		}

	}
}

	color = { 100 5 255 }
	color2 = { 255 255 255 }
	capital = 287
	english = "Dalecarlia"
	norse = "Jrnberaland"
	norwegian = "Jernbraland"
	danish = "Jernbraland"
	gain_effect = {
		primary_title = { copy_title_laws = c_dalarna }
		
		IF = {
			limit = {
				d_dalarna = { is_titular = yes }
			}
			character_event = { 
		id = nivve.0 tooltip = "Kingdom of Europa becomes the de jure liege of d_dalarna" 
				}
			}
		any_demesne_title = {
			limit = {
				tier = COUNT
				location = { 
					AND = {
						has_province_modifier = no_liege
						OR = {
							is_primary_holder_title = yes
							any_neighbor_province = {
								owner = { character = ROOT }
							}
						}
					}
				}
				OR = {
					d_dalarna = { is_titular = yes }
					FROM = { has_character_flag = creating_title_loop }
				}
			}
			de_jure_liege = d_dalarna
			hidden_tooltip = {
				location = {
					add_province_modifier = {
						name = d_dalarna_de_jure_liege
						duration = -1
					}
					remove_province_modifier = no_liege
				}
			}
			hidden_tooltip = { FROM = {	set_character_flag = creating_title_loop } }
		}
		hidden_tooltip = { clr_character_flag = creating_title_loop }

	}

				primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = no_liege } }
				OR = {

				}
			}
		any_demesne_title = {
			limit = {
				tier = COUNT
				location = { 
					AND = {
						has_province_modifier = no_liege
						OR = {
							is_primary_holder_title = yes
							any_neighbor_province = {
								owner = { character = ROOT }
							}
						}
					}
				}
				OR = {
					d_more = { is_titular = yes }
					FROM = { has_character_flag = creating_title_loop }
				}
			}
			de_jure_liege = d_more
			hidden_tooltip = {
				location = {
					add_province_modifier = {
						name = d_more_de_jure_liege
						duration = -1
					}
					remove_province_modifier = no_liege
				}
			}
			hidden_tooltip = { FROM = {	set_character_flag = creating_title_loop } }
		}
		hidden_tooltip = { clr_character_flag = creating_title_loop }

	}
	allow = {
		OR = {
			AND = {
			
				primary_title = { title = c_more }
				primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = no_liege } }
				OR = {
					AND = {
						num_of_count_titles = 3
						NOT = { num_of_count_titles = 6 }
					}
					primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = isolated } }
				}
			}
			d_more = {
				is_titular = no
			}
		}

	}
}

				}
				OR = {
					d_sjaelland = { is_titular = yes }
					FROM = { has_character_flag = creating_title_loop }
				}
			}
			de_jure_liege = d_sjaelland
			hidden_tooltip = {
				location = {
					add_province_modifier = {
						name = d_sjaelland_de_jure_liege
						duration = -1
					}
					remove_province_modifier = no_liege
				}
			}
			hidden_tooltip = { FROM = {	set_character_flag = creating_title_loop } }
		}
		hidden_tooltip = { clr_character_flag = creating_title_loop }

	}
	allow = {
		OR = {
			AND = {
			
				primary_title = { title = c_sjaelland }
				primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = no_liege } }
				OR = {
					AND = {
						num_of_count_titles = 3
						NOT = { num_of_count_titles = 6 }
					}
					primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = isolated } }
				}
			}
			d_sjaelland = {
				is_titular = no
			}
		}

	}
}

d_fyn = {
	color = { 216 55 55 }
	color2 = { 255 255 255 }
	capital = 265
	gain_effect = {
		primary_title = { copy_title_laws = c_fyn }
		
		IF = {
			limit = {
				d_fyn = { is_titular = yes }
			}
			character_event = { 
		id = nivve.0 tooltip = "Kingdom of Europa becomes the de jure liege of d_fyn" 
				}
			}
		any_demesne_title = {
			limit = {
				tier = COUNT
				location = { 
					AND = {
						has_province_modifier = no_liege
						OR = {
							is_primary_holder_title = yes
							any_neighbor_province = {
								owner = { character = ROOT }
							}
						}
					}
				}
				OR = {
					d_fyn = { is_titular = yes }
					FROM = { has_character_flag = creating_title_loop }
				}
			}
			de_jure_liege = d_fyn
			hidden_tooltip = {
				location = {
					add_province_modifier = {
						name = d_fyn_de_jure_liege
						duration = -1
					}
					remove_province_modifier = no_liege
				}
			}
			hidden_tooltip = { FROM = {	set_character_flag = creating_title_loop } }
		}
		hidden_tooltip = { clr_character_flag = creating_title_loop }

	}
	allow = {
		OR = {
			AND = {
			
				primary_title = { title = c_fyn }
				primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = no_liege } }
				OR = {
					AND = {
						num_of_count_titles = 3
						NOT = { num_of_count_titles = 6 }
					}
					primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = isolated } }
				}
			}
			d_fyn = {
				is_titular = no
			}
		}

	}
}

		hidden_tooltip = { clr_character_flag = creating_title_loop }

	}
	allow = {
		OR = {
			AND = {
			
				primary_title = { title = k_lubeck }
				num_of_king_titles = 3
			}
			e_lubeck = {
				is_titular = no
			}
		}

	}
}

d_holstein = {
	color = { 219 219 219 }
	color2 = { 255 255 255 }
	capital = 263
	danish = "Holsten"
	swedish = "Holsten"
	norwegian = "Holsten"
	gain_effect = {
		primary_title = { copy_title_laws = c_holstein }
		
		IF = {
			limit = {
				d_holstein = { is_titular = yes }
			}
			character_event = { 
		id = nivve.0 tooltip = "Kingdom of Europa becomes the de jure liege of d_holstein" 
				}
			}
		any_demesne_title = {
			limit = {
				tier = COUNT
				location = { 
					AND = {
						has_province_modifier = no_liege
						OR = {
							is_primary_holder_title = yes
							any_neighbor_province = {
								owner = { character = ROOT }
							}
						}
					}
				}
				OR = {
					d_holstein = { is_titular = yes }
					FROM = { has_character_flag = creating_title_loop }
				}
			}
			de_jure_liege = d_holstein
			hidden_tooltip = {
				location = {
					add_province_modifier = {
						name = d_holstein_de_jure_liege
						duration = -1
					}
					remove_province_modifier = no_liege
				}
			}
			hidden_tooltip = { FROM = {	set_character_flag = creating_title_loop } }
		}
		hidden_tooltip = { clr_character_flag = creating_title_loop }

	}
	allow = {
		OR = {
			AND = {
			
				primary_title = { title = c_holstein }
				primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = no_liege } }
				OR = {
					AND = {
						num_of_count_titles = 3
						NOT = { num_of_count_titles = 6 }
					}
					primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = isolated } }
				}
			}
			d_holstein = {
				is_titular = no
			}
		}

	}
}

	norwegian = "Hjaltland"
	danish = "Hjaltland"
	swedish = "Hjaltland"
	norse = "Hjaltland"
	gain_effect = {
		primary_title = { copy_title_laws = k_shetland }
		
		any_demesne_title = {
			limit = {
				title = k_shetland
				OR = {
					e_shetland = { is_titular = yes }
					FROM = { has_character_flag = creating_title_loop }
				}
			}
			de_jure_liege = e_shetland
			hidden_tooltip = { FROM = {	set_character_flag = creating_title_loop } }
		}
		hidden_tooltip = { clr_character_flag = creating_title_loop }

	}
	allow = {
		OR = {
			AND = {
			
				primary_title = { title = k_shetland }
				num_of_king_titles = 3
			}
			e_shetland = {
				is_titular = no
			}
		}

	}
}

d_orkney = {
	color = { 30 25 255 }
	color2 = { 255 255 255 }
	capital = 36
	swedish = "Orkn"
	danish = "Orkn"
	norse = "Orkn"
	gain_effect = {
		primary_title = { copy_title_laws = c_orkney }
		
		IF = {
			limit = {
				d_orkney = { is_titular = yes }
			}
			character_event = { 
		id = nivve.0 tooltip = "Kingdom of Europa becomes the de jure liege of d_orkney" 
				}
			}
		any_demesne_title = {
			limit = {
				tier = COUNT
				location = { 
					AND = {
						has_province_modifier = no_liege
						OR = {
							is_primary_holder_title = yes
							any_neighbor_province = {
								owner = { character = ROOT }
							}
						}
					}
				}
				OR = {
					d_orkney = { is_titular = yes }
					FROM = { has_character_flag = creating_title_loop }
				}
			}
			de_jure_liege = d_orkney
			hidden_tooltip = {
				location = {
					add_province_modifier = {
						name = d_orkney_de_jure_liege
						duration = -1
					}
					remove_province_modifier = no_liege
				}
			}
			hidden_tooltip = { FROM = {	set_character_flag = creating_title_loop } }
		}
		hidden_tooltip = { clr_character_flag = creating_title_loop }

	}
	allow = {
		OR = {
			AND = {
			
				primary_title = { title = c_orkney }
				primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = no_liege } }
				OR = {
					AND = {
						num_of_count_titles = 3
						NOT = { num_of_count_titles = 6 }
					}
					primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = isolated } }
				}
			}
			d_orkney = {
				is_titular = no
			}
		}

	}
}

k_orkney = {
	color = { 30 25 255 }
	color2 = { 255 255 255 }
	capital = 36
	swedish = "Orkn"
	danish = "Orkn"

				num_of_duke_titles = 3
			}

				is_titular = no
			}
		}

	}

		}
		hidden_tooltip = { clr_character_flag = creating_title_loop }

	}
	allow = {
		OR = {
			AND = {
			
				primary_title = { title = k_vestfold }
				num_of_king_titles = 3
			}
			e_vestfold = {
				is_titular = no
			}
		}

	}
}

d_akershus = {
	color = { 65 85 255 }
	color2 = { 255 255 255 }
	capital = 272
	gain_effect = {
		primary_title = { copy_title_laws = c_akershus }
		
		IF = {
			limit = {
				d_akershus = { is_titular = yes }
			}
			character_event = { 
		id = nivve.0 tooltip = "Kingdom of Europa becomes the de jure liege of d_akershus" 
				}
			}
		any_demesne_title = {
			limit = {
				tier = COUNT
				location = { 
					AND = {
						has_province_modifier = no_liege
						OR = {
							is_primary_holder_title = yes
							any_neighbor_province = {
								owner = { character = ROOT }
							}
						}
					}
				}
				OR = {
					d_akershus = { is_titular = yes }
					FROM = { has_character_flag = creating_title_loop }
				}
			}
			de_jure_liege = d_akershus
			hidden_tooltip = {
				location = {
					add_province_modifier = {
						name = d_akershus_de_jure_liege
						duration = -1
					}
					remove_province_modifier = no_liege
				}
			}
			hidden_tooltip = { FROM = {	set_character_flag = creating_title_loop } }
		}
		hidden_tooltip = { clr_character_flag = creating_title_loop }

	}
	allow = {
		OR = {
			AND = {
			
				primary_title = { title = c_akershus }
				primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = no_liege } }
				OR = {
					AND = {
						num_of_count_titles = 3
						NOT = { num_of_count_titles = 6 }
					}
					primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = isolated } }
				}
			}
			d_akershus = {
				is_titular = no
			}
		}

	}
}

			}
			e_halogaland = {
				is_titular = no
			}
		}

	}
}

d_finnmark = {
	color = { 174 161 110 }
	color2 = { 255 255 255 }
	capital = 389
	lappish = "Finnmrku"
	gain_effect = {
		primary_title = { copy_title_laws = c_finnmark }
		
		IF = {
			limit = {
				d_finnmark = { is_titular = yes }
			}
			character_event = { 
		id = nivve.0 tooltip = "Kingdom of Europa becomes the de jure liege of d_finnmark" 
				}
			}
		any_demesne_title = {
			limit = {
				tier = COUNT
				location = { 
					AND = {
						has_province_modifier = no_liege
						OR = {
							is_primary_holder_title = yes
							any_neighbor_province = {
								owner = { character = ROOT }
							}
						}
					}
				}
				OR = {
					d_finnmark = { is_titular = yes }
					FROM = { has_character_flag = creating_title_loop }
				}
			}
			de_jure_liege = d_finnmark
			hidden_tooltip = {
				location = {
					add_province_modifier = {
						name = d_finnmark_de_jure_liege
						duration = -1
					}
					remove_province_modifier = no_liege
				}
			}
			hidden_tooltip = { FROM = {	set_character_flag = creating_title_loop } }
		}
		hidden_tooltip = { clr_character_flag = creating_title_loop }

	}
	allow = {
		OR = {
			AND = {
			
				primary_title = { title = c_finnmark }
				primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = no_liege } }
				OR = {
					AND = {
						num_of_count_titles = 3
						NOT = { num_of_count_titles = 6 }
					}
					primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = isolated } }
				}
			}
			d_finnmark = {
				is_titular = no
			}
		}

	}
}

					e_narva = { is_titular = yes }
					FROM = { has_character_flag = creating_title_loop }
				}
			}
			de_jure_liege = e_narva
			hidden_tooltip = { FROM = {	set_character_flag = creating_title_loop } }
		}
		hidden_tooltip = { clr_character_flag = creating_title_loop }

	}
	allow = {
		OR = {
			AND = {
			
				primary_title = { title = k_narva }
				num_of_king_titles = 3
			}
			e_narva = {
				is_titular = no
			}
		}

	}
}

d_vodi = {
	color = { 113 0 0 }
	color2 = { 255 255 255 }
	capital = 411
	finnish = "Inkeri"
	russian = "Ingriya"
	gain_effect = {
		primary_title = { copy_title_laws = c_vodi }
		
		IF = {
			limit = {
				d_vodi = { is_titular = yes }
			}
			character_event = { 
		id = nivve.0 tooltip = "Kingdom of Europa becomes the de jure liege of d_vodi" 
				}
			}
		any_demesne_title = {
			limit = {
				tier = COUNT
				location = { 
					AND = {
						has_province_modifier = no_liege
						OR = {
							is_primary_holder_title = yes
							any_neighbor_province = {
								owner = { character = ROOT }
							}
						}
					}
				}
				OR = {
					d_vodi = { is_titular = yes }
					FROM = { has_character_flag = creating_title_loop }
				}
			}
			de_jure_liege = d_vodi
			hidden_tooltip = {
				location = {
					add_province_modifier = {
						name = d_vodi_de_jure_liege
						duration = -1
					}
					remove_province_modifier = no_liege
				}
			}
			hidden_tooltip = { FROM = {	set_character_flag = creating_title_loop } }
		}
		hidden_tooltip = { clr_character_flag = creating_title_loop }

	}
	allow = {
		OR = {
			AND = {
			
				primary_title = { title = c_vodi }
				primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = no_liege } }
				OR = {
					AND = {
						num_of_count_titles = 3
						NOT = { num_of_count_titles = 6 }
					}
					primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = isolated } }
				}
			}
			d_vodi = {
				is_titular = no
			}
		}

	}
}

	danish = "Kandalax"
	gain_effect = {
		primary_title = { copy_title_laws = d_kandalax }
		
		any_demesne_title = {
			limit = {
				title = d_kandalax
				OR = {
					k_kandalax = { is_titular = yes }
					FROM = { has_character_flag = creating_title_loop }
				}
			}
			de_jure_liege = k_kandalax
			hidden_tooltip = { FROM = {	set_character_flag = creating_title_loop } }
		}
		hidden_tooltip = { clr_character_flag = creating_title_loop }

	}
	allow = {
		OR = {
			AND = {
			
				primary_title = { title = d_kandalax }
				num_of_duke_titles = 3
			}
			k_kandalax = {
				is_titular = no
			}
		}

	}
}

e_kandalax = {
	color = { 135 60 60 }
	color2 = { 255 255 255 }
	capital = 850
	short_name = yes
	swedish = "Kandalax"
	norse = "Kandalax"
	norwegian = "Kandalax"
	danish = "Kandalax"
	gain_effect = {

					FROM = { has_character_flag = creating_title_loop }

			}

d_savolaks = {
	color = { 120 10 10 }
	color2 = { 255 255 255 }
	capital = 390
	swedish = "Savolax"
	norse = "Savolax"
	norwegian = "Savolax"
	danish = "Savolax"
	gain_effect = {
		primary_title = { copy_title_laws = c_savolaks }
		
		IF = {
			limit = {
				d_savolaks = { is_titular = yes }
			}
			character_event = { 
		id = nivve.0 tooltip = "Kingdom of Europa becomes the de jure liege of d_savolaks" 
				}
			}
		any_demesne_title = {
			limit = {
				tier = COUNT
				location = { 
					AND = {
						has_province_modifier = no_liege
						OR = {
							is_primary_holder_title = yes
							any_neighbor_province = {
								owner = { character = ROOT }
							}
						}
					}
				}
				OR = {
					d_savolaks = { is_titular = yes }
					FROM = { has_character_flag = creating_title_loop }
				}
			}
			de_jure_liege = d_savolaks
			hidden_tooltip = {
				location = {
					add_province_modifier = {
						name = d_savolaks_de_jure_liege
						duration = -1
					}
					remove_province_modifier = no_liege
				}
			}
			hidden_tooltip = { FROM = {	set_character_flag = creating_title_loop } }
		}
		hidden_tooltip = { clr_character_flag = creating_title_loop }

	}
	allow = {
		OR = {
			AND = {
			
				primary_title = { title = c_savolaks }
				primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = no_liege } }
				OR = {
					AND = {
						num_of_count_titles = 3
						NOT = { num_of_count_titles = 6 }
					}
					primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = isolated } }
				}
			}
			d_savolaks = {
				is_titular = no
			}
		}

	}
}

							any_neighbor_province = {
								owner = { character = ROOT }
							}
						}
					}
				}
				OR = {
					d_osterbotten = { is_titular = yes }
					FROM = { has_character_flag = creating_title_loop }
				}
			}
			de_jure_liege = d_osterbotten
			hidden_tooltip = {
				location = {
					add_province_modifier = {
						name = d_osterbotten_de_jure_liege
						duration = -1
					}
					remove_province_modifier = no_liege
				}
			}
			hidden_tooltip = { FROM = {	set_character_flag = creating_title_loop } }
		}
		hidden_tooltip = { clr_character_flag = creating_title_loop }

	}
	allow = {
		OR = {
			AND = {
			
				primary_title = { title = c_osterbotten }
				primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = no_liege } }
				OR = {
					AND = {
						num_of_count_titles = 3
						NOT = { num_of_count_titles = 6 }
					}
					primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = isolated } }
				}
			}
			d_osterbotten = {
				is_titular = no
			}
		}

	}
}

d_kemi = {
	color = { 130 65 55 }
	color2 = { 255 255 255 }
	capital = 386
	gain_effect = {
		primary_title = { copy_title_laws = c_kemi }
		
		IF = {
			limit = {
				d_kemi = { is_titular = yes }
			}
			character_event = { 
		id = nivve.0 tooltip = "Kingdom of Europa becomes the de jure liege of d_kemi" 
				}
			}
		any_demesne_title = {
			limit = {
				tier = COUNT
				location = { 
					AND = {
						has_province_modifier = no_liege
						OR = {
							is_primary_holder_title = yes
							any_neighbor_province = {
								owner = { character = ROOT }
							}
						}
					}
				}
				OR = {
					d_kemi = { is_titular = yes }
					FROM = { has_character_flag = creating_title_loop }
				}
			}
			de_jure_liege = d_kemi
			hidden_tooltip = {
				location = {
					add_province_modifier = {
						name = d_kemi_de_jure_liege
						duration = -1
					}
					remove_province_modifier = no_liege
				}
			}
			hidden_tooltip = { FROM = {	set_character_flag = creating_title_loop } }
		}
		hidden_tooltip = { clr_character_flag = creating_title_loop }

	}
	allow = {
		OR = {
			AND = {
			
				primary_title = { title = c_kemi }
				primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = no_liege } }
				OR = {
					AND = {
						num_of_count_titles = 3
						NOT = { num_of_count_titles = 6 }
					}
					primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = isolated } }
				}
			}
			d_kemi = {
				is_titular = no
			}
		}

	}
}

				is_titular = no
			}
		}

	}
}

d_poznanskie = {
	color = { 145 6 2 }
	color2 = { 255 255 255 }
	capital = 431
	german = "Posen"
	swedish = "Posen"
	norse = "Posen"
	norwegian = "Posen"
	danish = "Posen"
	gain_effect = {
		primary_title = { copy_title_laws = c_poznanskie }
		
		IF = {
			limit = {
				d_poznanskie = { is_titular = yes }
			}
			character_event = { 
		id = nivve.0 tooltip = "Kingdom of Europa becomes the de jure liege of d_poznanskie" 
				}
			}
		any_demesne_title = {
			limit = {
				tier = COUNT
				location = { 
					AND = {
						has_province_modifier = no_liege
						OR = {
							is_primary_holder_title = yes
							any_neighbor_province = {
								owner = { character = ROOT }
							}
						}
					}
				}
				OR = {
					d_poznanskie = { is_titular = yes }
					FROM = { has_character_flag = creating_title_loop }
				}
			}
			de_jure_liege = d_poznanskie
			hidden_tooltip = {
				location = {
					add_province_modifier = {
						name = d_poznanskie_de_jure_liege
						duration = -1
					}
					remove_province_modifier = no_liege
				}
			}
			hidden_tooltip = { FROM = {	set_character_flag = creating_title_loop } }
		}
		hidden_tooltip = { clr_character_flag = creating_title_loop }

	}
	allow = {
		OR = {
			AND = {
			
				primary_title = { title = c_poznanskie }
				primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = no_liege } }
				OR = {
					AND = {
						num_of_count_titles = 3
						NOT = { num_of_count_titles = 6 }
					}
					primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = isolated } }
				}
			}
			d_poznanskie = {
				is_titular = no
			}
		}

	}
}

				is_titular = no
			}
		}

	}
}

d_krakowskie = {
	color = { 137 6 20 }
	color2 = { 255 255 255 }
	capital = 527
	german = "Krakau"
	swedish = "Krakau"
	norse = "Krakau"
	norwegian = "Krakau"
	danish = "Krakau"
	gain_effect = {
		primary_title = { copy_title_laws = c_krakowskie }
		
		IF = {
			limit = {
				d_krakowskie = { is_titular = yes }
			}
			character_event = { 
		id = nivve.0 tooltip = "Kingdom of Europa becomes the de jure liege of d_krakowskie" 
				}
			}
		any_demesne_title = {
			limit = {
				tier = COUNT
				location = { 
					AND = {
						has_province_modifier = no_liege
						OR = {
							is_primary_holder_title = yes
							any_neighbor_province = {
								owner = { character = ROOT }
							}
						}
					}
				}
				OR = {
					d_krakowskie = { is_titular = yes }
					FROM = { has_character_flag = creating_title_loop }
				}
			}
			de_jure_liege = d_krakowskie
			hidden_tooltip = {
				location = {
					add_province_modifier = {
						name = d_krakowskie_de_jure_liege
						duration = -1
					}
					remove_province_modifier = no_liege
				}
			}
			hidden_tooltip = { FROM = {	set_character_flag = creating_title_loop } }
		}
		hidden_tooltip = { clr_character_flag = creating_title_loop }

	}
	allow = {
		OR = {
			AND = {
			
				primary_title = { title = c_krakowskie }
				primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = no_liege } }
				OR = {
					AND = {
						num_of_count_titles = 3
						NOT = { num_of_count_titles = 6 }
					}
					primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = isolated } }
				}
			}
			d_krakowskie = {
				is_titular = no
			}
		}

	}
}

			}
			de_jure_liege = d_mecklemburg
			hidden_tooltip = {
				location = {
					add_province_modifier = {
						name = d_mecklemburg_de_jure_liege
						duration = -1
					}
					remove_province_modifier = no_liege
				}
			}
			hidden_tooltip = { FROM = {	set_character_flag = creating_title_loop } }
		}
		hidden_tooltip = { clr_character_flag = creating_title_loop }

	}
	allow = {
		OR = {
			AND = {
			
				primary_title = { title = c_mecklemburg }
				primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = no_liege } }
				OR = {
					AND = {
						num_of_count_titles = 3
						NOT = { num_of_count_titles = 6 }
					}
					primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = isolated } }
				}
			}
			d_mecklemburg = {
				is_titular = no
			}
		}

	}
}

d_rostock = {
	color = { 204 204 204 }
	color2 = { 255 255 255 }
	capital = 306
	pommeranian = "Rastok"
	gain_effect = {
		primary_title = { copy_title_laws = c_rostock }
		
		IF = {
			limit = {
				d_rostock = { is_titular = yes }
			}
			character_event = { 
		id = nivve.0 tooltip = "Kingdom of Europa becomes the de jure liege of d_rostock" 
				}
			}
		any_demesne_title = {
			limit = {
				tier = COUNT
				location = { 
					AND = {
						has_province_modifier = no_liege
						OR = {
							is_primary_holder_title = yes
							any_neighbor_province = {
								owner = { character = ROOT }
							}
						}
					}
				}
				OR = {
					d_rostock = { is_titular = yes }
					FROM = { has_character_flag = creating_title_loop }
				}
			}
			de_jure_liege = d_rostock
			hidden_tooltip = {
				location = {
					add_province_modifier = {
						name = d_rostock_de_jure_liege
						duration = -1
					}
					remove_province_modifier = no_liege
				}
			}
			hidden_tooltip = { FROM = {	set_character_flag = creating_title_loop } }
		}
		hidden_tooltip = { clr_character_flag = creating_title_loop }

	}
	allow = {
		OR = {
			AND = {
			
				primary_title = { title = c_rostock }
				primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = no_liege } }
				OR = {
					AND = {
						num_of_count_titles = 3
						NOT = { num_of_count_titles = 6 }
					}
					primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = isolated } }
				}
			}
			d_rostock = {
				is_titular = no
			}
		}

	}
}

				tier = COUNT
				location = { 
					AND = {
						has_province_modifier = no_liege
						OR = {
							is_primary_holder_title = yes
							any_neighbor_province = {
								owner = { character = ROOT }
							}
						}
					}
				}
				OR = {
					d_danzig = { is_titular = yes }
					FROM = { has_character_flag = creating_title_loop }
				}
			}
			de_jure_liege = d_danzig
			hidden_tooltip = {
				location = {
					add_province_modifier = {
						name = d_danzig_de_jure_liege
						duration = -1
					}
					remove_province_modifier = no_liege
				}
			}
			hidden_tooltip = { FROM = {	set_character_flag = creating_title_loop } }
		}
		hidden_tooltip = { clr_character_flag = creating_title_loop }

	}
	allow = {
		OR = {
			AND = {
			
				primary_title = { title = c_danzig }
				primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = no_liege } }
				OR = {
					AND = {
						num_of_count_titles = 3
						NOT = { num_of_count_titles = 6 }
					}
					primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = isolated } }
				}
			}
			d_danzig = {
				is_titular = no
			}
		}

	}
}

d_slupsk = {
	color = { 6 155 25 }
	color2 = { 255 255 255 }
	capital = 367
	german = "Stolp"
	swedish = "Stolp"
	norwegian = "Stolp"
	danish = "Stolp"
	norse = "Stolp"
	gain_effect = {
		primary_title = { copy_title_laws = c_slupsk }
		
		IF = {
			limit = {
				d_slupsk = { is_titular = yes }
			}
			character_event = { 
		id = nivve.0 tooltip = "Kingdom of Europa becomes the de jure liege of d_slupsk" 
				}
			}
		any_demesne_title = {
			limit = {
				tier = COUNT
				location = { 
					AND = {
						has_province_modifier = no_liege
						OR = {
							is_primary_holder_title = yes
							any_neighbor_province = {
								owner = { character = ROOT }
							}
						}
					}
				}
				OR = {
					d_slupsk = { is_titular = yes }
					FROM = { has_character_flag = creating_title_loop }
				}
			}
			de_jure_liege = d_slupsk
			hidden_tooltip = {
				location = {
					add_province_modifier = {
						name = d_slupsk_de_jure_liege
						duration = -1
					}
					remove_province_modifier = no_liege
				}
			}
			hidden_tooltip = { FROM = {	set_character_flag = creating_title_loop } }
		}
		hidden_tooltip = { clr_character_flag = creating_title_loop }

	}
	allow = {
		OR = {
			AND = {
			
				primary_title = { title = c_slupsk }
				primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = no_liege } }
				OR = {
					AND = {
						num_of_count_titles = 3
						NOT = { num_of_count_titles = 6 }
					}
					primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = isolated } }
				}
			}
			d_slupsk = {

			}

		hidden_tooltip = { clr_character_flag = creating_title_loop }

	}
	allow = {
		OR = {
			AND = {
			
				primary_title = { title = k_altmark }
				num_of_king_titles = 3
			}
			e_altmark = {
				is_titular = no
			}
		}

	}
}

d_brandenburg = {
	color = { 186 186 186 }
	color2 = { 255 255 255 }
	capital = 365
	pommeranian = "Brennaburg"
	gain_effect = {
		primary_title = { copy_title_laws = c_brandenburg }
		
		IF = {
			limit = {
				d_brandenburg = { is_titular = yes }
			}
			character_event = { 
		id = nivve.0 tooltip = "Kingdom of Europa becomes the de jure liege of d_brandenburg" 
				}
			}
		any_demesne_title = {
			limit = {
				tier = COUNT
				location = { 
					AND = {
						has_province_modifier = no_liege
						OR = {
							is_primary_holder_title = yes
							any_neighbor_province = {
								owner = { character = ROOT }
							}
						}
					}
				}
				OR = {
					d_brandenburg = { is_titular = yes }
					FROM = { has_character_flag = creating_title_loop }
				}
			}
			de_jure_liege = d_brandenburg
			hidden_tooltip = {
				location = {
					add_province_modifier = {
						name = d_brandenburg_de_jure_liege
						duration = -1
					}
					remove_province_modifier = no_liege
				}
			}
			hidden_tooltip = { FROM = {	set_character_flag = creating_title_loop } }
		}
		hidden_tooltip = { clr_character_flag = creating_title_loop }

	}
	allow = {
		OR = {
			AND = {
			
				primary_title = { title = c_brandenburg }
				primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = no_liege } }
				OR = {
					AND = {
						num_of_count_titles = 3
						NOT = { num_of_count_titles = 6 }
					}
					primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = isolated } }
				}
			}
			d_brandenburg = {
				is_titular = no
			}
		}

	}
}

		hidden_tooltip = { clr_character_flag = creating_title_loop }

	}
	allow = {
		OR = {
			AND = {
			
				primary_title = { title = d_dorpat }
				num_of_duke_titles = 3
			}
			k_dorpat = {
				is_titular = no
			}
		}

	}
}

d_osel = {
	color = { 101 48 48 }
	color2 = { 255 255 255 }
	capital = 376
	swedish = "sel"
	norse = "sel"
	danish = "sel"
	norwegian = "sel"
	german = "sel"
	gain_effect = {
		primary_title = { copy_title_laws = c_osel }
		
		IF = {
			limit = {
				d_osel = { is_titular = yes }
			}
			character_event = { 
		id = nivve.0 tooltip = "Kingdom of Europa becomes the de jure liege of d_osel" 
				}
			}
		any_demesne_title = {
			limit = {
				tier = COUNT
				location = { 
					AND = {
						has_province_modifier = no_liege
						OR = {
							is_primary_holder_title = yes
							any_neighbor_province = {
								owner = { character = ROOT }
							}
						}
					}
				}
				OR = {
					d_osel = { is_titular = yes }
					FROM = { has_character_flag = creating_title_loop }
				}
			}
			de_jure_liege = d_osel
			hidden_tooltip = {
				location = {
					add_province_modifier = {
						name = d_osel_de_jure_liege
						duration = -1
					}
					remove_province_modifier = no_liege
				}
			}
			hidden_tooltip = { FROM = {	set_character_flag = creating_title_loop } }
		}
		hidden_tooltip = { clr_character_flag = creating_title_loop }

	}
	allow = {
		OR = {
			AND = {
			
				primary_title = { title = c_osel }
				primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = no_liege } }
				OR = {
					AND = {
						num_of_count_titles = 3
						NOT = { num_of_count_titles = 6 }
					}
					primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = isolated } }
				}
			}
			d_osel = {
				is_titular = no
			}
		}

	}
}

				}

			hidden_tooltip = { FROM = {	set_character_flag = creating_title_loop } }
		}
		hidden_tooltip = { clr_character_flag = creating_title_loop }

	}
	allow = {
		OR = {
			AND = {
			
				primary_title = { title = c_polotsk }
				primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = no_liege } }
				OR = {
					AND = {
						num_of_count_titles = 3
						NOT = { num_of_count_titles = 6 }
					}
					primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = isolated } }
				}
			}
			d_polotsk = {
				is_titular = no
			}
		}

	}
}

d_lepiel = {
	color = { 125 24 24 }
	color2 = { 255 255 255 }
	capital = 934
	gain_effect = {
		primary_title = { copy_title_laws = c_lepiel }
		
		IF = {
			limit = {
				d_lepiel = { is_titular = yes }
			}
			character_event = { 
		id = nivve.0 tooltip = "Kingdom of Europa becomes the de jure liege of d_lepiel" 
				}
			}
		any_demesne_title = {
			limit = {
				tier = COUNT
				location = { 
					AND = {
						has_province_modifier = no_liege
						OR = {
							is_primary_holder_title = yes
							any_neighbor_province = {
								owner = { character = ROOT }
							}
						}
					}
				}
				OR = {
					d_lepiel = { is_titular = yes }
					FROM = { has_character_flag = creating_title_loop }
				}
			}
			de_jure_liege = d_lepiel
			hidden_tooltip = {
				location = {
					add_province_modifier = {
						name = d_lepiel_de_jure_liege
						duration = -1
					}
					remove_province_modifier = no_liege
				}
			}
			hidden_tooltip = { FROM = {	set_character_flag = creating_title_loop } }
		}
		hidden_tooltip = { clr_character_flag = creating_title_loop }

	}
	allow = {
		OR = {
			AND = {
			
				primary_title = { title = c_lepiel }
				primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = no_liege } }
				OR = {
					AND = {
						num_of_count_titles = 3
						NOT = { num_of_count_titles = 6 }
					}
					primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = isolated } }
				}
			}
			d_lepiel = {
				is_titular = no
			}
		}

	}

							is_primary_holder_title = yes
							any_neighbor_province = {
								owner = { character = ROOT }
							}
						}
					}
				}
				OR = {
					d_jacwiez = { is_titular = yes }
					FROM = { has_character_flag = creating_title_loop }
				}
			}
			de_jure_liege = d_jacwiez
			hidden_tooltip = {
				location = {
					add_province_modifier = {
						name = d_jacwiez_de_jure_liege
						duration = -1
					}
					remove_province_modifier = no_liege
				}
			}
			hidden_tooltip = { FROM = {	set_character_flag = creating_title_loop } }
		}
		hidden_tooltip = { clr_character_flag = creating_title_loop }

	}
	allow = {
		OR = {
			AND = {
			
				primary_title = { title = c_jacwiez }
				primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = no_liege } }
				OR = {
					AND = {
						num_of_count_titles = 3
						NOT = { num_of_count_titles = 6 }
					}
					primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = isolated } }
				}
			}
			d_jacwiez = {
				is_titular = no
			}
		}

	}
}

d_podlasie = {
	color = { 148 100 100 }
	color2 = { 255 255 255 }
	capital = 425
	gain_effect = {
		primary_title = { copy_title_laws = c_podlasie }
		
		IF = {
			limit = {
				d_podlasie = { is_titular = yes }
			}
			character_event = { 
		id = nivve.0 tooltip = "Kingdom of Europa becomes the de jure liege of d_podlasie" 
				}
			}
		any_demesne_title = {
			limit = {
				tier = COUNT
				location = { 
					AND = {
						has_province_modifier = no_liege
						OR = {
							is_primary_holder_title = yes
							any_neighbor_province = {
								owner = { character = ROOT }
							}
						}
					}
				}
				OR = {
					d_podlasie = { is_titular = yes }
					FROM = { has_character_flag = creating_title_loop }
				}
			}
			de_jure_liege = d_podlasie
			hidden_tooltip = {
				location = {
					add_province_modifier = {
						name = d_podlasie_de_jure_liege
						duration = -1
					}
					remove_province_modifier = no_liege
				}
			}
			hidden_tooltip = { FROM = {	set_character_flag = creating_title_loop } }
		}
		hidden_tooltip = { clr_character_flag = creating_title_loop }

	}
	allow = {
		OR = {
			AND = {
			
				primary_title = { title = c_podlasie }
				primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = no_liege } }
				OR = {
					AND = {
						num_of_count_titles = 3
						NOT = { num_of_count_titles = 6 }
					}
					primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = isolated } }
				}
			}
			d_podlasie = {
				is_titular = no
			}
		}

	}

	polish = "Zhmudz"
	russian = "Zhmud"
	pommeranian = "Zhmud"
	bohemian = "Zhmud"
	lettigallish = "Zemaiteje"
	gain_effect = {
		primary_title = { copy_title_laws = c_zhmud }
		
		IF = {
			limit = {
				d_zhmud = { is_titular = yes }
			}
			character_event = { 
		id = nivve.0 tooltip = "Kingdom of Europa becomes the de jure liege of d_zhmud" 
				}
			}
		any_demesne_title = {
			limit = {
				tier = COUNT
				location = { 
					AND = {
						has_province_modifier = no_liege
						OR = {
							is_primary_holder_title = yes
							any_neighbor_province = {
								owner = { character = ROOT }
							}
						}
					}
				}
				OR = {
					d_zhmud = { is_titular = yes }
					FROM = { has_character_flag = creating_title_loop }
				}
			}
			de_jure_liege = d_zhmud
			hidden_tooltip = {
				location = {
					add_province_modifier = {
						name = d_zhmud_de_jure_liege
						duration = -1
					}
					remove_province_modifier = no_liege
				}
			}
			hidden_tooltip = { FROM = {	set_character_flag = creating_title_loop } }
		}
		hidden_tooltip = { clr_character_flag = creating_title_loop }

	}
	allow = {
		OR = {
			AND = {
			
				primary_title = { title = c_zhmud }
				primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = no_liege } }
				OR = {
					AND = {
						num_of_count_titles = 3
						NOT = { num_of_count_titles = 6 }
					}
					primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = isolated } }
				}
			}
			d_zhmud = {
				is_titular = no
			}
		}

	}
}

k_zhmud = {
	color = { 166 81 81 }
	color2 = { 255 255 255 }
	capital = 421
	german = "Sameiten"
	prussian = "Zhmud"
	lithuanian = "Zemaitija"
	polish = "Zhmudz"
	russian = "Zhmud"
	pommeranian = "Zhmud"
	bohemian = "Zhmud"
	lettigallish = "Zemaiteje"
	gain_effect = {
		primary_title = { copy_title_laws = d_zhmud }
		
		any_demesne_title = {
			limit = {
				title = d_zhmud
				OR = {
					k_zhmud = { is_titular = yes }
					FROM = { has_character_flag = creating_title_loop }
				}
			}
			de_jure_liege = k_zhmud
			hidden_tooltip = { FROM = {	set_character_flag = creating_title_loop } }
		}
		hidden_tooltip = { clr_character_flag = creating_title_loop }

	}
	allow = {
		OR = {
			AND = {
			
				primary_title = { title = d_zhmud }
				num_of_duke_titles = 3
			}
			k_zhmud = {
				is_titular = no
			}
		}

	}
}

	color = { 166 81 81 }
	color2 = { 255 255 255 }

	}

			AND = {
			
				primary_title = { title = k_zhmud }
				num_of_king_titles = 3
			}

			}
		}

	color = { 197 112 13 }
	color2 = { 255 255 255 }
	capital = 362

		primary_title = { copy_title_laws = c_domazlice }

				d_domazlice = { is_titular = yes }
			}
			character_event = { 
		id = nivve.0 tooltip = "Kingdom of Europa becomes the de jure liege of d_domazlice" 
				}
			}
		any_demesne_title = {
			limit = {
				tier = COUNT

							}
						}
					}
				}

			hidden_tooltip = {

					add_province_modifier = {
						name = d_domazlice_de_jure_liege
						duration = -1
					}
					remove_province_modifier = no_liege
				}
			}
			hidden_tooltip = { FROM = {	set_character_flag = creating_title_loop } }
		}
		hidden_tooltip = { clr_character_flag = creating_title_loop }

	}

e_plzen = {
	color = { 205 120 21 }
	color2 = { 255 255 255 }
	capital = 439
	short_name = yes
	german = "Pilsen"
	swedish = "Pilsen"
	norse = "Pilsen"
	danish = "Pilsen"
	norwegian = "Pilsen"
	gain_effect = {
		primary_title = { copy_title_laws = k_plzen }
		
		any_demesne_title = {
			limit = {
				title = k_plzen
				OR = {
					e_plzen = { is_titular = yes }
					FROM = { has_character_flag = creating_title_loop }
				}
			}
			de_jure_liege = e_plzen
			hidden_tooltip = { FROM = {	set_character_flag = creating_title_loop } }
		}
		hidden_tooltip = { clr_character_flag = creating_title_loop }

	}
	allow = {
		OR = {
			AND = {
			
				primary_title = { title = k_plzen }
				num_of_king_titles = 3
			}
			e_plzen = {
				is_titular = no
			}
		}

	}
}

d_hradec = {
	color = { 160 104 38 }
	color2 = { 255 255 255 }
	capital = 438
	gain_effect = {
		primary_title = { copy_title_laws = c_hradec }
		
		IF = {
			limit = {
				d_hradec = { is_titular = yes }
			}
			character_event = { 
		id = nivve.0 tooltip = "Kingdom of Europa becomes the de jure liege of d_hradec" 
				}
			}
		any_demesne_title = {
			limit = {
				tier = COUNT
				location = { 
					AND = {
						has_province_modifier = no_liege
						OR = {
							is_primary_holder_title = yes
							any_neighbor_province = {
								owner = { character = ROOT }
							}
						}
					}
				}
				OR = {
					d_hradec = { is_titular = yes }
					FROM = { has_character_flag = creating_title_loop }
				}
			}
			de_jure_liege = d_hradec
			hidden_tooltip = {
				location = {
					add_province_modifier = {
						name = d_hradec_de_jure_liege
						duration = -1
					}
					remove_province_modifier = no_liege
				}
			}
			hidden_tooltip = { FROM = {	set_character_flag = creating_title_loop } }
		}
		hidden_tooltip = { clr_character_flag = creating_title_loop }

	}
	allow = {
		OR = {
			AND = {
			
				primary_title = { title = c_hradec }
				primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = no_liege } }
				OR = {
					AND = {
						num_of_count_titles = 3
						NOT = { num_of_count_titles = 6 }
					}
					primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = isolated } }
				}
			}
			d_hradec = {
				is_titular = no
			}
		}

	}
}

k_hradec = {
	color = { 160 104 38 }
	color2 = { 255 255 255 }
	capital = 438
	gain_effect = {
		primary_title = { copy_title_laws = d_hradec }
		
		any_demesne_title = {
			limit = {
				title = d_hradec
				OR = {
					k_hradec = { is_titular = yes }
					FROM = { has_character_flag = creating_title_loop }
				}
			}
			de_jure_liege = k_hradec
			hidden_tooltip = { FROM = {	set_character_flag = creating_title_loop } }
		}
		hidden_tooltip = { clr_character_flag = creating_title_loop }

	}
	allow = {
		OR = {
			AND = {
			
				primary_title = { title = d_hradec }
				num_of_duke_titles = 3
			}
			k_hradec = {
				is_titular = no
			}
		}

	}
}

	color = { 160 104 38 }
	color2 = { 255 255 255 }
	capital = 438

	gain_effect = {

d_olomouc = {
	color = { 163 107 41 }
	color2 = { 255 255 255 }
	capital = 440
	gain_effect = {
		primary_title = { copy_title_laws = c_olomouc }
		
		IF = {
			limit = {
				d_olomouc = { is_titular = yes }
			}
			character_event = { 
		id = nivve.0 tooltip = "Kingdom of Europa becomes the de jure liege of d_olomouc" 
				}
			}
		any_demesne_title = {
			limit = {
				tier = COUNT
				location = { 
					AND = {
						has_province_modifier = no_liege
						OR = {
							is_primary_holder_title = yes
							any_neighbor_province = {
								owner = { character = ROOT }
							}
						}
					}
				}

					FROM = { has_character_flag = creating_title_loop }
				}

			hidden_tooltip = {
				location = {
					add_province_modifier = {
						name = d_olomouc_de_jure_liege
						duration = -1
					}
					remove_province_modifier = no_liege
				}
			}
			hidden_tooltip = { FROM = {	set_character_flag = creating_title_loop } }
		}
		hidden_tooltip = { clr_character_flag = creating_title_loop }

	}

				primary_title = { title = c_olomouc }
				primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = no_liege } }
				OR = {
					AND = {
						num_of_count_titles = 3
						NOT = { num_of_count_titles = 6 }
					}
					primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = isolated } }
				}
			}

			de_jure_liege = e_chud
			hidden_tooltip = { FROM = {	set_character_flag = creating_title_loop } }
		}
		hidden_tooltip = { clr_character_flag = creating_title_loop }

	}
	allow = {
		OR = {
			AND = {
			
				primary_title = { title = k_chud }
				num_of_king_titles = 3
			}
			e_chud = {
				is_titular = no
			}
		}

	}
}

	color = { 141 158 98 }
	color2 = { 255 255 255 }
	capital = 406

			}

				}
			}

						duration = -1
					}

				}
			}
			hidden_tooltip = { FROM = {	set_character_flag = creating_title_loop } }

e_velikiye_luki = {
	color = { 154 170 110 }
	color2 = { 255 255 255 }
	capital = 415
	short_name = yes
	gain_effect = {
		primary_title = { copy_title_laws = k_velikiye_luki }
		
		any_demesne_title = {
			limit = {
				title = k_velikiye_luki
				OR = {
					e_velikiye_luki = { is_titular = yes }
					FROM = { has_character_flag = creating_title_loop }
				}
			}
			de_jure_liege = e_velikiye_luki
			hidden_tooltip = { FROM = {	set_character_flag = creating_title_loop } }
		}
		hidden_tooltip = { clr_character_flag = creating_title_loop }

	}
	allow = {
		OR = {
			AND = {
			
				primary_title = { title = k_velikiye_luki }
				num_of_king_titles = 3
			}
			e_velikiye_luki = {
				is_titular = no
			}
		}

	}
}

d_toropets = {
	color = { 157 173 113 }
	color2 = { 255 255 255 }
	capital = 410
	gain_effect = {
		primary_title = { copy_title_laws = c_toropets }
		
		IF = {
			limit = {
				d_toropets = { is_titular = yes }
			}
			character_event = { 
		id = nivve.0 tooltip = "Kingdom of Europa becomes the de jure liege of d_toropets" 
				}
			}
		any_demesne_title = {
			limit = {
				tier = COUNT
				location = { 
					AND = {
						has_province_modifier = no_liege
						OR = {
							is_primary_holder_title = yes
							any_neighbor_province = {
								owner = { character = ROOT }
							}
						}
					}
				}
				OR = {
					d_toropets = { is_titular = yes }
					FROM = { has_character_flag = creating_title_loop }
				}
			}
			de_jure_liege = d_toropets
			hidden_tooltip = {
				location = {
					add_province_modifier = {
						name = d_toropets_de_jure_liege
						duration = -1
					}
					remove_province_modifier = no_liege
				}
			}
			hidden_tooltip = { FROM = {	set_character_flag = creating_title_loop } }
		}
		hidden_tooltip = { clr_character_flag = creating_title_loop }

	}
	allow = {
		OR = {
			AND = {
			
				primary_title = { title = c_toropets }
				primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = no_liege } }
				OR = {
					AND = {
						num_of_count_titles = 3
						NOT = { num_of_count_titles = 6 }
					}
					primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = isolated } }
				}
			}
			d_toropets = {
				is_titular = no
			}
		}

	}
}

k_toropets = {
	color = { 157 173 113 }
	color2 = { 255 255 255 }
	capital = 410
	gain_effect = {
		primary_title = { copy_title_laws = d_toropets }
		
		any_demesne_title = {
			limit = {
				title = d_toropets
				OR = {
					k_toropets = { is_titular = yes }
					FROM = { has_character_flag = creating_title_loop }
				}
			}
			de_jure_liege = k_toropets
			hidden_tooltip = { FROM = {	set_character_flag = creating_title_loop } }
		}
		hidden_tooltip = { clr_character_flag = creating_title_loop }

	}
	allow = {
		OR = {
			AND = {
			
				primary_title = { title = d_toropets }
				num_of_duke_titles = 3
			}
			k_toropets = {
				is_titular = no
			}
		}

	}
}

	finnish = "Merya"
	lappish = "Merya"
	swedish = "Radstofa"
	norse = "Radstofa"
	danish = "Radstofa"
	norwegian = "Radstofa"

			limit = {

				OR = {
					k_vyazma = { is_titular = yes }
					FROM = { has_character_flag = creating_title_loop }
				}
			}
			de_jure_liege = k_vyazma
			hidden_tooltip = { FROM = {	set_character_flag = creating_title_loop } }
		}
		hidden_tooltip = { clr_character_flag = creating_title_loop }

	}
	allow = {
		OR = {
			AND = {
			
				primary_title = { title = d_vyazma }
				num_of_duke_titles = 3
			}
			k_vyazma = {
				is_titular = no
			}
		}

	}
}

d_kostroma = {
	color = { 181 195 137 }
	color2 = { 255 255 255 }
	capital = 407
	gain_effect = {
		primary_title = { copy_title_laws = c_kostroma }
		
		IF = {
			limit = {
				d_kostroma = { is_titular = yes }
			}
			character_event = { 
		id = nivve.0 tooltip = "Kingdom of Europa becomes the de jure liege of d_kostroma" 
				}
			}
		any_demesne_title = {
			limit = {
				tier = COUNT
				location = { 
					AND = {
						has_province_modifier = no_liege
						OR = {
							is_primary_holder_title = yes
							any_neighbor_province = {
								owner = { character = ROOT }
							}
						}
					}
				}
				OR = {
					d_kostroma = { is_titular = yes }
					FROM = { has_character_flag = creating_title_loop }
				}
			}
			de_jure_liege = d_kostroma
			hidden_tooltip = {
				location = {
					add_province_modifier = {
						name = d_kostroma_de_jure_liege
						duration = -1
					}
					remove_province_modifier = no_liege
				}
			}
			hidden_tooltip = { FROM = {	set_character_flag = creating_title_loop } }
		}
		hidden_tooltip = { clr_character_flag = creating_title_loop }

	}
	allow = {
		OR = {
			AND = {
			
				primary_title = { title = c_kostroma }
				primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = no_liege } }
				OR = {
					AND = {
						num_of_count_titles = 3
						NOT = { num_of_count_titles = 6 }
					}
					primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = isolated } }
				}
			}
			d_kostroma = {
				is_titular = no
			}
		}

	}
}

						duration = -1
					}
					remove_province_modifier = no_liege
				}
			}
			hidden_tooltip = { FROM = {	set_character_flag = creating_title_loop } }
		}
		hidden_tooltip = { clr_character_flag = creating_title_loop }

	}
	allow = {
		OR = {
			AND = {
			
				primary_title = { title = c_suzdal }
				primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = no_liege } }
				OR = {
					AND = {
						num_of_count_titles = 3
						NOT = { num_of_count_titles = 6 }
					}
					primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = isolated } }
				}
			}
			d_suzdal = {
				is_titular = no
			}
		}

	}
}

d_vladimir = {
	color = { 202 216 158 }
	color2 = { 255 255 255 }
	capital = 582
	gain_effect = {
		primary_title = { copy_title_laws = c_vladimir }
		
		IF = {
			limit = {
				d_vladimir = { is_titular = yes }
			}
			character_event = { 
		id = nivve.0 tooltip = "Kingdom of Europa becomes the de jure liege of d_vladimir" 
				}
			}
		any_demesne_title = {
			limit = {
				tier = COUNT
				location = { 
					AND = {
						has_province_modifier = no_liege
						OR = {
							is_primary_holder_title = yes
							any_neighbor_province = {
								owner = { character = ROOT }
							}
						}
					}
				}
				OR = {
					d_vladimir = { is_titular = yes }
					FROM = { has_character_flag = creating_title_loop }
				}
			}
			de_jure_liege = d_vladimir
			hidden_tooltip = {
				location = {
					add_province_modifier = {
						name = d_vladimir_de_jure_liege
						duration = -1
					}
					remove_province_modifier = no_liege
				}
			}
			hidden_tooltip = { FROM = {	set_character_flag = creating_title_loop } }
		}
		hidden_tooltip = { clr_character_flag = creating_title_loop }

	}
	allow = {
		OR = {
			AND = {
			
				primary_title = { title = c_vladimir }
				primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = no_liege } }
				OR = {
					AND = {
						num_of_count_titles = 3
						NOT = { num_of_count_titles = 6 }
					}
					primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = isolated } }
				}
			}
			d_vladimir = {
				is_titular = no
			}
		}

	}
}

			hidden_tooltip = {
				location = {
					add_province_modifier = {
						name = d_terebovl_de_jure_liege
						duration = -1
					}
					remove_province_modifier = no_liege
				}
			}
			hidden_tooltip = { FROM = {	set_character_flag = creating_title_loop } }
		}
		hidden_tooltip = { clr_character_flag = creating_title_loop }

	}
	allow = {
		OR = {
			AND = {
			
				primary_title = { title = c_terebovl }
				primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = no_liege } }
				OR = {
					AND = {
						num_of_count_titles = 3
						NOT = { num_of_count_titles = 6 }
					}
					primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = isolated } }
				}
			}
			d_terebovl = {
				is_titular = no
			}
		}

	}
}

d_galich = {
	color = { 254 255 215 }
	color2 = { 255 255 255 }
	capital = 536
	gain_effect = {
		primary_title = { copy_title_laws = c_galich }
		
		IF = {
			limit = {
				d_galich = { is_titular = yes }
			}
			character_event = { 
		id = nivve.0 tooltip = "Kingdom of Europa becomes the de jure liege of d_galich" 
				}
			}
		any_demesne_title = {
			limit = {
				tier = COUNT
				location = { 
					AND = {
						has_province_modifier = no_liege
						OR = {
							is_primary_holder_title = yes
							any_neighbor_province = {
								owner = { character = ROOT }
							}
						}
					}
				}
				OR = {
					d_galich = { is_titular = yes }
					FROM = { has_character_flag = creating_title_loop }
				}
			}
			de_jure_liege = d_galich
			hidden_tooltip = {
				location = {
					add_province_modifier = {
						name = d_galich_de_jure_liege
						duration = -1
					}
					remove_province_modifier = no_liege
				}
			}
			hidden_tooltip = { FROM = {	set_character_flag = creating_title_loop } }
		}
		hidden_tooltip = { clr_character_flag = creating_title_loop }

	}
	allow = {
		OR = {
			AND = {
			
				primary_title = { title = c_galich }
				primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = no_liege } }
				OR = {
					AND = {
						num_of_count_titles = 3
						NOT = { num_of_count_titles = 6 }
					}
					primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = isolated } }
				}
			}
			d_galich = {
				is_titular = no
			}
		}

	}
}

		hidden_tooltip = { clr_character_flag = creating_title_loop }

	}
	allow = {
		OR = {
			AND = {
			
				primary_title = { title = c_pinsk }
				primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = no_liege } }
				OR = {
					AND = {
						num_of_count_titles = 3
						NOT = { num_of_count_titles = 6 }
					}
					primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = isolated } }
				}
			}
			d_pinsk = {
				is_titular = no
			}
		}

	}
}

d_minsk = {
	color = { 174 43 43 }
	color2 = { 255 255 255 }
	capital = 550
	gain_effect = {
		primary_title = { copy_title_laws = c_minsk }
		
		IF = {
			limit = {
				d_minsk = { is_titular = yes }
			}
			character_event = { 
		id = nivve.0 tooltip = "Kingdom of Europa becomes the de jure liege of d_minsk" 
				}
			}
		any_demesne_title = {
			limit = {
				tier = COUNT
				location = { 
					AND = {
						has_province_modifier = no_liege
						OR = {
							is_primary_holder_title = yes
							any_neighbor_province = {
								owner = { character = ROOT }
							}
						}
					}
				}
				OR = {
					d_minsk = { is_titular = yes }
					FROM = { has_character_flag = creating_title_loop }
				}
			}
			de_jure_liege = d_minsk
			hidden_tooltip = {
				location = {
					add_province_modifier = {
						name = d_minsk_de_jure_liege
						duration = -1
					}
					remove_province_modifier = no_liege
				}
			}
			hidden_tooltip = { FROM = {	set_character_flag = creating_title_loop } }
		}
		hidden_tooltip = { clr_character_flag = creating_title_loop }

	}
	allow = {
		OR = {
			AND = {
			
				primary_title = { title = c_minsk }
				primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = no_liege } }
				OR = {
					AND = {
						num_of_count_titles = 3
						NOT = { num_of_count_titles = 6 }
					}
					primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = isolated } }
				}
			}
			d_minsk = {
				is_titular = no
			}
		}

	}
}

			hidden_tooltip = { FROM = {	set_character_flag = creating_title_loop } }

		hidden_tooltip = { clr_character_flag = creating_title_loop }

	}
	allow = {
		OR = {
			AND = {
			
				primary_title = { title = c_mstislavl }
				primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = no_liege } }
				OR = {
					AND = {
						num_of_count_titles = 3
						NOT = { num_of_count_titles = 6 }
					}
					primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = isolated } }
				}
			}
			d_mstislavl = {
				is_titular = no
			}
		}

	}
}

d_lyubech = {
	color = { 238 253 194 }
	color2 = { 255 255 255 }
	capital = 553
	gain_effect = {
		primary_title = { copy_title_laws = c_lyubech }
		
		IF = {
			limit = {
				d_lyubech = { is_titular = yes }
			}
			character_event = { 
		id = nivve.0 tooltip = "Kingdom of Europa becomes the de jure liege of d_lyubech" 
				}
			}
		any_demesne_title = {
			limit = {
				tier = COUNT
				location = { 
					AND = {
						has_province_modifier = no_liege
						OR = {
							is_primary_holder_title = yes
							any_neighbor_province = {
								owner = { character = ROOT }
							}
						}
					}
				}
				OR = {
					d_lyubech = { is_titular = yes }
					FROM = { has_character_flag = creating_title_loop }
				}
			}
			de_jure_liege = d_lyubech
			hidden_tooltip = {
				location = {
					add_province_modifier = {
						name = d_lyubech_de_jure_liege
						duration = -1
					}
					remove_province_modifier = no_liege
				}
			}
			hidden_tooltip = { FROM = {	set_character_flag = creating_title_loop } }
		}
		hidden_tooltip = { clr_character_flag = creating_title_loop }

	}
	allow = {
		OR = {
			AND = {
			
				primary_title = { title = c_lyubech }
				primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = no_liege } }
				OR = {
					AND = {
						num_of_count_titles = 3
						NOT = { num_of_count_titles = 6 }
					}
					primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = isolated } }
				}
			}
			d_lyubech = {
				is_titular = no
			}
		}

	}
}

				}
			}
			hidden_tooltip = { FROM = {	set_character_flag = creating_title_loop } }
		}
		hidden_tooltip = { clr_character_flag = creating_title_loop }

	}
	allow = {
		OR = {
			AND = {
			
				primary_title = { title = c_murom }
				primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = no_liege } }
				OR = {
					AND = {
						num_of_count_titles = 3
						NOT = { num_of_count_titles = 6 }
					}
					primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = isolated } }
				}
			}
			d_murom = {
				is_titular = no
			}
		}

	}
}

d_ryazan = {
	color = { 211 225 167 }
	color2 = { 255 255 255 }
	capital = 580
	gain_effect = {
		primary_title = { copy_title_laws = c_ryazan }
		
		IF = {
			limit = {
				d_ryazan = { is_titular = yes }
			}
			character_event = { 
		id = nivve.0 tooltip = "Kingdom of Europa becomes the de jure liege of d_ryazan" 
				}
			}
		any_demesne_title = {
			limit = {
				tier = COUNT
				location = { 
					AND = {
						has_province_modifier = no_liege
						OR = {
							is_primary_holder_title = yes
							any_neighbor_province = {
								owner = { character = ROOT }
							}
						}
					}
				}
				OR = {
					d_ryazan = { is_titular = yes }
					FROM = { has_character_flag = creating_title_loop }
				}
			}
			de_jure_liege = d_ryazan
			hidden_tooltip = {
				location = {
					add_province_modifier = {
						name = d_ryazan_de_jure_liege
						duration = -1
					}
					remove_province_modifier = no_liege
				}
			}
			hidden_tooltip = { FROM = {	set_character_flag = creating_title_loop } }
		}
		hidden_tooltip = { clr_character_flag = creating_title_loop }

	}
	allow = {
		OR = {
			AND = {
			
				primary_title = { title = c_ryazan }
				primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = no_liege } }
				OR = {
					AND = {
						num_of_count_titles = 3
						NOT = { num_of_count_titles = 6 }
					}
					primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = isolated } }
				}
			}
			d_ryazan = {
				is_titular = no
			}
		}

		OR = {
			AND = {
			
				primary_title = { title = c_votyaki }
				primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = no_liege } }
				OR = {
					AND = {
						num_of_count_titles = 3
						NOT = { num_of_count_titles = 6 }
					}
					primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = isolated } }
				}
			}
			d_votyaki = {
				is_titular = no
			}
		}

	}
}

k_votyaki = {
	color = { 197 162 67 }
	color2 = { 255 255 255 }
	capital = 612
	gain_effect = {
		primary_title = { copy_title_laws = d_votyaki }
		
		any_demesne_title = {
			limit = {
				title = d_votyaki
				OR = {
					k_votyaki = { is_titular = yes }
					FROM = { has_character_flag = creating_title_loop }
				}
			}
			de_jure_liege = k_votyaki
			hidden_tooltip = { FROM = {	set_character_flag = creating_title_loop } }
		}
		hidden_tooltip = { clr_character_flag = creating_title_loop }

	}
	allow = {
		OR = {
			AND = {
			
				primary_title = { title = d_votyaki }
				num_of_duke_titles = 3
			}
			k_votyaki = {
				is_titular = no
			}
		}

d_yamalia = {
	color = { 240 214 143 }
	color2 = { 255 255 255 }
	capital = 887
	gain_effect = {
		primary_title = { copy_title_laws = c_yamalia }
		
		IF = {
			limit = {
				d_yamalia = { is_titular = yes }
			}
			character_event = { 
		id = nivve.0 tooltip = "Kingdom of Europa becomes the de jure liege of d_yamalia" 
				}
			}
		any_demesne_title = {
			limit = {
				tier = COUNT
				location = { 
					AND = {
						has_province_modifier = no_liege
						OR = {
							is_primary_holder_title = yes
							any_neighbor_province = {
								owner = { character = ROOT }
							}
						}
					}
				}
				OR = {
					d_yamalia = { is_titular = yes }
					FROM = { has_character_flag = creating_title_loop }
				}
			}
			de_jure_liege = d_yamalia
			hidden_tooltip = {
				location = {
					add_province_modifier = {
						name = d_yamalia_de_jure_liege
						duration = -1
					}
					remove_province_modifier = no_liege
				}
			}
			hidden_tooltip = { FROM = {	set_character_flag = creating_title_loop } }
		}
		hidden_tooltip = { clr_character_flag = creating_title_loop }

	}
	allow = {
		OR = {
			AND = {
			
				primary_title = { title = c_yamalia }
				primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = no_liege } }
				OR = {
					AND = {
						num_of_count_titles = 3
						NOT = { num_of_count_titles = 6 }
					}
					primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = isolated } }
				}
			}
			d_yamalia = {
				is_titular = no
			}
		}

	}
}

	color2 = { 255 255 255 }
	capital = 400
	gain_effect = {
		primary_title = { copy_title_laws = d_zyriane }
		
		any_demesne_title = {
			limit = {
				title = d_zyriane
				OR = {
					k_zyriane = { is_titular = yes }
					FROM = { has_character_flag = creating_title_loop }
				}
			}
			de_jure_liege = k_zyriane
			hidden_tooltip = { FROM = {	set_character_flag = creating_title_loop } }
		}
		hidden_tooltip = { clr_character_flag = creating_title_loop }

	}
	allow = {
		OR = {
			AND = {
			
				primary_title = { title = d_zyriane }
				num_of_duke_titles = 3
			}
			k_zyriane = {
				is_titular = no
			}
		}

	}
}

e_zyriane = {
	color = { 195 160 65 }
	color2 = { 255 255 255 }
	capital = 400
	short_name = yes
	gain_effect = {
		primary_title = { copy_title_laws = k_zyriane }
		
		any_demesne_title = {
			limit = {
				title = k_zyriane
				OR = {
					e_zyriane = { is_titular = yes }
					FROM = { has_character_flag = creating_title_loop }
				}
			}
			de_jure_liege = e_zyriane
			hidden_tooltip = { FROM = {	set_character_flag = creating_title_loop } }
		}
		hidden_tooltip = { clr_character_flag = creating_title_loop }

	}
	allow = {
		OR = {
			AND = {
			
				primary_title = { title = k_zyriane }
				num_of_king_titles = 3
			}
			e_zyriane = {
				is_titular = no
			}
		}

	}
}

d_ugra = {
	color = { 119 134 74 }
	color2 = { 255 255 255 }
	capital = 398
	gain_effect = {
		primary_title = { copy_title_laws = c_ugra }
		
		IF = {
			limit = {
				d_ugra = { is_titular = yes }
			}
			character_event = { 
		id = nivve.0 tooltip = "Kingdom of Europa becomes the de jure liege of d_ugra" 
				}
			}
		any_demesne_title = {
			limit = {
				tier = COUNT
				location = { 
					AND = {
						has_province_modifier = no_liege
						OR = {
							is_primary_holder_title = yes
							any_neighbor_province = {
								owner = { character = ROOT }
							}
						}
					}
				}
				OR = {
					d_ugra = { is_titular = yes }
					FROM = { has_character_flag = creating_title_loop }
				}
			}
			de_jure_liege = d_ugra
			hidden_tooltip = {
				location = {
					add_province_modifier = {
						name = d_ugra_de_jure_liege
						duration = -1
					}
					remove_province_modifier = no_liege
				}
			}
			hidden_tooltip = { FROM = {	set_character_flag = creating_title_loop } }
		}
		hidden_tooltip = { clr_character_flag = creating_title_loop }

	}
	allow = {
		OR = {
			AND = {
			
				primary_title = { title = c_ugra }
				primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = no_liege } }
				OR = {
					AND = {
						num_of_count_titles = 3
						NOT = { num_of_count_titles = 6 }
					}
					primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = isolated } }
				}
			}
			d_ugra = {
				is_titular = no
			}
		}

	}
}

k_ugra = {
	color = { 119 134 74 }
	color2 = { 255 255 255 }
	capital = 398
	gain_effect = {

			}

				}
			}

							}

				}
			}

			}
			de_jure_liege = k_north_dvina
			hidden_tooltip = { FROM = {	set_character_flag = creating_title_loop } }
		}
		hidden_tooltip = { clr_character_flag = creating_title_loop }

	}
	allow = {
		OR = {
			AND = {
			
				primary_title = { title = d_north_dvina }
				num_of_duke_titles = 3
			}
			k_north_dvina = {
				is_titular = no
			}
		}

	}
}
