d_bjarmia = {
	color = { 109 124 64 }
	color2 = { 255 255 255 }
	capital = 396
	gain_effect = {
		primary_title = { copy_title_laws = c_bjarmia }
		
		IF = {
			limit = {
				d_bjarmia = { is_titular = yes }
			}
			character_event = { 
		id = nivve.0 tooltip = "Kingdom of Europa becomes the de jure liege of d_bjarmia" 
				}
			}
		any_demesne_title = {
			limit = {
				tier = COUNT
				location = { 
					AND = {
						has_province_modifier = no_liege
						OR = {
							is_primary_holder_title = yes
							any_neighbor_province = {
								owner = { character = ROOT }
							}
						}
					}
				}
				OR = {
					d_bjarmia = { is_titular = yes }
					FROM = { has_character_flag = creating_title_loop }
				}
			}
			de_jure_liege = d_bjarmia
			hidden_tooltip = {
				location = {
					add_province_modifier = {
						name = d_bjarmia_de_jure_liege
						duration = -1
					}
					remove_province_modifier = no_liege
				}
			}
			hidden_tooltip = { FROM = {	set_character_flag = creating_title_loop } }
		}
		hidden_tooltip = { clr_character_flag = creating_title_loop }

	}
	allow = {
		OR = {
			AND = {
			
				primary_title = { title = c_bjarmia }
				primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = no_liege } }
				OR = {
					AND = {
						num_of_count_titles = 3
						NOT = { num_of_count_titles = 6 }
					}
					primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = isolated } }
				}
			}
			d_bjarmia = {
				is_titular = no
			}
		}

	}
}

				title = k_uzens
				OR = {
					e_uzens = { is_titular = yes }
					FROM = { has_character_flag = creating_title_loop }
				}
			}
			de_jure_liege = e_uzens
			hidden_tooltip = { FROM = {	set_character_flag = creating_title_loop } }
		}
		hidden_tooltip = { clr_character_flag = creating_title_loop }

	}
	allow = {
		OR = {
			AND = {
			
				primary_title = { title = k_uzens }
				num_of_king_titles = 3
			}
			e_uzens = {
				is_titular = no
			}
		}

	}
}

d_lower_volga = {
	color = { 167 134 46 }
	color2 = { 255 255 255 }
	capital = 608
	gain_effect = {
		primary_title = { copy_title_laws = c_lower_volga }
		
		IF = {
			limit = {
				d_lower_volga = { is_titular = yes }
			}
			character_event = { 
		id = nivve.0 tooltip = "Kingdom of Europa becomes the de jure liege of d_lower_volga" 
				}
			}
		any_demesne_title = {
			limit = {
				tier = COUNT
				location = { 
					AND = {
						has_province_modifier = no_liege
						OR = {
							is_primary_holder_title = yes
							any_neighbor_province = {
								owner = { character = ROOT }
							}
						}
					}
				}
				OR = {
					d_lower_volga = { is_titular = yes }
					FROM = { has_character_flag = creating_title_loop }
				}
			}
			de_jure_liege = d_lower_volga
			hidden_tooltip = {
				location = {
					add_province_modifier = {
						name = d_lower_volga_de_jure_liege
						duration = -1
					}
					remove_province_modifier = no_liege
				}
			}
			hidden_tooltip = { FROM = {	set_character_flag = creating_title_loop } }
		}
		hidden_tooltip = { clr_character_flag = creating_title_loop }

	}
	allow = {
		OR = {
			AND = {
			
				primary_title = { title = c_lower_volga }
				primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = no_liege } }
				OR = {
					AND = {
						num_of_count_titles = 3
						NOT = { num_of_count_titles = 6 }
					}
					primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = isolated } }
				}
			}
			d_lower_volga = {
				is_titular = no
			}
		}

	}
}

			hidden_tooltip = { FROM = {	set_character_flag = creating_title_loop } }
		}
		hidden_tooltip = { clr_character_flag = creating_title_loop }

	}
	allow = {
		OR = {
			AND = {
			
				primary_title = { title = k_sarkel }
				num_of_king_titles = 3
			}
			e_sarkel = {
				is_titular = no
			}
		}

	}
}

d_don_portage = {
	color = { 246 210 115 }
	color2 = { 255 255 255 }
	capital = 595
	gain_effect = {
		primary_title = { copy_title_laws = c_don_portage }
		
		IF = {
			limit = {
				d_don_portage = { is_titular = yes }
			}
			character_event = { 
		id = nivve.0 tooltip = "Kingdom of Europa becomes the de jure liege of d_don_portage" 
				}
			}
		any_demesne_title = {
			limit = {
				tier = COUNT
				location = { 
					AND = {
						has_province_modifier = no_liege
						OR = {
							is_primary_holder_title = yes
							any_neighbor_province = {
								owner = { character = ROOT }
							}
						}
					}
				}
				OR = {
					d_don_portage = { is_titular = yes }
					FROM = { has_character_flag = creating_title_loop }
				}
			}
			de_jure_liege = d_don_portage
			hidden_tooltip = {
				location = {
					add_province_modifier = {
						name = d_don_portage_de_jure_liege
						duration = -1
					}
					remove_province_modifier = no_liege
				}
			}
			hidden_tooltip = { FROM = {	set_character_flag = creating_title_loop } }
		}
		hidden_tooltip = { clr_character_flag = creating_title_loop }

	}
	allow = {
		OR = {
			AND = {
			
				primary_title = { title = c_don_portage }
				primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = no_liege } }
				OR = {
					AND = {
						num_of_count_titles = 3
						NOT = { num_of_count_titles = 6 }
					}
					primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = isolated } }
				}
			}
			d_don_portage = {
				is_titular = no
			}
		}

	}

}

d_mansia = {
	color = { 223 170 27 }
	color2 = { 255 255 255 }
	capital = 892
	gain_effect = {
		primary_title = { copy_title_laws = c_mansia }
		
		IF = {
			limit = {
				d_mansia = { is_titular = yes }
			}
			character_event = { 
		id = nivve.0 tooltip = "Kingdom of Europa becomes the de jure liege of d_mansia" 
				}
			}
		any_demesne_title = {
			limit = {
				tier = COUNT
				location = { 
					AND = {
						has_province_modifier = no_liege
						OR = {
							is_primary_holder_title = yes
							any_neighbor_province = {
								owner = { character = ROOT }
							}
						}
					}
				}
				OR = {
					d_mansia = { is_titular = yes }
					FROM = { has_character_flag = creating_title_loop }
				}
			}
			de_jure_liege = d_mansia
			hidden_tooltip = {
				location = {
					add_province_modifier = {
						name = d_mansia_de_jure_liege
						duration = -1
					}
					remove_province_modifier = no_liege
				}
			}
			hidden_tooltip = { FROM = {	set_character_flag = creating_title_loop } }
		}
		hidden_tooltip = { clr_character_flag = creating_title_loop }

	}
	allow = {
		OR = {
			AND = {
			
				primary_title = { title = c_mansia }
				primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = no_liege } }
				OR = {
					AND = {
						num_of_count_titles = 3
						NOT = { num_of_count_titles = 6 }
					}
					primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = isolated } }
				}
			}
			d_mansia = {
				is_titular = no
			}
		}

	}
}

k_mansia = {
	color = { 223 170 27 }
	color2 = { 255 255 255 }
	capital = 892
	gain_effect = {
		primary_title = { copy_title_laws = d_mansia }
		
		any_demesne_title = {
			limit = {
				title = d_mansia
				OR = {
					k_mansia = { is_titular = yes }
					FROM = { has_character_flag = creating_title_loop }
				}
			}
			de_jure_liege = k_mansia
			hidden_tooltip = { FROM = {	set_character_flag = creating_title_loop } }
		}
		hidden_tooltip = { clr_character_flag = creating_title_loop }

	}
	allow = {
		OR = {
			AND = {
			
				primary_title = { title = d_mansia }
				num_of_duke_titles = 3
			}
			k_mansia = {
				is_titular = no
			}
		}

	}
}

	color = { 223 170 27 }
	color2 = { 255 255 255 }
	capital = 892

	gain_effect = {

	color = { 227 174 31 }

			}

							}

						name = d_surgut_de_jure_liege

				}
			}
			hidden_tooltip = { FROM = {	set_character_flag = creating_title_loop } }

				primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = no_liege } }
				OR = {

					FROM = { has_character_flag = creating_title_loop }
				}
			}
			de_jure_liege = d_syrt
			hidden_tooltip = {
				location = {
					add_province_modifier = {
						name = d_syrt_de_jure_liege
						duration = -1
					}
					remove_province_modifier = no_liege
				}
			}
			hidden_tooltip = { FROM = {	set_character_flag = creating_title_loop } }
		}
		hidden_tooltip = { clr_character_flag = creating_title_loop }

	}
	allow = {
		OR = {
			AND = {
			
				primary_title = { title = c_syrt }
				primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = no_liege } }
				OR = {
					AND = {
						num_of_count_titles = 3
						NOT = { num_of_count_titles = 6 }
					}
					primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = isolated } }
				}
			}
			d_syrt = {
				is_titular = no
			}
		}

	}
}

	color = { 207 172 77 }
	color2 = { 255 255 255 }
	capital = 614
	gain_effect = {
		primary_title = { copy_title_laws = c_southern_ural }
		
		IF = {
			limit = {
				d_southern_ural = { is_titular = yes }
			}
			character_event = { 
		id = nivve.0 tooltip = "Kingdom of Europa becomes the de jure liege of d_southern_ural" 
				}
			}
		any_demesne_title = {
			limit = {
				tier = COUNT
				location = { 
					AND = {
						has_province_modifier = no_liege
						OR = {
							is_primary_holder_title = yes
							any_neighbor_province = {
								owner = { character = ROOT }
							}
						}
					}
				}
				OR = {
					d_southern_ural = { is_titular = yes }
					FROM = { has_character_flag = creating_title_loop }
				}
			}
			de_jure_liege = d_southern_ural
			hidden_tooltip = {
				location = {
					add_province_modifier = {
						name = d_southern_ural_de_jure_liege
						duration = -1
					}
					remove_province_modifier = no_liege
				}
			}
			hidden_tooltip = { FROM = {	set_character_flag = creating_title_loop } }
		}
		hidden_tooltip = { clr_character_flag = creating_title_loop }

	}
	allow = {
		OR = {
			AND = {
			
				primary_title = { title = c_southern_ural }
				primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = no_liege } }
				OR = {
					AND = {
						num_of_count_titles = 3
						NOT = { num_of_count_titles = 6 }
					}
					primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = isolated } }
				}
			}

					remove_province_modifier = no_liege
				}
			}
			hidden_tooltip = { FROM = {	set_character_flag = creating_title_loop } }
		}
		hidden_tooltip = { clr_character_flag = creating_title_loop }

	}
	allow = {
		OR = {
			AND = {
			
				primary_title = { title = c_mountain_cheremisa }
				primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = no_liege } }
				OR = {
					AND = {
						num_of_count_titles = 3
						NOT = { num_of_count_titles = 6 }
					}
					primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = isolated } }
				}
			}
			d_mountain_cheremisa = {
				is_titular = no
			}
		}

	}
}

	color2 = { 255 255 255 }

			limit = {
				title = d_mountain_cheremisa
				OR = {
					k_mountain_cheremisa = { is_titular = yes }
					FROM = { has_character_flag = creating_title_loop }

d_burtasy = {
	color = { 243 183 22 }
	color2 = { 255 255 255 }
	capital = 592
	gain_effect = {
		primary_title = { copy_title_laws = c_burtasy }
		
		IF = {
			limit = {
				d_burtasy = { is_titular = yes }
			}
			character_event = { 
		id = nivve.0 tooltip = "Kingdom of Europa becomes the de jure liege of d_burtasy" 
				}
			}
		any_demesne_title = {
			limit = {
				tier = COUNT
				location = { 
					AND = {
						has_province_modifier = no_liege
						OR = {
							is_primary_holder_title = yes
							any_neighbor_province = {
								owner = { character = ROOT }
							}
						}
					}
				}
				OR = {
					d_burtasy = { is_titular = yes }
					FROM = { has_character_flag = creating_title_loop }
				}
			}
			de_jure_liege = d_burtasy
			hidden_tooltip = {
				location = {
					add_province_modifier = {
						name = d_burtasy_de_jure_liege
						duration = -1
					}
					remove_province_modifier = no_liege
				}
			}
			hidden_tooltip = { FROM = {	set_character_flag = creating_title_loop } }
		}
		hidden_tooltip = { clr_character_flag = creating_title_loop }

	}
	allow = {
		OR = {
			AND = {
			
				primary_title = { title = c_burtasy }
				primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = no_liege } }
				OR = {
					AND = {
						num_of_count_titles = 3
						NOT = { num_of_count_titles = 6 }
					}
					primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = isolated } }
				}
			}
			d_burtasy = {
				is_titular = no
			}
		}

	}
}

			AND = {
			
				primary_title = { title = c_tmutarakan }
				primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = no_liege } }
				OR = {
					AND = {
						num_of_count_titles = 3
						NOT = { num_of_count_titles = 6 }
					}
					primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = isolated } }
				}
			}
			d_tmutarakan = {
				is_titular = no
			}
		}

	}
}

	color2 = { 255 255 20 }

		any_demesne_title = {
			limit = {
				title = d_tmutarakan
				OR = {

					FROM = { has_character_flag = creating_title_loop }

d_lower_don = {
	color = { 230 190 84 }
	color2 = { 255 255 255 }
	capital = 563
	gain_effect = {
		primary_title = { copy_title_laws = c_lower_don }
		
		IF = {
			limit = {
				d_lower_don = { is_titular = yes }
			}
			character_event = { 
		id = nivve.0 tooltip = "Kingdom of Europa becomes the de jure liege of d_lower_don" 
				}
			}
		any_demesne_title = {
			limit = {
				tier = COUNT
				location = { 
					AND = {
						has_province_modifier = no_liege
						OR = {
							is_primary_holder_title = yes
							any_neighbor_province = {
								owner = { character = ROOT }
							}
						}
					}
				}
				OR = {
					d_lower_don = { is_titular = yes }
					FROM = { has_character_flag = creating_title_loop }
				}
			}
			de_jure_liege = d_lower_don
			hidden_tooltip = {
				location = {
					add_province_modifier = {
						name = d_lower_don_de_jure_liege
						duration = -1
					}
					remove_province_modifier = no_liege
				}
			}
			hidden_tooltip = { FROM = {	set_character_flag = creating_title_loop } }
		}
		hidden_tooltip = { clr_character_flag = creating_title_loop }

	}
	allow = {
		OR = {
			AND = {
			
				primary_title = { title = c_lower_don }
				primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = no_liege } }
				OR = {
					AND = {
						num_of_count_titles = 3
						NOT = { num_of_count_titles = 6 }
					}
					primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = isolated } }
				}
			}
			d_lower_don = {
				is_titular = no
			}
		}

	}
}

		}

	}
}

d_yegorlyk = {
	color = { 255 214 92 }
	color2 = { 255 255 255 }
	capital = 606
	gain_effect = {
		primary_title = { copy_title_laws = c_yegorlyk }
		
		IF = {
			limit = {
				d_yegorlyk = { is_titular = yes }
			}
			character_event = { 
		id = nivve.0 tooltip = "Kingdom of Europa becomes the de jure liege of d_yegorlyk" 
				}
			}
		any_demesne_title = {
			limit = {
				tier = COUNT
				location = { 
					AND = {
						has_province_modifier = no_liege
						OR = {
							is_primary_holder_title = yes
							any_neighbor_province = {
								owner = { character = ROOT }
							}
						}
					}
				}
				OR = {
					d_yegorlyk = { is_titular = yes }
					FROM = { has_character_flag = creating_title_loop }
				}
			}
			de_jure_liege = d_yegorlyk
			hidden_tooltip = {
				location = {
					add_province_modifier = {
						name = d_yegorlyk_de_jure_liege
						duration = -1
					}
					remove_province_modifier = no_liege
				}
			}
			hidden_tooltip = { FROM = {	set_character_flag = creating_title_loop } }
		}
		hidden_tooltip = { clr_character_flag = creating_title_loop }

	}
	allow = {
		OR = {
			AND = {
			
				primary_title = { title = c_yegorlyk }
				primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = no_liege } }
				OR = {
					AND = {
						num_of_count_titles = 3
						NOT = { num_of_count_titles = 6 }
					}
					primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = isolated } }
				}
			}
			d_yegorlyk = {
				is_titular = no
			}
		}

	}
}

				primary_title = { title = d_azov }
				num_of_duke_titles = 3
			}
			k_azov = {
				is_titular = no
			}
		}

	}
}

e_azov = {
	color = { 226 187 83 }
	color2 = { 255 255 255 }
	capital = 597
	short_name = yes
	gain_effect = {
		primary_title = { copy_title_laws = k_azov }
		
		any_demesne_title = {
			limit = {
				title = k_azov
				OR = {
					e_azov = { is_titular = yes }
					FROM = { has_character_flag = creating_title_loop }
				}
			}
			de_jure_liege = e_azov
			hidden_tooltip = { FROM = {	set_character_flag = creating_title_loop } }
		}

		OR = {
			AND = {

				num_of_king_titles = 3
			}

d_kuban = {
	color = { 230 191 87 }
	color2 = { 255 255 255 }
	capital = 599
	gain_effect = {
		primary_title = { copy_title_laws = c_kuban }
		
		IF = {
			limit = {
				d_kuban = { is_titular = yes }
			}
			character_event = { 
		id = nivve.0 tooltip = "Kingdom of Europa becomes the de jure liege of d_kuban" 
				}
			}
		any_demesne_title = {
			limit = {
				tier = COUNT
				location = { 
					AND = {
						has_province_modifier = no_liege
						OR = {
							is_primary_holder_title = yes
							any_neighbor_province = {
								owner = { character = ROOT }
							}
						}
					}
				}
				OR = {
					d_kuban = { is_titular = yes }
					FROM = { has_character_flag = creating_title_loop }
				}
			}
			de_jure_liege = d_kuban
			hidden_tooltip = {
				location = {
					add_province_modifier = {
						name = d_kuban_de_jure_liege
						duration = -1
					}
					remove_province_modifier = no_liege
				}
			}
			hidden_tooltip = { FROM = {	set_character_flag = creating_title_loop } }
		}
		hidden_tooltip = { clr_character_flag = creating_title_loop }

	}
	allow = {
		OR = {
			AND = {
			
				primary_title = { title = c_kuban }
				primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = no_liege } }
				OR = {
					AND = {
						num_of_count_titles = 3
						NOT = { num_of_count_titles = 6 }
					}
					primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = isolated } }
				}
			}
			d_kuban = {
				is_titular = no
			}
		}

	}
}

	gain_effect = {

		any_demesne_title = {
			limit = {
				title = k_mangyshlak
				OR = {
					e_mangyshlak = { is_titular = yes }
					FROM = { has_character_flag = creating_title_loop }
				}
			}
			de_jure_liege = e_mangyshlak
			hidden_tooltip = { FROM = {	set_character_flag = creating_title_loop } }
		}
		hidden_tooltip = { clr_character_flag = creating_title_loop }

	}
	allow = {
		OR = {
			AND = {
			
				primary_title = { title = k_mangyshlak }
				num_of_king_titles = 3
			}
			e_mangyshlak = {
				is_titular = no
			}
		}

	}
}

d_aral = {
	color = { 236 182 36 }
	color2 = { 255 255 255 }
	capital = 622
	gain_effect = {
		primary_title = { copy_title_laws = c_aral }
		
		IF = {
			limit = {
				d_aral = { is_titular = yes }
			}
			character_event = { 
		id = nivve.0 tooltip = "Kingdom of Europa becomes the de jure liege of d_aral" 
				}
			}
		any_demesne_title = {
			limit = {
				tier = COUNT
				location = { 
					AND = {
						has_province_modifier = no_liege
						OR = {
							is_primary_holder_title = yes
							any_neighbor_province = {
								owner = { character = ROOT }
							}
						}
					}
				}
				OR = {
					d_aral = { is_titular = yes }
					FROM = { has_character_flag = creating_title_loop }
				}
			}
			de_jure_liege = d_aral
			hidden_tooltip = {
				location = {
					add_province_modifier = {
						name = d_aral_de_jure_liege
						duration = -1
					}
					remove_province_modifier = no_liege
				}
			}
			hidden_tooltip = { FROM = {	set_character_flag = creating_title_loop } }
		}
		hidden_tooltip = { clr_character_flag = creating_title_loop }

	}
	allow = {
		OR = {
			AND = {
			
				primary_title = { title = c_aral }
				primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = no_liege } }
				OR = {
					AND = {
						num_of_count_titles = 3
						NOT = { num_of_count_titles = 6 }
					}
					primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = isolated } }
				}
			}
			d_aral = {
				is_titular = no
			}
		}

	}
}

			}
		}

	}
}

d_nishapur = {
	color = { 111 162 21 }
	color2 = { 255 255 255 }
	capital = 634
	gain_effect = {
		primary_title = { copy_title_laws = c_nishapur }
		
		IF = {
			limit = {
				d_nishapur = { is_titular = yes }
			}
			character_event = { 
		id = nivve.0 tooltip = "Kingdom of Europa becomes the de jure liege of d_nishapur" 
				}
			}
		any_demesne_title = {
			limit = {
				tier = COUNT
				location = { 
					AND = {
						has_province_modifier = no_liege
						OR = {
							is_primary_holder_title = yes
							any_neighbor_province = {
								owner = { character = ROOT }
							}
						}
					}
				}
				OR = {
					d_nishapur = { is_titular = yes }
					FROM = { has_character_flag = creating_title_loop }
				}
			}
			de_jure_liege = d_nishapur
			hidden_tooltip = {
				location = {
					add_province_modifier = {
						name = d_nishapur_de_jure_liege
						duration = -1
					}
					remove_province_modifier = no_liege
				}
			}
			hidden_tooltip = { FROM = {	set_character_flag = creating_title_loop } }
		}
		hidden_tooltip = { clr_character_flag = creating_title_loop }

	}
	allow = {
		OR = {
			AND = {
			
				primary_title = { title = c_nishapur }
				primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = no_liege } }
				OR = {
					AND = {
						num_of_count_titles = 3
						NOT = { num_of_count_titles = 6 }
					}
					primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = isolated } }
				}
			}
			d_nishapur = {
				is_titular = no
			}
		}

	}
}

			}
		any_demesne_title = {
			limit = {
				tier = COUNT
				location = { 
					AND = {
						has_province_modifier = no_liege
						OR = {
							is_primary_holder_title = yes
							any_neighbor_province = {
								owner = { character = ROOT }
							}
						}
					}
				}
				OR = {
					d_esfahan = { is_titular = yes }
					FROM = { has_character_flag = creating_title_loop }
				}
			}
			de_jure_liege = d_esfahan
			hidden_tooltip = {
				location = {
					add_province_modifier = {
						name = d_esfahan_de_jure_liege
						duration = -1
					}
					remove_province_modifier = no_liege
				}
			}
			hidden_tooltip = { FROM = {	set_character_flag = creating_title_loop } }
		}
		hidden_tooltip = { clr_character_flag = creating_title_loop }

	}
	allow = {
		OR = {
			AND = {
			
				primary_title = { title = c_esfahan }
				primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = no_liege } }
				OR = {
					AND = {
						num_of_count_titles = 3
						NOT = { num_of_count_titles = 6 }
					}
					primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = isolated } }
				}
			}
			d_esfahan = {
				is_titular = no
			}
		}

	}
}

				location = {

						name = d_kerman_de_jure_liege
						duration = -1
					}
					remove_province_modifier = no_liege
				}
			}
			hidden_tooltip = { FROM = {	set_character_flag = creating_title_loop } }
		}
		hidden_tooltip = { clr_character_flag = creating_title_loop }

	}
	allow = {
		OR = {
			AND = {
			
				primary_title = { title = c_kerman }
				primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = no_liege } }
				OR = {
					AND = {
						num_of_count_titles = 3
						NOT = { num_of_count_titles = 6 }
					}
					primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = isolated } }
				}
			}
			d_kerman = {
				is_titular = no
			}
		}

	}
}

d_ladistan = {
	color = { 114 134 79 }
	color2 = { 255 255 255 }
	capital = 642
	gain_effect = {
		primary_title = { copy_title_laws = c_ladistan }
		
		IF = {
			limit = {
				d_ladistan = { is_titular = yes }
			}
			character_event = { 
		id = nivve.0 tooltip = "Kingdom of Europa becomes the de jure liege of d_ladistan" 
				}
			}
		any_demesne_title = {
			limit = {
				tier = COUNT
				location = { 
					AND = {
						has_province_modifier = no_liege
						OR = {
							is_primary_holder_title = yes
							any_neighbor_province = {
								owner = { character = ROOT }
							}
						}
					}
				}
				OR = {
					d_ladistan = { is_titular = yes }
					FROM = { has_character_flag = creating_title_loop }
				}
			}
			de_jure_liege = d_ladistan
			hidden_tooltip = {
				location = {
					add_province_modifier = {
						name = d_ladistan_de_jure_liege
						duration = -1
					}
					remove_province_modifier = no_liege
				}
			}
			hidden_tooltip = { FROM = {	set_character_flag = creating_title_loop } }
		}
		hidden_tooltip = { clr_character_flag = creating_title_loop }

	}
	allow = {
		OR = {
			AND = {
			
				primary_title = { title = c_ladistan }
				primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = no_liege } }
				OR = {
					AND = {
						num_of_count_titles = 3
						NOT = { num_of_count_titles = 6 }
					}
					primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = isolated } }
				}
			}
			d_ladistan = {
				is_titular = no
			}
		}

			}
			d_qom = {
				is_titular = no
			}
		}

	}
}

			limit = {

				OR = {

					FROM = { has_character_flag = creating_title_loop }

d_hamadan = {
	color = { 190 231 118 }
	color2 = { 255 255 255 }
	capital = 658
	gain_effect = {
		primary_title = { copy_title_laws = c_hamadan }
		
		IF = {
			limit = {
				d_hamadan = { is_titular = yes }
			}
			character_event = { 
		id = nivve.0 tooltip = "Kingdom of Europa becomes the de jure liege of d_hamadan" 
				}
			}
		any_demesne_title = {
			limit = {
				tier = COUNT
				location = { 
					AND = {
						has_province_modifier = no_liege
						OR = {
							is_primary_holder_title = yes
							any_neighbor_province = {
								owner = { character = ROOT }
							}
						}
					}
				}
				OR = {
					d_hamadan = { is_titular = yes }
					FROM = { has_character_flag = creating_title_loop }
				}
			}
			de_jure_liege = d_hamadan
			hidden_tooltip = {
				location = {
					add_province_modifier = {
						name = d_hamadan_de_jure_liege
						duration = -1
					}
					remove_province_modifier = no_liege
				}
			}
			hidden_tooltip = { FROM = {	set_character_flag = creating_title_loop } }
		}
		hidden_tooltip = { clr_character_flag = creating_title_loop }

	}
	allow = {
		OR = {
			AND = {
			
				primary_title = { title = c_hamadan }
				primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = no_liege } }
				OR = {
					AND = {
						num_of_count_titles = 3
						NOT = { num_of_count_titles = 6 }
					}
					primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = isolated } }
				}
			}
			d_hamadan = {
				is_titular = no
			}
		}

	}
}

		hidden_tooltip = { clr_character_flag = creating_title_loop }

	}
	allow = {
		OR = {
			AND = {
			
				primary_title = { title = d_zahedan }
				num_of_duke_titles = 3
			}
			k_zahedan = {
				is_titular = no
			}
		}

	}
}

d_bam = {
	color = { 144 177 88 }
	color2 = { 255 255 255 }
	capital = 853
	gain_effect = {
		primary_title = { copy_title_laws = c_bam }
		
		IF = {
			limit = {
				d_bam = { is_titular = yes }
			}
			character_event = { 
		id = nivve.0 tooltip = "Kingdom of Europa becomes the de jure liege of d_bam" 
				}
			}
		any_demesne_title = {
			limit = {
				tier = COUNT
				location = { 
					AND = {
						has_province_modifier = no_liege
						OR = {
							is_primary_holder_title = yes
							any_neighbor_province = {
								owner = { character = ROOT }
							}
						}
					}
				}
				OR = {
					d_bam = { is_titular = yes }
					FROM = { has_character_flag = creating_title_loop }
				}
			}
			de_jure_liege = d_bam
			hidden_tooltip = {
				location = {
					add_province_modifier = {
						name = d_bam_de_jure_liege
						duration = -1
					}
					remove_province_modifier = no_liege
				}
			}
			hidden_tooltip = { FROM = {	set_character_flag = creating_title_loop } }
		}
		hidden_tooltip = { clr_character_flag = creating_title_loop }

	}
	allow = {
		OR = {
			AND = {
			
				primary_title = { title = c_bam }
				primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = no_liege } }
				OR = {
					AND = {
						num_of_count_titles = 3
						NOT = { num_of_count_titles = 6 }
					}
					primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = isolated } }
				}
			}
			d_bam = {
				is_titular = no
			}
		}

	}
}

	gain_effect = {
		primary_title = { copy_title_laws = k_oromieh }
		
		any_demesne_title = {
			limit = {
				title = k_oromieh
				OR = {
					e_oromieh = { is_titular = yes }
					FROM = { has_character_flag = creating_title_loop }
				}
			}
			de_jure_liege = e_oromieh
			hidden_tooltip = { FROM = {	set_character_flag = creating_title_loop } }
		}
		hidden_tooltip = { clr_character_flag = creating_title_loop }

	}
	allow = {
		OR = {
			AND = {
			
				primary_title = { title = k_oromieh }
				num_of_king_titles = 3
			}
			e_oromieh = {
				is_titular = no
			}
		}

	}
}

d_gilan = {
	color = { 64 89 136 }
	color2 = { 255 255 255 }
	capital = 666
	gain_effect = {
		primary_title = { copy_title_laws = c_gilan }
		
		IF = {
			limit = {
				d_gilan = { is_titular = yes }
			}
			character_event = { 
		id = nivve.0 tooltip = "Kingdom of Europa becomes the de jure liege of d_gilan" 
				}
			}
		any_demesne_title = {
			limit = {
				tier = COUNT
				location = { 
					AND = {
						has_province_modifier = no_liege
						OR = {
							is_primary_holder_title = yes
							any_neighbor_province = {
								owner = { character = ROOT }
							}
						}
					}
				}
				OR = {
					d_gilan = { is_titular = yes }
					FROM = { has_character_flag = creating_title_loop }
				}
			}
			de_jure_liege = d_gilan
			hidden_tooltip = {
				location = {
					add_province_modifier = {
						name = d_gilan_de_jure_liege
						duration = -1
					}
					remove_province_modifier = no_liege
				}
			}
			hidden_tooltip = { FROM = {	set_character_flag = creating_title_loop } }
		}
		hidden_tooltip = { clr_character_flag = creating_title_loop }

	}
	allow = {
		OR = {
			AND = {
			
				primary_title = { title = c_gilan }
				primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = no_liege } }
				OR = {
					AND = {
						num_of_count_titles = 3
						NOT = { num_of_count_titles = 6 }
					}
					primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = isolated } }
				}
			}
			d_gilan = {
				is_titular = no
			}
		}

	}
}

k_gilan = {
	color = { 64 89 136 }
	color2 = { 255 255 255 }
	capital = 666
	gain_effect = {
		primary_title = { copy_title_laws = d_gilan }

			limit = {
				title = d_gilan

				}
			}

		}
		hidden_tooltip = { clr_character_flag = creating_title_loop }

	}
	allow = {
		OR = {
			AND = {
			
				primary_title = { title = d_gilan }
				num_of_duke_titles = 3
			}
			k_gilan = {
				is_titular = no
			}
		}

	}

			de_jure_liege = e_shemakha
			hidden_tooltip = { FROM = {	set_character_flag = creating_title_loop } }
		}
		hidden_tooltip = { clr_character_flag = creating_title_loop }

	}
	allow = {
		OR = {
			AND = {
			
				primary_title = { title = k_shemakha }
				num_of_king_titles = 3
			}
			e_shemakha = {
				is_titular = no
			}
		}

	}
}

				}
			}

	color2 = { 255 255 255 }
	capital = 627
	gain_effect = {
		primary_title = { copy_title_laws = c_kara-kum }
		
		IF = {
			limit = {
				d_kara-kum = { is_titular = yes }
			}
			character_event = { 
		id = nivve.0 tooltip = "Kingdom of Europa becomes the de jure liege of d_kara-kum" 
				}
			}
		any_demesne_title = {
			limit = {
				tier = COUNT
				location = { 
					AND = {
						has_province_modifier = no_liege
						OR = {
							is_primary_holder_title = yes
							any_neighbor_province = {
								owner = { character = ROOT }
							}
						}
					}
				}
				OR = {
					d_kara-kum = { is_titular = yes }
					FROM = { has_character_flag = creating_title_loop }
				}
			}
			de_jure_liege = d_kara-kum
			hidden_tooltip = {
				location = {
					add_province_modifier = {
						name = d_kara-kum_de_jure_liege
						duration = -1
					}
					remove_province_modifier = no_liege
				}
			}
			hidden_tooltip = { FROM = {	set_character_flag = creating_title_loop } }
		}
		hidden_tooltip = { clr_character_flag = creating_title_loop }

	}
	allow = {
		OR = {
			AND = {
			
				primary_title = { title = c_kara-kum }
				primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = no_liege } }
				OR = {
					AND = {
						num_of_count_titles = 3
						NOT = { num_of_count_titles = 6 }
					}
					primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = isolated } }
				}
			}
			d_kara-kum = {
				is_titular = no
			}
		}

	}
}

k_kara-kum = {
	color = { 165 243 30 }
	color2 = { 255 255 255 }
	capital = 627
	gain_effect = {
		primary_title = { copy_title_laws = d_kara-kum }
		
		any_demesne_title = {
			limit = {
				title = d_kara-kum
				OR = {
					k_kara-kum = { is_titular = yes }
					FROM = { has_character_flag = creating_title_loop }
				}
			}
			de_jure_liege = k_kara-kum
			hidden_tooltip = { FROM = {	set_character_flag = creating_title_loop } }
		}
		hidden_tooltip = { clr_character_flag = creating_title_loop }

	}
	allow = {
		OR = {
			AND = {
			
				primary_title = { title = d_kara-kum }
				num_of_duke_titles = 3
			}
			k_kara-kum = {
				is_titular = no
			}
		}

	}
}

	color = { 165 243 30 }
	color2 = { 255 255 255 }
	capital = 627
	short_name = yes
	gain_effect = {
		primary_title = { copy_title_laws = k_kara-kum }
		
		any_demesne_title = {
			limit = {
				title = k_kara-kum
				OR = {
					e_kara-kum = { is_titular = yes }
					FROM = { has_character_flag = creating_title_loop }
				}
			}
			de_jure_liege = e_kara-kum
			hidden_tooltip = { FROM = {	set_character_flag = creating_title_loop } }
		}
		hidden_tooltip = { clr_character_flag = creating_title_loop }

	}
	allow = {
		OR = {
			AND = {
			
				primary_title = { title = k_kara-kum }
				num_of_king_titles = 3
			}
			e_kara-kum = {
				is_titular = no
			}
		}

	}
}

d_bukhara = {
	color = { 169 247 34 }
	color2 = { 255 255 255 }
	capital = 628
	gain_effect = {
		primary_title = { copy_title_laws = c_bukhara }
		
		IF = {
			limit = {
				d_bukhara = { is_titular = yes }
			}
			character_event = { 
		id = nivve.0 tooltip = "Kingdom of Europa becomes the de jure liege of d_bukhara" 
				}
			}
		any_demesne_title = {
			limit = {
				tier = COUNT
				location = { 
					AND = {
						has_province_modifier = no_liege
						OR = {
							is_primary_holder_title = yes
							any_neighbor_province = {
								owner = { character = ROOT }
							}
						}
					}
				}
				OR = {

					FROM = { has_character_flag = creating_title_loop }
				}

						name = d_bukhara_de_jure_liege
						duration = -1
					}
					remove_province_modifier = no_liege
				}
			}
			hidden_tooltip = { FROM = {	set_character_flag = creating_title_loop } }
		}
		hidden_tooltip = { clr_character_flag = creating_title_loop }

	}
	allow = {

				primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = no_liege } }
				OR = {

						num_of_count_titles = 3
						NOT = { num_of_count_titles = 6 }

			}
			character_event = { 
		id = nivve.0 tooltip = "Kingdom of Europa becomes the de jure liege of d_al_nadjaf" 
				}
			}
		any_demesne_title = {
			limit = {
				tier = COUNT
				location = { 
					AND = {
						has_province_modifier = no_liege
						OR = {
							is_primary_holder_title = yes
							any_neighbor_province = {
								owner = { character = ROOT }
							}
						}
					}
				}
				OR = {
					d_al_nadjaf = { is_titular = yes }
					FROM = { has_character_flag = creating_title_loop }
				}
			}
			de_jure_liege = d_al_nadjaf
			hidden_tooltip = {
				location = {
					add_province_modifier = {
						name = d_al_nadjaf_de_jure_liege
						duration = -1
					}
					remove_province_modifier = no_liege
				}
			}
			hidden_tooltip = { FROM = {	set_character_flag = creating_title_loop } }
		}
		hidden_tooltip = { clr_character_flag = creating_title_loop }

	}
	allow = {
		OR = {
			AND = {
			
				primary_title = { title = c_al_nadjaf }
				primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = no_liege } }
				OR = {
					AND = {
						num_of_count_titles = 3
						NOT = { num_of_count_titles = 6 }
					}
					primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = isolated } }
				}
			}
			d_al_nadjaf = {
				is_titular = no
			}
		}

	}
}

						OR = {
							is_primary_holder_title = yes
							any_neighbor_province = {
								owner = { character = ROOT }
							}
						}
					}
				}
				OR = {
					d_rummah = { is_titular = yes }
					FROM = { has_character_flag = creating_title_loop }
				}
			}
			de_jure_liege = d_rummah
			hidden_tooltip = {
				location = {
					add_province_modifier = {
						name = d_rummah_de_jure_liege
						duration = -1
					}
					remove_province_modifier = no_liege
				}
			}
			hidden_tooltip = { FROM = {	set_character_flag = creating_title_loop } }
		}
		hidden_tooltip = { clr_character_flag = creating_title_loop }

	}
	allow = {
		OR = {
			AND = {
			
				primary_title = { title = c_rummah }
				primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = no_liege } }
				OR = {
					AND = {
						num_of_count_titles = 3
						NOT = { num_of_count_titles = 6 }
					}
					primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = isolated } }
				}
			}
			d_rummah = {
				is_titular = no
			}
		}

	}
}

d_kuwait = {
	color = { 96 149 247 }
	color2 = { 255 255 255 }
	capital = 650
	gain_effect = {
		primary_title = { copy_title_laws = c_kuwait }
		
		IF = {
			limit = {
				d_kuwait = { is_titular = yes }
			}
			character_event = { 
		id = nivve.0 tooltip = "Kingdom of Europa becomes the de jure liege of d_kuwait" 
				}
			}
		any_demesne_title = {
			limit = {
				tier = COUNT
				location = { 
					AND = {
						has_province_modifier = no_liege
						OR = {
							is_primary_holder_title = yes
							any_neighbor_province = {
								owner = { character = ROOT }
							}
						}
					}
				}
				OR = {
					d_kuwait = { is_titular = yes }
					FROM = { has_character_flag = creating_title_loop }
				}
			}
			de_jure_liege = d_kuwait
			hidden_tooltip = {
				location = {
					add_province_modifier = {
						name = d_kuwait_de_jure_liege
						duration = -1
					}
					remove_province_modifier = no_liege
				}
			}
			hidden_tooltip = { FROM = {	set_character_flag = creating_title_loop } }
		}
		hidden_tooltip = { clr_character_flag = creating_title_loop }

	}
	allow = {
		OR = {
			AND = {
			
				primary_title = { title = c_kuwait }
				primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = no_liege } }
				OR = {
					AND = {
						num_of_count_titles = 3
						NOT = { num_of_count_titles = 6 }
					}
					primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = isolated } }
				}
			}
			d_kuwait = {

						duration = -1
					}
					remove_province_modifier = no_liege
				}
			}
			hidden_tooltip = { FROM = {	set_character_flag = creating_title_loop } }
		}
		hidden_tooltip = { clr_character_flag = creating_title_loop }

	}
	allow = {
		OR = {
			AND = {
			
				primary_title = { title = c_deir }
				primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = no_liege } }
				OR = {
					AND = {
						num_of_count_titles = 3
						NOT = { num_of_count_titles = 6 }
					}
					primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = isolated } }
				}
			}
			d_deir = {
				is_titular = no
			}
		}

	}
}

	color = { 137 177 250 }
	color2 = { 255 255 255 }
	capital = 696
	gain_effect = {
		primary_title = { copy_title_laws = c_euphrates }
		
		IF = {
			limit = {
				d_euphrates = { is_titular = yes }
			}
			character_event = { 
		id = nivve.0 tooltip = "Kingdom of Europa becomes the de jure liege of d_euphrates" 
				}
			}
		any_demesne_title = {
			limit = {
				tier = COUNT
				location = { 
					AND = {
						has_province_modifier = no_liege
						OR = {
							is_primary_holder_title = yes
							any_neighbor_province = {
								owner = { character = ROOT }
							}
						}
					}
				}
				OR = {
					d_euphrates = { is_titular = yes }
					FROM = { has_character_flag = creating_title_loop }
				}
			}
			de_jure_liege = d_euphrates
			hidden_tooltip = {
				location = {
					add_province_modifier = {
						name = d_euphrates_de_jure_liege
						duration = -1
					}
					remove_province_modifier = no_liege
				}
			}
			hidden_tooltip = { FROM = {	set_character_flag = creating_title_loop } }
		}
		hidden_tooltip = { clr_character_flag = creating_title_loop }

	}
	allow = {

			AND = {
			
				primary_title = { title = c_euphrates }
				primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = no_liege } }
				OR = {

						num_of_count_titles = 3
						NOT = { num_of_count_titles = 6 }

					primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = isolated } }
				}
			}
			d_bira = {
				is_titular = no
			}
		}

	}
}

d_al_jazira = {
	color = { 13 93 240 }
	color2 = { 255 255 255 }
	capital = 698
	gain_effect = {
		primary_title = { copy_title_laws = c_al_jazira }
		
		IF = {
			limit = {
				d_al_jazira = { is_titular = yes }
			}
			character_event = { 
		id = nivve.0 tooltip = "Kingdom of Europa becomes the de jure liege of d_al_jazira" 
				}
			}
		any_demesne_title = {
			limit = {
				tier = COUNT
				location = { 
					AND = {
						has_province_modifier = no_liege
						OR = {
							is_primary_holder_title = yes
							any_neighbor_province = {
								owner = { character = ROOT }
							}
						}
					}
				}
				OR = {
					d_al_jazira = { is_titular = yes }
					FROM = { has_character_flag = creating_title_loop }
				}
			}
			de_jure_liege = d_al_jazira
			hidden_tooltip = {
				location = {
					add_province_modifier = {
						name = d_al_jazira_de_jure_liege
						duration = -1
					}
					remove_province_modifier = no_liege
				}
			}
			hidden_tooltip = { FROM = {	set_character_flag = creating_title_loop } }
		}
		hidden_tooltip = { clr_character_flag = creating_title_loop }

	}
	allow = {
		OR = {
			AND = {
			
				primary_title = { title = c_al_jazira }
				primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = no_liege } }
				OR = {
					AND = {
						num_of_count_titles = 3
						NOT = { num_of_count_titles = 6 }
					}
					primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = isolated } }
				}
			}
			d_al_jazira = {
				is_titular = no
			}
		}

	}

					FROM = { has_character_flag = creating_title_loop }
				}
			}
			de_jure_liege = k_severin
			hidden_tooltip = { FROM = {	set_character_flag = creating_title_loop } }
		}
		hidden_tooltip = { clr_character_flag = creating_title_loop }

	}
	allow = {
		OR = {
			AND = {
			
				primary_title = { title = d_severin }
				num_of_duke_titles = 3
			}
			k_severin = {
				is_titular = no
			}
		}

	}
}

	color = { 247 201 78 }
	color2 = { 255 255 255 }
	capital = 516

	gain_effect = {

d_galaz = {
	color = { 217 102 253 }
	color2 = { 255 255 255 }
	capital = 511
	gain_effect = {
		primary_title = { copy_title_laws = c_galaz }
		
		IF = {
			limit = {
				d_galaz = { is_titular = yes }
			}
			character_event = { 
		id = nivve.0 tooltip = "Kingdom of Europa becomes the de jure liege of d_galaz" 
				}
			}
		any_demesne_title = {
			limit = {
				tier = COUNT
				location = { 
					AND = {
						has_province_modifier = no_liege
						OR = {
							is_primary_holder_title = yes
							any_neighbor_province = {
								owner = { character = ROOT }
							}
						}
					}
				}
				OR = {
					d_galaz = { is_titular = yes }
					FROM = { has_character_flag = creating_title_loop }
				}
			}
			de_jure_liege = d_galaz
			hidden_tooltip = {
				location = {
					add_province_modifier = {
						name = d_galaz_de_jure_liege
						duration = -1
					}
					remove_province_modifier = no_liege
				}
			}
			hidden_tooltip = { FROM = {	set_character_flag = creating_title_loop } }
		}
		hidden_tooltip = { clr_character_flag = creating_title_loop }

	}
	allow = {
		OR = {
			AND = {
			
				primary_title = { title = c_galaz }
				primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = no_liege } }
				OR = {
					AND = {
						num_of_count_titles = 3
						NOT = { num_of_count_titles = 6 }
					}
					primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = isolated } }
				}
			}
			d_galaz = {
				is_titular = no
			}
		}

	}
}

	short_name = yes
	gain_effect = {
		primary_title = { copy_title_laws = k_birlad }
		
		any_demesne_title = {
			limit = {
				title = k_birlad
				OR = {
					e_birlad = { is_titular = yes }
					FROM = { has_character_flag = creating_title_loop }
				}
			}
			de_jure_liege = e_birlad
			hidden_tooltip = { FROM = {	set_character_flag = creating_title_loop } }
		}
		hidden_tooltip = { clr_character_flag = creating_title_loop }

	}
	allow = {
		OR = {
			AND = {
			
				primary_title = { title = k_birlad }
				num_of_king_titles = 3
			}
			e_birlad = {
				is_titular = no
			}
		}

	}
}

d_pecs = {
	color = { 182 72 72 }
	color2 = { 255 255 255 }
	capital = 452
	croatian = "Pecuh"
	serbian = "Pecuj"
	german = "Fnfkirchen"
	bohemian = "Balaton"
	gain_effect = {
		primary_title = { copy_title_laws = c_pecs }
		
		IF = {
			limit = {
				d_pecs = { is_titular = yes }
			}
			character_event = { 
		id = nivve.0 tooltip = "Kingdom of Europa becomes the de jure liege of d_pecs" 
				}
			}
		any_demesne_title = {
			limit = {
				tier = COUNT
				location = { 
					AND = {
						has_province_modifier = no_liege
						OR = {
							is_primary_holder_title = yes
							any_neighbor_province = {
								owner = { character = ROOT }
							}
						}
					}
				}
				OR = {
					d_pecs = { is_titular = yes }
					FROM = { has_character_flag = creating_title_loop }
				}
			}
			de_jure_liege = d_pecs
			hidden_tooltip = {
				location = {
					add_province_modifier = {
						name = d_pecs_de_jure_liege
						duration = -1
					}
					remove_province_modifier = no_liege
				}
			}
			hidden_tooltip = { FROM = {	set_character_flag = creating_title_loop } }
		}
		hidden_tooltip = { clr_character_flag = creating_title_loop }

	}
	allow = {
		OR = {
			AND = {
			
				primary_title = { title = c_pecs }
				primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = no_liege } }
				OR = {
					AND = {
						num_of_count_titles = 3
						NOT = { num_of_count_titles = 6 }
					}
					primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = isolated } }
				}
			}
			d_pecs = {
				is_titular = no
			}
		}

	}
}

			}

					FROM = { has_character_flag = creating_title_loop }
				}
			}
			de_jure_liege = k_esztergom
			hidden_tooltip = { FROM = {	set_character_flag = creating_title_loop } }
		}
		hidden_tooltip = { clr_character_flag = creating_title_loop }

	}
	allow = {
		OR = {
			AND = {
			
				primary_title = { title = d_esztergom }
				num_of_duke_titles = 3
			}
			k_esztergom = {
				is_titular = no
			}
		}

	}
}

	color = { 214 66 66 }

d_pressburg = {
	color = { 217 69 69 }
	color2 = { 255 255 255 }
	capital = 445
	hungarian = "Pozsony"
	bohemian = "Presporok"
	gain_effect = {
		primary_title = { copy_title_laws = c_pressburg }
		
		IF = {
			limit = {
				d_pressburg = { is_titular = yes }
			}
			character_event = { 
		id = nivve.0 tooltip = "Kingdom of Europa becomes the de jure liege of d_pressburg" 
				}
			}
		any_demesne_title = {
			limit = {
				tier = COUNT
				location = { 
					AND = {
						has_province_modifier = no_liege
						OR = {
							is_primary_holder_title = yes
							any_neighbor_province = {
								owner = { character = ROOT }
							}
						}
					}
				}
				OR = {
					d_pressburg = { is_titular = yes }
					FROM = { has_character_flag = creating_title_loop }
				}
			}
			de_jure_liege = d_pressburg
			hidden_tooltip = {
				location = {
					add_province_modifier = {
						name = d_pressburg_de_jure_liege
						duration = -1
					}
					remove_province_modifier = no_liege
				}
			}
			hidden_tooltip = { FROM = {	set_character_flag = creating_title_loop } }
		}
		hidden_tooltip = { clr_character_flag = creating_title_loop }

	}
	allow = {
		OR = {
			AND = {
			
				primary_title = { title = c_pressburg }
				primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = no_liege } }
				OR = {
					AND = {
						num_of_count_titles = 3
						NOT = { num_of_count_titles = 6 }
					}
					primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = isolated } }
				}
			}
			d_pressburg = {
				is_titular = no
			}
		}

	}
}

				OR = {

					FROM = { has_character_flag = creating_title_loop }
				}
			}
			de_jure_liege = k_saris
			hidden_tooltip = { FROM = {	set_character_flag = creating_title_loop } }
		}
		hidden_tooltip = { clr_character_flag = creating_title_loop }

	}
	allow = {
		OR = {
			AND = {
			
				primary_title = { title = d_saris }
				num_of_duke_titles = 3
			}
			k_saris = {
				is_titular = no
			}
		}

	}
}

e_saris = {
	color = { 158 17 17 }
	color2 = { 255 255 255 }
	capital = 533
	short_name = yes
	german = "Scharosch"
	gain_effect = {

d_bereg = {
	color = { 160 19 19 }
	color2 = { 255 255 255 }
	capital = 537
	german = "Berg"
	gain_effect = {
		primary_title = { copy_title_laws = c_bereg }
		
		IF = {
			limit = {
				d_bereg = { is_titular = yes }
			}
			character_event = { 
		id = nivve.0 tooltip = "Kingdom of Europa becomes the de jure liege of d_bereg" 
				}
			}
		any_demesne_title = {
			limit = {
				tier = COUNT
				location = { 
					AND = {
						has_province_modifier = no_liege
						OR = {
							is_primary_holder_title = yes
							any_neighbor_province = {
								owner = { character = ROOT }
							}
						}
					}
				}
				OR = {
					d_bereg = { is_titular = yes }
					FROM = { has_character_flag = creating_title_loop }
				}
			}
			de_jure_liege = d_bereg
			hidden_tooltip = {
				location = {
					add_province_modifier = {
						name = d_bereg_de_jure_liege
						duration = -1
					}
					remove_province_modifier = no_liege
				}
			}
			hidden_tooltip = { FROM = {	set_character_flag = creating_title_loop } }
		}
		hidden_tooltip = { clr_character_flag = creating_title_loop }

	}
	allow = {
		OR = {
			AND = {
			
				primary_title = { title = c_bereg }
				primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = no_liege } }
				OR = {
					AND = {
						num_of_count_titles = 3
						NOT = { num_of_count_titles = 6 }
					}
					primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = isolated } }
				}
			}
			d_bereg = {
				is_titular = no
			}
		}

	}
}

		OR = {
			AND = {
			
				primary_title = { title = d_csanad }
				num_of_duke_titles = 3
			}
			k_csanad = {
				is_titular = no
			}
		}

	}
}

	color2 = { 255 255 255 }

	gain_effect = {

d_szekelyfold = {
	color = { 237 54 54 }
	color2 = { 255 255 255 }
	capital = 540
	german = "Szeklerland"
	gain_effect = {
		primary_title = { copy_title_laws = c_szekelyfold }
		
		IF = {
			limit = {
				d_szekelyfold = { is_titular = yes }
			}
			character_event = { 
		id = nivve.0 tooltip = "Kingdom of Europa becomes the de jure liege of d_szekelyfold" 
				}
			}
		any_demesne_title = {
			limit = {
				tier = COUNT
				location = { 
					AND = {
						has_province_modifier = no_liege
						OR = {
							is_primary_holder_title = yes
							any_neighbor_province = {
								owner = { character = ROOT }
							}
						}
					}
				}
				OR = {
					d_szekelyfold = { is_titular = yes }
					FROM = { has_character_flag = creating_title_loop }
				}
			}
			de_jure_liege = d_szekelyfold
			hidden_tooltip = {
				location = {
					add_province_modifier = {
						name = d_szekelyfold_de_jure_liege
						duration = -1
					}
					remove_province_modifier = no_liege
				}
			}
			hidden_tooltip = { FROM = {	set_character_flag = creating_title_loop } }
		}
		hidden_tooltip = { clr_character_flag = creating_title_loop }

	}
	allow = {
		OR = {
			AND = {
			
				primary_title = { title = c_szekelyfold }
				primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = no_liege } }
				OR = {
					AND = {
						num_of_count_titles = 3
						NOT = { num_of_count_titles = 6 }
					}
					primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = isolated } }
				}
			}
			d_szekelyfold = {
				is_titular = no
			}
		}

	}
}

	color2 = { 255 255 255 }
	capital = 140
	short_name = yes
	gain_effect = {
		primary_title = { copy_title_laws = k_tourraine }
		
		any_demesne_title = {
			limit = {
				title = k_tourraine
				OR = {
					e_tourraine = { is_titular = yes }
					FROM = { has_character_flag = creating_title_loop }
				}
			}
			de_jure_liege = e_tourraine
			hidden_tooltip = { FROM = {	set_character_flag = creating_title_loop } }
		}
		hidden_tooltip = { clr_character_flag = creating_title_loop }

	}
	allow = {
		OR = {
			AND = {
			
				primary_title = { title = k_tourraine }
				num_of_king_titles = 3
			}
			e_tourraine = {
				is_titular = no
			}
		}

	}
}

d_bourges = {
	color = { 30 58 232 }
	color2 = { 255 255 255 }
	capital = 139
	gain_effect = {
		primary_title = { copy_title_laws = c_bourges }
		
		IF = {
			limit = {
				d_bourges = { is_titular = yes }
			}
			character_event = { 
		id = nivve.0 tooltip = "Kingdom of Europa becomes the de jure liege of d_bourges" 
				}
			}
		any_demesne_title = {
			limit = {
				tier = COUNT
				location = { 
					AND = {
						has_province_modifier = no_liege
						OR = {
							is_primary_holder_title = yes
							any_neighbor_province = {
								owner = { character = ROOT }
							}
						}
					}
				}
				OR = {
					d_bourges = { is_titular = yes }
					FROM = { has_character_flag = creating_title_loop }
				}
			}
			de_jure_liege = d_bourges
			hidden_tooltip = {
				location = {
					add_province_modifier = {
						name = d_bourges_de_jure_liege
						duration = -1
					}
					remove_province_modifier = no_liege
				}
			}
			hidden_tooltip = { FROM = {	set_character_flag = creating_title_loop } }
		}
		hidden_tooltip = { clr_character_flag = creating_title_loop }

	}
	allow = {
		OR = {
			AND = {
			
				primary_title = { title = c_bourges }
				primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = no_liege } }
				OR = {
					AND = {
						num_of_count_titles = 3
						NOT = { num_of_count_titles = 6 }
					}
					primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = isolated } }
				}
			}
			d_bourges = {
				is_titular = no
			}
		}

	}
}

k_bourges = {
	color = { 30 58 232 }
	color2 = { 255 255 255 }
	capital = 139
	gain_effect = {

				}

		}
		hidden_tooltip = { clr_character_flag = creating_title_loop }

	}
	allow = {
		OR = {
			AND = {
			
				primary_title = { title = d_bourges }
				num_of_duke_titles = 3
			}
			k_bourges = {
				is_titular = no
			}
		}

	}

		}

	}
}

d_arques = {
	color = { 83 36 238 }
	color2 = { 255 255 255 }
	capital = 97
	gain_effect = {
		primary_title = { copy_title_laws = c_arques }
		
		IF = {
			limit = {
				d_arques = { is_titular = yes }
			}
			character_event = { 
		id = nivve.0 tooltip = "Kingdom of Europa becomes the de jure liege of d_arques" 
				}
			}
		any_demesne_title = {
			limit = {
				tier = COUNT
				location = { 
					AND = {
						has_province_modifier = no_liege
						OR = {
							is_primary_holder_title = yes
							any_neighbor_province = {
								owner = { character = ROOT }
							}
						}
					}
				}
				OR = {
					d_arques = { is_titular = yes }
					FROM = { has_character_flag = creating_title_loop }
				}
			}
			de_jure_liege = d_arques
			hidden_tooltip = {
				location = {
					add_province_modifier = {
						name = d_arques_de_jure_liege
						duration = -1
					}
					remove_province_modifier = no_liege
				}
			}
			hidden_tooltip = { FROM = {	set_character_flag = creating_title_loop } }
		}
		hidden_tooltip = { clr_character_flag = creating_title_loop }

	}
	allow = {
		OR = {
			AND = {
			
				primary_title = { title = c_arques }
				primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = no_liege } }
				OR = {
					AND = {
						num_of_count_titles = 3
						NOT = { num_of_count_titles = 6 }
					}
					primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = isolated } }
				}
			}
			d_arques = {
				is_titular = no
			}
		}

	}
}

				}
			}
			de_jure_liege = d_troyes
			hidden_tooltip = {
				location = {
					add_province_modifier = {
						name = d_troyes_de_jure_liege
						duration = -1
					}
					remove_province_modifier = no_liege
				}
			}
			hidden_tooltip = { FROM = {	set_character_flag = creating_title_loop } }
		}
		hidden_tooltip = { clr_character_flag = creating_title_loop }

	}
	allow = {
		OR = {
			AND = {
			
				primary_title = { title = c_troyes }
				primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = no_liege } }
				OR = {
					AND = {
						num_of_count_titles = 3
						NOT = { num_of_count_titles = 6 }
					}
					primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = isolated } }
				}
			}
			d_troyes = {
				is_titular = no
			}
		}

	}
}

d_reims = {
	color = { 101 30 232 }
	color2 = { 255 255 255 }
	capital = 114
	gain_effect = {
		primary_title = { copy_title_laws = c_reims }
		
		IF = {
			limit = {
				d_reims = { is_titular = yes }
			}
			character_event = { 
		id = nivve.0 tooltip = "Kingdom of Europa becomes the de jure liege of d_reims" 
				}
			}
		any_demesne_title = {
			limit = {
				tier = COUNT
				location = { 
					AND = {
						has_province_modifier = no_liege
						OR = {
							is_primary_holder_title = yes
							any_neighbor_province = {
								owner = { character = ROOT }
							}
						}
					}
				}
				OR = {
					d_reims = { is_titular = yes }
					FROM = { has_character_flag = creating_title_loop }
				}
			}
			de_jure_liege = d_reims
			hidden_tooltip = {
				location = {
					add_province_modifier = {
						name = d_reims_de_jure_liege
						duration = -1
					}
					remove_province_modifier = no_liege
				}
			}
			hidden_tooltip = { FROM = {	set_character_flag = creating_title_loop } }
		}
		hidden_tooltip = { clr_character_flag = creating_title_loop }

	}
	allow = {
		OR = {
			AND = {
			
				primary_title = { title = c_reims }
				primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = no_liege } }
				OR = {
					AND = {
						num_of_count_titles = 3
						NOT = { num_of_count_titles = 6 }
					}
					primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = isolated } }
				}
			}

			AND = {
			
				primary_title = { title = c_chalons }
				primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = no_liege } }
				OR = {
					AND = {
						num_of_count_titles = 3
						NOT = { num_of_count_titles = 6 }
					}
					primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = isolated } }
				}
			}
			d_chalons = {
				is_titular = no
			}
		}

	}
}

k_chalons = {
	color = { 161 22 60 }
	color2 = { 255 255 255 }
	capital = 240
	gain_effect = {
		primary_title = { copy_title_laws = d_chalons }
		
		any_demesne_title = {
			limit = {
				title = d_chalons
				OR = {
					k_chalons = { is_titular = yes }
					FROM = { has_character_flag = creating_title_loop }
				}
			}
			de_jure_liege = k_chalons
			hidden_tooltip = { FROM = {	set_character_flag = creating_title_loop } }
		}
		hidden_tooltip = { clr_character_flag = creating_title_loop }

	}
	allow = {
		OR = {
			AND = {
			
				primary_title = { title = d_chalons }
				num_of_duke_titles = 3
			}
			k_chalons = {
				is_titular = no
			}
		}

	}
}

d_auxerre = {
	color = { 97 26 228 }
	color2 = { 255 255 255 }
	capital = 132
	gain_effect = {
		primary_title = { copy_title_laws = c_auxerre }
		
		IF = {
			limit = {
				d_auxerre = { is_titular = yes }
			}
			character_event = { 
		id = nivve.0 tooltip = "Kingdom of Europa becomes the de jure liege of d_auxerre" 
				}
			}
		any_demesne_title = {
			limit = {
				tier = COUNT
				location = { 
					AND = {
						has_province_modifier = no_liege
						OR = {
							is_primary_holder_title = yes
							any_neighbor_province = {
								owner = { character = ROOT }
							}
						}
					}
				}
				OR = {
					d_auxerre = { is_titular = yes }
					FROM = { has_character_flag = creating_title_loop }
				}
			}
			de_jure_liege = d_auxerre
			hidden_tooltip = {
				location = {
					add_province_modifier = {
						name = d_auxerre_de_jure_liege
						duration = -1
					}
					remove_province_modifier = no_liege
				}
			}
			hidden_tooltip = { FROM = {	set_character_flag = creating_title_loop } }
		}
		hidden_tooltip = { clr_character_flag = creating_title_loop }

	}
	allow = {
		OR = {
			AND = {
			
				primary_title = { title = c_auxerre }
				primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = no_liege } }
				OR = {
					AND = {
						num_of_count_titles = 3
						NOT = { num_of_count_titles = 6 }
					}
					primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = isolated } }
				}
			}
			d_auxerre = {
				is_titular = no
			}
		}

	}
}

				OR = {
					k_bordeaux = { is_titular = yes }
					FROM = { has_character_flag = creating_title_loop }
				}
			}
			de_jure_liege = k_bordeaux
			hidden_tooltip = { FROM = {	set_character_flag = creating_title_loop } }
		}
		hidden_tooltip = { clr_character_flag = creating_title_loop }

	}
	allow = {
		OR = {
			AND = {
			
				primary_title = { title = d_bordeaux }
				num_of_duke_titles = 3
			}
			k_bordeaux = {
				is_titular = no
			}
		}

	}
}

e_bordeaux = {
	color = { 58 14 247 }
	color2 = { 255 255 255 }
	capital = 149
	short_name = yes
	gain_effect = {
		primary_title = { copy_title_laws = k_bordeaux }
		
		any_demesne_title = {

				title = k_bordeaux
				OR = {

d_agen = {
	color = { 62 18 251 }
	color2 = { 255 255 255 }
	capital = 215
	gain_effect = {
		primary_title = { copy_title_laws = c_agen }
		
		IF = {
			limit = {
				d_agen = { is_titular = yes }
			}
			character_event = { 
		id = nivve.0 tooltip = "Kingdom of Europa becomes the de jure liege of d_agen" 
				}
			}
		any_demesne_title = {
			limit = {
				tier = COUNT
				location = { 
					AND = {
						has_province_modifier = no_liege
						OR = {
							is_primary_holder_title = yes
							any_neighbor_province = {
								owner = { character = ROOT }
							}
						}
					}
				}
				OR = {
					d_agen = { is_titular = yes }
					FROM = { has_character_flag = creating_title_loop }
				}
			}
			de_jure_liege = d_agen
			hidden_tooltip = {
				location = {
					add_province_modifier = {
						name = d_agen_de_jure_liege
						duration = -1
					}
					remove_province_modifier = no_liege
				}
			}
			hidden_tooltip = { FROM = {	set_character_flag = creating_title_loop } }
		}
		hidden_tooltip = { clr_character_flag = creating_title_loop }

	}
	allow = {
		OR = {
			AND = {
			
				primary_title = { title = c_agen }
				primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = no_liege } }
				OR = {
					AND = {
						num_of_count_titles = 3
						NOT = { num_of_count_titles = 6 }
					}
					primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = isolated } }
				}
			}
			d_agen = {
				is_titular = no
			}
		}

	}
}

				is_titular = no
			}
		}

	}
}

d_toulouse = {
	color = { 18 24 251 }
	color2 = { 255 255 255 }
	capital = 214
	gain_effect = {
		primary_title = { copy_title_laws = c_toulouse }
		
		IF = {
			limit = {
				d_toulouse = { is_titular = yes }
			}
			character_event = { 
		id = nivve.0 tooltip = "Kingdom of Europa becomes the de jure liege of d_toulouse" 
				}
			}
		any_demesne_title = {
			limit = {
				tier = COUNT
				location = { 
					AND = {
						has_province_modifier = no_liege
						OR = {
							is_primary_holder_title = yes
							any_neighbor_province = {
								owner = { character = ROOT }
							}
						}
					}
				}
				OR = {
					d_toulouse = { is_titular = yes }
					FROM = { has_character_flag = creating_title_loop }
				}
			}
			de_jure_liege = d_toulouse
			hidden_tooltip = {
				location = {
					add_province_modifier = {
						name = d_toulouse_de_jure_liege
						duration = -1
					}
					remove_province_modifier = no_liege
				}
			}
			hidden_tooltip = { FROM = {	set_character_flag = creating_title_loop } }
		}
		hidden_tooltip = { clr_character_flag = creating_title_loop }

	}
	allow = {
		OR = {
			AND = {
			
				primary_title = { title = c_toulouse }
				primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = no_liege } }
				OR = {
					AND = {
						num_of_count_titles = 3
						NOT = { num_of_count_titles = 6 }
					}
					primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = isolated } }
				}
			}
			d_toulouse = {
				is_titular = no
			}
		}

	}
}

		hidden_tooltip = { clr_character_flag = creating_title_loop }

	}
	allow = {
		OR = {
			AND = {
			
				primary_title = { title = k_labourd }
				num_of_king_titles = 3
			}
			e_labourd = {
				is_titular = no
			}
		}

	}
}

d_albret = {
	color = { 36 25 255 }
	color2 = { 255 255 255 }
	capital = 150
	gain_effect = {
		primary_title = { copy_title_laws = c_albret }
		
		IF = {
			limit = {
				d_albret = { is_titular = yes }
			}
			character_event = { 
		id = nivve.0 tooltip = "Kingdom of Europa becomes the de jure liege of d_albret" 
				}
			}
		any_demesne_title = {
			limit = {
				tier = COUNT
				location = { 
					AND = {
						has_province_modifier = no_liege
						OR = {
							is_primary_holder_title = yes
							any_neighbor_province = {
								owner = { character = ROOT }
							}
						}
					}
				}
				OR = {
					d_albret = { is_titular = yes }
					FROM = { has_character_flag = creating_title_loop }
				}
			}
			de_jure_liege = d_albret
			hidden_tooltip = {
				location = {
					add_province_modifier = {
						name = d_albret_de_jure_liege
						duration = -1
					}
					remove_province_modifier = no_liege
				}
			}
			hidden_tooltip = { FROM = {	set_character_flag = creating_title_loop } }
		}
		hidden_tooltip = { clr_character_flag = creating_title_loop }

	}
	allow = {
		OR = {
			AND = {
			
				primary_title = { title = c_albret }
				primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = no_liege } }
				OR = {
					AND = {
						num_of_count_titles = 3
						NOT = { num_of_count_titles = 6 }
					}
					primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = isolated } }
				}
			}
			d_albret = {
				is_titular = no
			}
		}

	}

d_gevaudan = {
	color = { 28 175 230 }
	color2 = { 255 255 255 }
	capital = 219
	gain_effect = {
		primary_title = { copy_title_laws = c_gevaudan }
		
		IF = {
			limit = {
				d_gevaudan = { is_titular = yes }
			}
			character_event = { 
		id = nivve.0 tooltip = "Kingdom of Europa becomes the de jure liege of d_gevaudan" 
				}
			}
		any_demesne_title = {
			limit = {
				tier = COUNT
				location = { 
					AND = {
						has_province_modifier = no_liege
						OR = {
							is_primary_holder_title = yes
							any_neighbor_province = {
								owner = { character = ROOT }
							}
						}
					}
				}
				OR = {
					d_gevaudan = { is_titular = yes }
					FROM = { has_character_flag = creating_title_loop }
				}
			}
			de_jure_liege = d_gevaudan
			hidden_tooltip = {
				location = {
					add_province_modifier = {
						name = d_gevaudan_de_jure_liege
						duration = -1
					}
					remove_province_modifier = no_liege
				}
			}
			hidden_tooltip = { FROM = {	set_character_flag = creating_title_loop } }
		}
		hidden_tooltip = { clr_character_flag = creating_title_loop }

	}
	allow = {
		OR = {
			AND = {
			
				primary_title = { title = c_gevaudan }
				primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = no_liege } }
				OR = {
					AND = {
						num_of_count_titles = 3
						NOT = { num_of_count_titles = 6 }
					}
					primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = isolated } }
				}
			}
			d_gevaudan = {
				is_titular = no
			}
		}

	}
}

k_gevaudan = {
	color = { 28 175 230 }
	color2 = { 255 255 255 }
	capital = 219
	gain_effect = {
		primary_title = { copy_title_laws = d_gevaudan }
		
		any_demesne_title = {
			limit = {
				title = d_gevaudan
				OR = {
					k_gevaudan = { is_titular = yes }
					FROM = { has_character_flag = creating_title_loop }
				}
			}
			de_jure_liege = k_gevaudan
			hidden_tooltip = { FROM = {	set_character_flag = creating_title_loop } }
		}
		hidden_tooltip = { clr_character_flag = creating_title_loop }

	}
	allow = {
		OR = {
			AND = {
			
				primary_title = { title = d_gevaudan }
				num_of_duke_titles = 3
			}
			k_gevaudan = {
				is_titular = no
			}
		}

	}
}

e_gevaudan = {
	color = { 28 175 230 }
	color2 = { 255 255 255 }
	capital = 219
	short_name = yes
	gain_effect = {
		primary_title = { copy_title_laws = k_gevaudan }
		
		any_demesne_title = {
			limit = {
				title = k_gevaudan
				OR = {
					e_gevaudan = { is_titular = yes }
					FROM = { has_character_flag = creating_title_loop }
				}
			}
			de_jure_liege = e_gevaudan
			hidden_tooltip = { FROM = {	set_character_flag = creating_title_loop } }
		}
		hidden_tooltip = { clr_character_flag = creating_title_loop }

	}
	allow = {
		OR = {
			AND = {
			
				primary_title = { title = k_gevaudan }
				num_of_king_titles = 3
			}
			e_gevaudan = {
				is_titular = no
			}
		}

	}
}

d_bourbon = {
	color = { 28 147 230 }
	color2 = { 255 255 255 }
	capital = 146
	gain_effect = {
		primary_title = { copy_title_laws = c_bourbon }
		
		IF = {
			limit = {
				d_bourbon = { is_titular = yes }
			}
			character_event = { 
		id = nivve.0 tooltip = "Kingdom of Europa becomes the de jure liege of d_bourbon" 
				}
			}
		any_demesne_title = {
			limit = {
				tier = COUNT
				location = { 
					AND = {
						has_province_modifier = no_liege
						OR = {
							is_primary_holder_title = yes
							any_neighbor_province = {
								owner = { character = ROOT }
							}
						}
					}
				}
				OR = {
					d_bourbon = { is_titular = yes }
					FROM = { has_character_flag = creating_title_loop }
				}
			}
			de_jure_liege = d_bourbon
			hidden_tooltip = {
				location = {
					add_province_modifier = {
						name = d_bourbon_de_jure_liege
						duration = -1
					}
					remove_province_modifier = no_liege
				}
			}
			hidden_tooltip = { FROM = {	set_character_flag = creating_title_loop } }
		}
		hidden_tooltip = { clr_character_flag = creating_title_loop }

	}
	allow = {
		OR = {
			AND = {
			
				primary_title = { title = c_bourbon }
				primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = no_liege } }
				OR = {
					AND = {
						num_of_count_titles = 3
						NOT = { num_of_count_titles = 6 }
					}
					primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = isolated } }
				}
			}
			d_bourbon = {
				is_titular = no
			}
		}

	}
}

				num_of_duke_titles = 3
			}

		}

d_nantes = {
	color = { 37 28 230 }
	color2 = { 255 255 255 }
	capital = 106
	gain_effect = {

						has_province_modifier = no_liege
						OR = {
							is_primary_holder_title = yes
							any_neighbor_province = {
								owner = { character = ROOT }
							}
						}
					}
				}
				OR = {
					d_cornouaille = { is_titular = yes }
					FROM = { has_character_flag = creating_title_loop }
				}
			}
			de_jure_liege = d_cornouaille
			hidden_tooltip = {
				location = {
					add_province_modifier = {
						name = d_cornouaille_de_jure_liege
						duration = -1
					}
					remove_province_modifier = no_liege
				}
			}
			hidden_tooltip = { FROM = {	set_character_flag = creating_title_loop } }
		}
		hidden_tooltip = { clr_character_flag = creating_title_loop }

	}
	allow = {
		OR = {
			AND = {
			
				primary_title = { title = c_cornouaille }
				primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = no_liege } }
				OR = {
					AND = {
						num_of_count_titles = 3
						NOT = { num_of_count_titles = 6 }
					}
					primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = isolated } }
				}
			}
			d_cornouaille = {
				is_titular = no
			}
		}

	}
}

	color = { 49 40 242 }
	color2 = { 255 255 255 }
	capital = 103
	gain_effect = {
		primary_title = { copy_title_laws = c_french_leon }
		
		IF = {
			limit = {
				d_french_leon = { is_titular = yes }
			}
			character_event = { 
		id = nivve.0 tooltip = "Kingdom of Europa becomes the de jure liege of d_french_leon" 
				}
			}
		any_demesne_title = {
			limit = {
				tier = COUNT
				location = { 
					AND = {
						has_province_modifier = no_liege
						OR = {
							is_primary_holder_title = yes
							any_neighbor_province = {
								owner = { character = ROOT }
							}
						}
					}
				}
				OR = {
					d_french_leon = { is_titular = yes }
					FROM = { has_character_flag = creating_title_loop }
				}
			}

			hidden_tooltip = {
				location = {
					add_province_modifier = {
						name = d_french_leon_de_jure_liege
						duration = -1
					}
					remove_province_modifier = no_liege
				}
			}
			hidden_tooltip = { FROM = {	set_character_flag = creating_title_loop } }
		}
		hidden_tooltip = { clr_character_flag = creating_title_loop }

	}
	allow = {
		OR = {
			AND = {
			
				primary_title = { title = c_french_leon }
				primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = no_liege } }
				OR = {
					AND = {
						num_of_count_titles = 3
						NOT = { num_of_count_titles = 6 }
					}
					primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = isolated } }
				}
			}
			d_french_leon = {

			}

						name = d_venaissin_de_jure_liege
						duration = -1
					}
					remove_province_modifier = no_liege
				}
			}
			hidden_tooltip = { FROM = {	set_character_flag = creating_title_loop } }
		}
		hidden_tooltip = { clr_character_flag = creating_title_loop }

	}
	allow = {
		OR = {
			AND = {
			
				primary_title = { title = c_venaissin }
				primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = no_liege } }
				OR = {
					AND = {
						num_of_count_titles = 3
						NOT = { num_of_count_titles = 6 }
					}
					primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = isolated } }
				}
			}
			d_venaissin = {
				is_titular = no
			}
		}

	}
}

d_nice = {
	color = { 147 39 69 }
	color2 = { 255 255 255 }
	capital = 230
	gain_effect = {
		primary_title = { copy_title_laws = c_nice }
		
		IF = {
			limit = {
				d_nice = { is_titular = yes }
			}
			character_event = { 
		id = nivve.0 tooltip = "Kingdom of Europa becomes the de jure liege of d_nice" 
				}
			}
		any_demesne_title = {
			limit = {
				tier = COUNT
				location = { 
					AND = {
						has_province_modifier = no_liege
						OR = {
							is_primary_holder_title = yes
							any_neighbor_province = {
								owner = { character = ROOT }
							}
						}
					}
				}
				OR = {
					d_nice = { is_titular = yes }
					FROM = { has_character_flag = creating_title_loop }
				}
			}
			de_jure_liege = d_nice
			hidden_tooltip = {
				location = {
					add_province_modifier = {
						name = d_nice_de_jure_liege
						duration = -1
					}
					remove_province_modifier = no_liege
				}
			}
			hidden_tooltip = { FROM = {	set_character_flag = creating_title_loop } }
		}
		hidden_tooltip = { clr_character_flag = creating_title_loop }

	}
	allow = {
		OR = {
			AND = {
			
				primary_title = { title = c_nice }
				primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = no_liege } }
				OR = {
					AND = {
						num_of_count_titles = 3
						NOT = { num_of_count_titles = 6 }
					}
					primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = isolated } }
				}
			}
			d_nice = {
				is_titular = no
			}
		}

	}
}

		OR = {
			AND = {
			
				primary_title = { title = c_lyon }
				primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = no_liege } }
				OR = {
					AND = {
						num_of_count_titles = 3
						NOT = { num_of_count_titles = 6 }
					}
					primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = isolated } }
				}
			}
			d_lyon = {
				is_titular = no
			}
		}

	}
}

k_lyon = {
	color = { 123 34 58 }
	color2 = { 255 255 255 }
	capital = 227
	gain_effect = {
		primary_title = { copy_title_laws = d_lyon }
		
		any_demesne_title = {
			limit = {
				title = d_lyon
				OR = {
					k_lyon = { is_titular = yes }
					FROM = { has_character_flag = creating_title_loop }
				}
			}
			de_jure_liege = k_lyon
			hidden_tooltip = { FROM = {	set_character_flag = creating_title_loop } }
		}
		hidden_tooltip = { clr_character_flag = creating_title_loop }

	}
	allow = {
		OR = {
			AND = {
			
				primary_title = { title = d_lyon }
				num_of_duke_titles = 3
			}
			k_lyon = {
				is_titular = no
			}
		}

	}
}

d_forez = {
	color = { 127 38 62 }
	color2 = { 255 255 255 }
	capital = 224
	gain_effect = {
		primary_title = { copy_title_laws = c_forez }
		
		IF = {
			limit = {
				d_forez = { is_titular = yes }
			}
			character_event = { 
		id = nivve.0 tooltip = "Kingdom of Europa becomes the de jure liege of d_forez" 
				}
			}
		any_demesne_title = {
			limit = {
				tier = COUNT
				location = { 
					AND = {
						has_province_modifier = no_liege
						OR = {
							is_primary_holder_title = yes
							any_neighbor_province = {
								owner = { character = ROOT }
							}
						}
					}
				}
				OR = {
					d_forez = { is_titular = yes }
					FROM = { has_character_flag = creating_title_loop }
				}
			}
			de_jure_liege = d_forez
			hidden_tooltip = {
				location = {
					add_province_modifier = {
						name = d_forez_de_jure_liege
						duration = -1
					}
					remove_province_modifier = no_liege
				}
			}
			hidden_tooltip = { FROM = {	set_character_flag = creating_title_loop } }
		}
		hidden_tooltip = { clr_character_flag = creating_title_loop }

	}
	allow = {
		OR = {
			AND = {
			
				primary_title = { title = c_forez }
				primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = no_liege } }
				OR = {
					AND = {
						num_of_count_titles = 3
						NOT = { num_of_count_titles = 6 }
					}
					primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = isolated } }
				}
			}
			d_forez = {
				is_titular = no
			}
		}

	}
}

				OR = {
					k_schwyz = { is_titular = yes }
					FROM = { has_character_flag = creating_title_loop }
				}
			}
			de_jure_liege = k_schwyz
			hidden_tooltip = { FROM = {	set_character_flag = creating_title_loop } }
		}
		hidden_tooltip = { clr_character_flag = creating_title_loop }

	}
	allow = {
		OR = {
			AND = {
			
				primary_title = { title = d_schwyz }
				num_of_duke_titles = 3
			}
			k_schwyz = {
				is_titular = no
			}
		}

	}
}

e_schwyz = {
	color = { 167 28 66 }
	color2 = { 255 255 255 }
	capital = 245
	short_name = yes
	gain_effect = {

		any_demesne_title = {

d_aargau = {
	color = { 169 30 68 }
	color2 = { 255 255 255 }
	capital = 242
	gain_effect = {
		primary_title = { copy_title_laws = c_aargau }
		
		IF = {
			limit = {
				d_aargau = { is_titular = yes }
			}
			character_event = { 
		id = nivve.0 tooltip = "Kingdom of Europa becomes the de jure liege of d_aargau" 
				}
			}
		any_demesne_title = {
			limit = {
				tier = COUNT
				location = { 
					AND = {
						has_province_modifier = no_liege
						OR = {
							is_primary_holder_title = yes
							any_neighbor_province = {
								owner = { character = ROOT }
							}
						}
					}
				}
				OR = {
					d_aargau = { is_titular = yes }
					FROM = { has_character_flag = creating_title_loop }
				}
			}
			de_jure_liege = d_aargau
			hidden_tooltip = {
				location = {
					add_province_modifier = {
						name = d_aargau_de_jure_liege
						duration = -1
					}
					remove_province_modifier = no_liege
				}
			}
			hidden_tooltip = { FROM = {	set_character_flag = creating_title_loop } }
		}
		hidden_tooltip = { clr_character_flag = creating_title_loop }

	}
	allow = {
		OR = {
			AND = {
			
				primary_title = { title = c_aargau }
				primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = no_liege } }
				OR = {
					AND = {
						num_of_count_titles = 3
						NOT = { num_of_count_titles = 6 }
					}
					primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = isolated } }
				}
			}
			d_aargau = {
				is_titular = no
			}
		}

	}
}
