		OR = {
			AND = {
			
				primary_title = { title = d_asturias_de_santillana }
				num_of_duke_titles = 3
			}
			k_asturias_de_santillana = {
				is_titular = no
			}
		}

	}
}

e_asturias_de_santillana = {
	color = { 232 205 25 }
	color2 = { 255 255 255 }
	capital = 154
	short_name = yes
	gain_effect = {
		primary_title = { copy_title_laws = k_asturias_de_santillana }
		
		any_demesne_title = {
			limit = {
				title = k_asturias_de_santillana
				OR = {
					e_asturias_de_santillana = { is_titular = yes }
					FROM = { has_character_flag = creating_title_loop }
				}
			}
			de_jure_liege = e_asturias_de_santillana
			hidden_tooltip = { FROM = {	set_character_flag = creating_title_loop } }
		}
		hidden_tooltip = { clr_character_flag = creating_title_loop }

	}
	allow = {
		OR = {
			AND = {
			
				primary_title = { title = k_asturias_de_santillana }
				num_of_king_titles = 3
			}
			e_asturias_de_santillana = {
				is_titular = no
			}
		}

	}
}

d_albarracin = {
	color = { 113 235 3 }
	color2 = { 255 255 255 }
	capital = 174
	gain_effect = {
		primary_title = { copy_title_laws = c_albarracin }
		
		IF = {
			limit = {
				d_albarracin = { is_titular = yes }
			}
			character_event = { 
		id = nivve.0 tooltip = "Kingdom of Europa becomes the de jure liege of d_albarracin" 
				}
			}
		any_demesne_title = {
			limit = {
				tier = COUNT
				location = { 
					AND = {
						has_province_modifier = no_liege
						OR = {
							is_primary_holder_title = yes
							any_neighbor_province = {
								owner = { character = ROOT }
							}
						}
					}
				}
				OR = {
					d_albarracin = { is_titular = yes }
					FROM = { has_character_flag = creating_title_loop }
				}
			}
			de_jure_liege = d_albarracin
			hidden_tooltip = {
				location = {
					add_province_modifier = {
						name = d_albarracin_de_jure_liege
						duration = -1
					}
					remove_province_modifier = no_liege
				}
			}
			hidden_tooltip = { FROM = {	set_character_flag = creating_title_loop } }
		}
		hidden_tooltip = { clr_character_flag = creating_title_loop }

	}
	allow = {
		OR = {
			AND = {
			
				primary_title = { title = c_albarracin }
				primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = no_liege } }
				OR = {
					AND = {
						num_of_count_titles = 3
						NOT = { num_of_count_titles = 6 }
					}
					primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = isolated } }
				}
			}
			d_albarracin = {
				is_titular = no
			}
		}

	}
}

			hidden_tooltip = { FROM = {	set_character_flag = creating_title_loop } }
		}
		hidden_tooltip = { clr_character_flag = creating_title_loop }

	}
	allow = {
		OR = {
			AND = {
			
				primary_title = { title = c_urgell }
				primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = no_liege } }
				OR = {
					AND = {
						num_of_count_titles = 3
						NOT = { num_of_count_titles = 6 }
					}
					primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = isolated } }
				}
			}
			d_urgell = {
				is_titular = no
			}
		}

	}
}

d_rosello = {
	color = { 255 240 12 }
	color2 = { 255 255 255 }
	capital = 211
	gain_effect = {
		primary_title = { copy_title_laws = c_rosello }
		
		IF = {
			limit = {
				d_rosello = { is_titular = yes }
			}
			character_event = { 
		id = nivve.0 tooltip = "Kingdom of Europa becomes the de jure liege of d_rosello" 
				}
			}
		any_demesne_title = {
			limit = {
				tier = COUNT
				location = { 
					AND = {
						has_province_modifier = no_liege
						OR = {
							is_primary_holder_title = yes
							any_neighbor_province = {
								owner = { character = ROOT }
							}
						}
					}
				}
				OR = {
					d_rosello = { is_titular = yes }
					FROM = { has_character_flag = creating_title_loop }
				}
			}
			de_jure_liege = d_rosello
			hidden_tooltip = {
				location = {
					add_province_modifier = {
						name = d_rosello_de_jure_liege
						duration = -1
					}
					remove_province_modifier = no_liege
				}
			}
			hidden_tooltip = { FROM = {	set_character_flag = creating_title_loop } }
		}
		hidden_tooltip = { clr_character_flag = creating_title_loop }

	}
	allow = {
		OR = {
			AND = {
			
				primary_title = { title = c_rosello }
				primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = no_liege } }
				OR = {
					AND = {
						num_of_count_titles = 3
						NOT = { num_of_count_titles = 6 }
					}
					primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = isolated } }
				}
			}
			d_rosello = {
				is_titular = no
			}
		}

	}
}

				}
			}
		any_demesne_title = {
			limit = {
				tier = COUNT
				location = { 
					AND = {
						has_province_modifier = no_liege
						OR = {
							is_primary_holder_title = yes
							any_neighbor_province = {
								owner = { character = ROOT }
							}
						}
					}
				}
				OR = {
					d_valencia = { is_titular = yes }
					FROM = { has_character_flag = creating_title_loop }
				}
			}
			de_jure_liege = d_valencia
			hidden_tooltip = {
				location = {
					add_province_modifier = {
						name = d_valencia_de_jure_liege
						duration = -1
					}
					remove_province_modifier = no_liege
				}
			}
			hidden_tooltip = { FROM = {	set_character_flag = creating_title_loop } }
		}
		hidden_tooltip = { clr_character_flag = creating_title_loop }

	}
	allow = {
		OR = {
			AND = {
			
				primary_title = { title = c_valencia }
				primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = no_liege } }
				OR = {
					AND = {
						num_of_count_titles = 3
						NOT = { num_of_count_titles = 6 }
					}
					primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = isolated } }
				}
			}
			d_valencia = {
				is_titular = no
			}
		}

	}
}

	color = { 255 246 6 }
	color2 = { 255 255 255 }
	capital = 170
	bedouin_arabic = "Deniyya"
	maghreb_arabic = "Deniyya"
	levantine_arabic = "Deniyya"
	egyptian_arabic = "Deniyya"
	andalusian_arabic = "Deniyya"
	gain_effect = {
		primary_title = { copy_title_laws = c_denia }
		
		IF = {
			limit = {
				d_denia = { is_titular = yes }
			}
			character_event = { 
		id = nivve.0 tooltip = "Kingdom of Europa becomes the de jure liege of d_denia" 
				}
			}
		any_demesne_title = {
			limit = {
				tier = COUNT
				location = { 
					AND = {
						has_province_modifier = no_liege
						OR = {
							is_primary_holder_title = yes
							any_neighbor_province = {
								owner = { character = ROOT }
							}
						}
					}
				}
				OR = {
					d_denia = { is_titular = yes }
					FROM = { has_character_flag = creating_title_loop }
				}
			}
			de_jure_liege = d_denia
			hidden_tooltip = {
				location = {
					add_province_modifier = {
						name = d_denia_de_jure_liege
						duration = -1
					}
					remove_province_modifier = no_liege
				}
			}
			hidden_tooltip = { FROM = {	set_character_flag = creating_title_loop } }
		}
		hidden_tooltip = { clr_character_flag = creating_title_loop }

	}
	allow = {
		OR = {
			AND = {
			
				primary_title = { title = c_denia }
				primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = no_liege } }
				OR = {
					AND = {
						num_of_count_titles = 3
						NOT = { num_of_count_titles = 6 }
					}
					primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = isolated } }
				}
			}
			d_denia = {
				is_titular = no
			}
		}

	}

				OR = {
					k_navarra = { is_titular = yes }
					FROM = { has_character_flag = creating_title_loop }
				}
			}
			de_jure_liege = k_navarra
			hidden_tooltip = { FROM = {	set_character_flag = creating_title_loop } }
		}
		hidden_tooltip = { clr_character_flag = creating_title_loop }

	}
	allow = {
		OR = {
			AND = {
			
				primary_title = { title = d_navarra }
				num_of_duke_titles = 3
			}
			k_navarra = {
				is_titular = no
			}
		}

	}
}

e_navarra = {
	color = { 255 200 2 }
	color2 = { 255 255 255 }
	capital = 152
	short_name = yes
	gain_effect = {

d_najera = {
	color = { 255 202 3 }
	color2 = { 255 255 255 }
	capital = 201
	gain_effect = {
		primary_title = { copy_title_laws = c_najera }
		
		IF = {
			limit = {
				d_najera = { is_titular = yes }
			}
			character_event = { 
		id = nivve.0 tooltip = "Kingdom of Europa becomes the de jure liege of d_najera" 
				}
			}
		any_demesne_title = {
			limit = {
				tier = COUNT
				location = { 
					AND = {
						has_province_modifier = no_liege
						OR = {
							is_primary_holder_title = yes
							any_neighbor_province = {
								owner = { character = ROOT }
							}
						}
					}
				}
				OR = {
					d_najera = { is_titular = yes }
					FROM = { has_character_flag = creating_title_loop }
				}
			}
			de_jure_liege = d_najera
			hidden_tooltip = {
				location = {
					add_province_modifier = {
						name = d_najera_de_jure_liege
						duration = -1
					}
					remove_province_modifier = no_liege
				}
			}
			hidden_tooltip = { FROM = {	set_character_flag = creating_title_loop } }
		}
		hidden_tooltip = { clr_character_flag = creating_title_loop }

	}
	allow = {
		OR = {
			AND = {
			
				primary_title = { title = c_najera }
				primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = no_liege } }
				OR = {
					AND = {
						num_of_count_titles = 3
						NOT = { num_of_count_titles = 6 }
					}
					primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = isolated } }
				}
			}
			d_najera = {
				is_titular = no
			}
		}

	}
}

d_asturias_de_oviedo = {
	color = { 233 158 51 }
	color2 = { 255 255 255 }
	capital = 155
	gain_effect = {
		primary_title = { copy_title_laws = c_asturias_de_oviedo }
		
		IF = {
			limit = {
				d_asturias_de_oviedo = { is_titular = yes }
			}
			character_event = { 
		id = nivve.0 tooltip = "Kingdom of Europa becomes the de jure liege of d_asturias_de_oviedo" 
				}
			}
		any_demesne_title = {
			limit = {
				tier = COUNT
				location = { 
					AND = {
						has_province_modifier = no_liege
						OR = {
							is_primary_holder_title = yes
							any_neighbor_province = {
								owner = { character = ROOT }
							}
						}
					}
				}
				OR = {
					d_asturias_de_oviedo = { is_titular = yes }
					FROM = { has_character_flag = creating_title_loop }
				}
			}
			de_jure_liege = d_asturias_de_oviedo
			hidden_tooltip = {
				location = {
					add_province_modifier = {
						name = d_asturias_de_oviedo_de_jure_liege
						duration = -1
					}
					remove_province_modifier = no_liege
				}
			}
			hidden_tooltip = { FROM = {	set_character_flag = creating_title_loop } }
		}
		hidden_tooltip = { clr_character_flag = creating_title_loop }

	}
	allow = {
		OR = {
			AND = {
			
				primary_title = { title = c_asturias_de_oviedo }
				primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = no_liege } }
				OR = {
					AND = {
						num_of_count_titles = 3
						NOT = { num_of_count_titles = 6 }
					}
					primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = isolated } }
				}
			}
			d_asturias_de_oviedo = {
				is_titular = no
			}
		}

	}
}

		hidden_tooltip = { clr_character_flag = creating_title_loop }

	}
	allow = {
		OR = {
			AND = {
			
				primary_title = { title = d_salamanca }
				num_of_duke_titles = 3
			}
			k_salamanca = {
				is_titular = no
			}
		}

	}
}

e_salamanca = {
	color = { 253 128 31 }
	color2 = { 255 255 255 }
	capital = 192
	short_name = yes
	gain_effect = {
		primary_title = { copy_title_laws = k_salamanca }
		
		any_demesne_title = {
			limit = {
				title = k_salamanca
				OR = {

d_coruna = {
	color = { 183 118 51 }
	color2 = { 255 255 255 }
	capital = 156
	gain_effect = {
		primary_title = { copy_title_laws = c_coruna }
		
		IF = {
			limit = {
				d_coruna = { is_titular = yes }
			}
			character_event = { 
		id = nivve.0 tooltip = "Kingdom of Europa becomes the de jure liege of d_coruna" 
				}
			}
		any_demesne_title = {
			limit = {
				tier = COUNT
				location = { 
					AND = {
						has_province_modifier = no_liege
						OR = {
							is_primary_holder_title = yes
							any_neighbor_province = {
								owner = { character = ROOT }
							}
						}
					}
				}
				OR = {
					d_coruna = { is_titular = yes }
					FROM = { has_character_flag = creating_title_loop }
				}
			}
			de_jure_liege = d_coruna
			hidden_tooltip = {
				location = {
					add_province_modifier = {
						name = d_coruna_de_jure_liege
						duration = -1
					}
					remove_province_modifier = no_liege
				}
			}
			hidden_tooltip = { FROM = {	set_character_flag = creating_title_loop } }
		}
		hidden_tooltip = { clr_character_flag = creating_title_loop }

	}
	allow = {
		OR = {
			AND = {
			
				primary_title = { title = c_coruna }
				primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = no_liege } }
				OR = {
					AND = {
						num_of_count_titles = 3
						NOT = { num_of_count_titles = 6 }
					}
					primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = isolated } }
				}
			}
			d_coruna = {
				is_titular = no
			}
		}

	}
}

	}

		OR = {
			AND = {
			
				primary_title = { title = d_coimbra }
				num_of_duke_titles = 3
			}
			k_coimbra = {
				is_titular = no
			}
		}

	}
}

	color2 = { 255 255 255 }
	capital = 159
	short_name = yes
	bedouin_arabic = "Qulumriyah"
	maghreb_arabic = "Qulumriyah"

					FROM = { has_character_flag = creating_title_loop }
				}
			}
			de_jure_liege = e_coimbra
			hidden_tooltip = { FROM = {	set_character_flag = creating_title_loop } }

d_lisboa = {
	color = { 182 88 5 }
	color2 = { 255 255 255 }
	capital = 160
	bedouin_arabic = "Lishbuna"
	maghreb_arabic = "Lishbuna"
	levantine_arabic = "Lishbuna"
	egyptian_arabic = "Lishbuna"
	andalusian_arabic = "Lishbuna"
	gain_effect = {
		primary_title = { copy_title_laws = c_lisboa }
		
		IF = {
			limit = {
				d_lisboa = { is_titular = yes }
			}
			character_event = { 
		id = nivve.0 tooltip = "Kingdom of Europa becomes the de jure liege of d_lisboa" 
				}
			}
		any_demesne_title = {
			limit = {
				tier = COUNT
				location = { 
					AND = {
						has_province_modifier = no_liege
						OR = {
							is_primary_holder_title = yes
							any_neighbor_province = {
								owner = { character = ROOT }
							}
						}
					}
				}
				OR = {
					d_lisboa = { is_titular = yes }
					FROM = { has_character_flag = creating_title_loop }
				}
			}
			de_jure_liege = d_lisboa
			hidden_tooltip = {
				location = {
					add_province_modifier = {
						name = d_lisboa_de_jure_liege
						duration = -1
					}
					remove_province_modifier = no_liege
				}
			}
			hidden_tooltip = { FROM = {	set_character_flag = creating_title_loop } }
		}
		hidden_tooltip = { clr_character_flag = creating_title_loop }

	}
	allow = {
		OR = {
			AND = {
			
				primary_title = { title = c_lisboa }
				primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = no_liege } }
				OR = {
					AND = {
						num_of_count_titles = 3
						NOT = { num_of_count_titles = 6 }
					}
					primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = isolated } }
				}
			}
			d_lisboa = {
				is_titular = no
			}
		}

	}
}

			}
			character_event = {

				}
			}

						name = d_evora_de_jure_liege
						duration = -1
					}
					remove_province_modifier = no_liege
				}
			}
			hidden_tooltip = { FROM = {	set_character_flag = creating_title_loop } }

				}
			}
			hidden_tooltip = { FROM = {	set_character_flag = creating_title_loop } }
		}
		hidden_tooltip = { clr_character_flag = creating_title_loop }

	}
	allow = {
		OR = {
			AND = {
			
				primary_title = { title = c_faro }
				primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = no_liege } }
				OR = {
					AND = {
						num_of_count_titles = 3
						NOT = { num_of_count_titles = 6 }
					}
					primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = isolated } }
				}
			}
			d_faro = {
				is_titular = no
			}
		}

	}
}

d_cordoba = {
	color = { 246 216 16 }
	color2 = { 255 255 255 }
	capital = 181
	bedouin_arabic = "Qurtubah"
	maghreb_arabic = "Qurtubah"
	levantine_arabic = "Qurtubah"
	egyptian_arabic = "Qurtubah"
	andalusian_arabic = "Qurtubah"
	gain_effect = {
		primary_title = { copy_title_laws = c_cordoba }
		
		IF = {
			limit = {
				d_cordoba = { is_titular = yes }
			}
			character_event = { 
		id = nivve.0 tooltip = "Kingdom of Europa becomes the de jure liege of d_cordoba" 
				}
			}
		any_demesne_title = {
			limit = {
				tier = COUNT
				location = { 
					AND = {
						has_province_modifier = no_liege
						OR = {
							is_primary_holder_title = yes
							any_neighbor_province = {
								owner = { character = ROOT }
							}
						}
					}
				}
				OR = {
					d_cordoba = { is_titular = yes }
					FROM = { has_character_flag = creating_title_loop }
				}
			}
			de_jure_liege = d_cordoba
			hidden_tooltip = {
				location = {
					add_province_modifier = {
						name = d_cordoba_de_jure_liege
						duration = -1
					}
					remove_province_modifier = no_liege
				}
			}
			hidden_tooltip = { FROM = {	set_character_flag = creating_title_loop } }
		}
		hidden_tooltip = { clr_character_flag = creating_title_loop }

	}
	allow = {
		OR = {
			AND = {
			
				primary_title = { title = c_cordoba }
				primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = no_liege } }
				OR = {
					AND = {
						num_of_count_titles = 3
						NOT = { num_of_count_titles = 6 }
					}
					primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = isolated } }
				}
			}
			d_cordoba = {
				is_titular = no
			}
		}

	}
}

	color = { 250 220 20 }
	color2 = { 255 255 255 }
	capital = 178
	gain_effect = {
		primary_title = { copy_title_laws = c_la_mancha }
		
		IF = {
			limit = {
				d_la_mancha = { is_titular = yes }
			}
			character_event = { 
		id = nivve.0 tooltip = "Kingdom of Europa becomes the de jure liege of d_la_mancha" 
				}
			}
		any_demesne_title = {
			limit = {
				tier = COUNT
				location = { 
					AND = {
						has_province_modifier = no_liege
						OR = {
							is_primary_holder_title = yes
							any_neighbor_province = {
								owner = { character = ROOT }
							}
						}
					}
				}
				OR = {
					d_la_mancha = { is_titular = yes }
					FROM = { has_character_flag = creating_title_loop }
				}
			}
			de_jure_liege = d_la_mancha
			hidden_tooltip = {
				location = {
					add_province_modifier = {
						name = d_la_mancha_de_jure_liege
						duration = -1
					}
					remove_province_modifier = no_liege
				}
			}
			hidden_tooltip = { FROM = {	set_character_flag = creating_title_loop } }
		}
		hidden_tooltip = { clr_character_flag = creating_title_loop }

	}

		}

	}
}

d_granada = {
	color = { 245 242 15 }
	color2 = { 255 255 255 }
	capital = 180
	gain_effect = {
		primary_title = { copy_title_laws = c_granada }
		
		IF = {
			limit = {
				d_granada = { is_titular = yes }
			}
			character_event = { 
		id = nivve.0 tooltip = "Kingdom of Europa becomes the de jure liege of d_granada" 
				}
			}
		any_demesne_title = {
			limit = {
				tier = COUNT
				location = { 
					AND = {
						has_province_modifier = no_liege
						OR = {
							is_primary_holder_title = yes
							any_neighbor_province = {
								owner = { character = ROOT }
							}
						}
					}
				}
				OR = {
					d_granada = { is_titular = yes }
					FROM = { has_character_flag = creating_title_loop }
				}
			}
			de_jure_liege = d_granada
			hidden_tooltip = {
				location = {
					add_province_modifier = {
						name = d_granada_de_jure_liege
						duration = -1
					}
					remove_province_modifier = no_liege
				}
			}
			hidden_tooltip = { FROM = {	set_character_flag = creating_title_loop } }
		}
		hidden_tooltip = { clr_character_flag = creating_title_loop }

	}
	allow = {
		OR = {
			AND = {
			
				primary_title = { title = c_granada }
				primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = no_liege } }
				OR = {
					AND = {
						num_of_count_titles = 3
						NOT = { num_of_count_titles = 6 }
					}
					primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = isolated } }
				}
			}
			d_granada = {
				is_titular = no
			}
		}

	}
}

								owner = { character = ROOT }
							}
						}
					}
				}
				OR = {
					d_aracena = { is_titular = yes }
					FROM = { has_character_flag = creating_title_loop }
				}
			}
			de_jure_liege = d_aracena
			hidden_tooltip = {
				location = {
					add_province_modifier = {
						name = d_aracena_de_jure_liege
						duration = -1
					}
					remove_province_modifier = no_liege
				}
			}
			hidden_tooltip = { FROM = {	set_character_flag = creating_title_loop } }
		}
		hidden_tooltip = { clr_character_flag = creating_title_loop }

	}
	allow = {
		OR = {
			AND = {
			
				primary_title = { title = c_aracena }
				primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = no_liege } }
				OR = {
					AND = {
						num_of_count_titles = 3
						NOT = { num_of_count_titles = 6 }
					}
					primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = isolated } }
				}
			}
			d_aracena = {
				is_titular = no
			}
		}

	}
}

d_niebla = {
	color = { 248 216 41 }
	color2 = { 255 255 255 }
	capital = 164
	gain_effect = {
		primary_title = { copy_title_laws = c_niebla }
		
		IF = {
			limit = {
				d_niebla = { is_titular = yes }
			}
			character_event = { 
		id = nivve.0 tooltip = "Kingdom of Europa becomes the de jure liege of d_niebla" 
				}
			}
		any_demesne_title = {
			limit = {
				tier = COUNT
				location = { 
					AND = {
						has_province_modifier = no_liege
						OR = {
							is_primary_holder_title = yes
							any_neighbor_province = {
								owner = { character = ROOT }
							}
						}
					}
				}
				OR = {
					d_niebla = { is_titular = yes }
					FROM = { has_character_flag = creating_title_loop }
				}
			}
			de_jure_liege = d_niebla
			hidden_tooltip = {
				location = {
					add_province_modifier = {
						name = d_niebla_de_jure_liege
						duration = -1
					}
					remove_province_modifier = no_liege
				}
			}
			hidden_tooltip = { FROM = {	set_character_flag = creating_title_loop } }
		}
		hidden_tooltip = { clr_character_flag = creating_title_loop }

	}
	allow = {
		OR = {
			AND = {
			
				primary_title = { title = c_niebla }
				primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = no_liege } }
				OR = {
					AND = {
						num_of_count_titles = 3
						NOT = { num_of_count_titles = 6 }
					}
					primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = isolated } }
				}
			}
			d_niebla = {

			}

					add_province_modifier = {
						name = d_toledo_de_jure_liege
						duration = -1
					}
					remove_province_modifier = no_liege
				}
			}
			hidden_tooltip = { FROM = {	set_character_flag = creating_title_loop } }
		}
		hidden_tooltip = { clr_character_flag = creating_title_loop }

	}
	allow = {
		OR = {
			AND = {
			
				primary_title = { title = c_toledo }
				primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = no_liege } }
				OR = {
					AND = {
						num_of_count_titles = 3
						NOT = { num_of_count_titles = 6 }
					}
					primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = isolated } }
				}
			}
			d_toledo = {
				is_titular = no
			}
		}

	}
}

d_molina = {
	color = { 248 207 18 }
	color2 = { 255 255 255 }
	capital = 176
	gain_effect = {
		primary_title = { copy_title_laws = c_molina }
		
		IF = {
			limit = {
				d_molina = { is_titular = yes }
			}
			character_event = { 
		id = nivve.0 tooltip = "Kingdom of Europa becomes the de jure liege of d_molina" 
				}
			}
		any_demesne_title = {
			limit = {
				tier = COUNT
				location = { 
					AND = {
						has_province_modifier = no_liege
						OR = {
							is_primary_holder_title = yes
							any_neighbor_province = {
								owner = { character = ROOT }
							}
						}
					}
				}
				OR = {
					d_molina = { is_titular = yes }
					FROM = { has_character_flag = creating_title_loop }
				}
			}
			de_jure_liege = d_molina
			hidden_tooltip = {
				location = {
					add_province_modifier = {
						name = d_molina_de_jure_liege
						duration = -1
					}
					remove_province_modifier = no_liege
				}
			}
			hidden_tooltip = { FROM = {	set_character_flag = creating_title_loop } }
		}
		hidden_tooltip = { clr_character_flag = creating_title_loop }

	}
	allow = {
		OR = {
			AND = {
			
				primary_title = { title = c_molina }
				primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = no_liege } }
				OR = {
					AND = {
						num_of_count_titles = 3
						NOT = { num_of_count_titles = 6 }
					}
					primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = isolated } }
				}
			}
			d_molina = {
				is_titular = no
			}
		}

	}

			}

			limit = {
				tier = COUNT
				location = { 
					AND = {
						has_province_modifier = no_liege
						OR = {
							is_primary_holder_title = yes
							any_neighbor_province = {
								owner = { character = ROOT }
							}
						}
					}
				}
				OR = {
					d_tabuk = { is_titular = yes }
					FROM = { has_character_flag = creating_title_loop }
				}
			}
			de_jure_liege = d_tabuk
			hidden_tooltip = {
				location = {
					add_province_modifier = {
						name = d_tabuk_de_jure_liege
						duration = -1
					}
					remove_province_modifier = no_liege
				}
			}
			hidden_tooltip = { FROM = {	set_character_flag = creating_title_loop } }
		}
		hidden_tooltip = { clr_character_flag = creating_title_loop }

	}
	allow = {
		OR = {
			AND = {
			
				primary_title = { title = c_tabuk }
				primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = no_liege } }
				OR = {
					AND = {
						num_of_count_titles = 3
						NOT = { num_of_count_titles = 6 }
					}
					primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = isolated } }
				}
			}
			d_tabuk = {
				is_titular = no
			}
		}

	}
}

					}
					remove_province_modifier = no_liege
				}
			}
			hidden_tooltip = { FROM = {	set_character_flag = creating_title_loop } }
		}
		hidden_tooltip = { clr_character_flag = creating_title_loop }

	}
	allow = {
		OR = {
			AND = {
			
				primary_title = { title = c_asir }
				primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = no_liege } }
				OR = {
					AND = {
						num_of_count_titles = 3
						NOT = { num_of_count_titles = 6 }
					}
					primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = isolated } }
				}
			}
			d_asir = {
				is_titular = no
			}
		}

	}
}

d_bayda = {
	color = { 132 251 45 }
	color2 = { 255 255 255 }
	capital = 857
	gain_effect = {
		primary_title = { copy_title_laws = c_bayda }
		
		IF = {
			limit = {
				d_bayda = { is_titular = yes }
			}
			character_event = { 
		id = nivve.0 tooltip = "Kingdom of Europa becomes the de jure liege of d_bayda" 
				}
			}
		any_demesne_title = {
			limit = {
				tier = COUNT
				location = { 
					AND = {
						has_province_modifier = no_liege
						OR = {
							is_primary_holder_title = yes
							any_neighbor_province = {
								owner = { character = ROOT }
							}
						}
					}
				}
				OR = {
					d_bayda = { is_titular = yes }
					FROM = { has_character_flag = creating_title_loop }
				}
			}
			de_jure_liege = d_bayda
			hidden_tooltip = {
				location = {
					add_province_modifier = {
						name = d_bayda_de_jure_liege
						duration = -1
					}
					remove_province_modifier = no_liege
				}
			}
			hidden_tooltip = { FROM = {	set_character_flag = creating_title_loop } }
		}
		hidden_tooltip = { clr_character_flag = creating_title_loop }

	}
	allow = {
		OR = {
			AND = {
			
				primary_title = { title = c_bayda }
				primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = no_liege } }
				OR = {
					AND = {
						num_of_count_titles = 3
						NOT = { num_of_count_titles = 6 }
					}
					primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = isolated } }
				}
			}
			d_bayda = {
				is_titular = no
			}

	}
}

d_hajar = {
	color = { 98 201 7 }
	color2 = { 255 255 255 }
	capital = 869
	gain_effect = {
		primary_title = { copy_title_laws = c_hajar }
		
		IF = {
			limit = {
				d_hajar = { is_titular = yes }
			}
			character_event = { 
		id = nivve.0 tooltip = "Kingdom of Europa becomes the de jure liege of d_hajar" 
				}
			}
		any_demesne_title = {
			limit = {
				tier = COUNT
				location = { 
					AND = {
						has_province_modifier = no_liege
						OR = {
							is_primary_holder_title = yes
							any_neighbor_province = {
								owner = { character = ROOT }
							}
						}
					}
				}
				OR = {
					d_hajar = { is_titular = yes }
					FROM = { has_character_flag = creating_title_loop }
				}
			}
			de_jure_liege = d_hajar
			hidden_tooltip = {
				location = {
					add_province_modifier = {
						name = d_hajar_de_jure_liege
						duration = -1
					}
					remove_province_modifier = no_liege
				}
			}
			hidden_tooltip = { FROM = {	set_character_flag = creating_title_loop } }
		}
		hidden_tooltip = { clr_character_flag = creating_title_loop }

	}
	allow = {
		OR = {
			AND = {
			
				primary_title = { title = c_hajar }
				primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = no_liege } }
				OR = {
					AND = {
						num_of_count_titles = 3
						NOT = { num_of_count_titles = 6 }
					}
					primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = isolated } }
				}
			}
			d_hajar = {
				is_titular = no
			}
		}

	}
}

			de_jure_liege = k_rafha

		}
		hidden_tooltip = { clr_character_flag = creating_title_loop }

	}
	allow = {
		OR = {
			AND = {
			
				primary_title = { title = d_rafha }
				num_of_duke_titles = 3
			}
			k_rafha = {
				is_titular = no
			}
		}

	}
}

e_rafha = {
	color = { 174 253 67 }
	color2 = { 255 255 255 }
	capital = 865
	short_name = yes
	gain_effect = {
		primary_title = { copy_title_laws = k_rafha }
		
		any_demesne_title = {
			limit = {
				title = k_rafha
				OR = {

					FROM = { has_character_flag = creating_title_loop }
				}
			}
			de_jure_liege = e_rafha
			hidden_tooltip = { FROM = {	set_character_flag = creating_title_loop } }

			AND = {

				num_of_king_titles = 3
			}

d_hail = {
	color = { 178 253 71 }
	color2 = { 255 255 255 }
	capital = 864
	gain_effect = {
		primary_title = { copy_title_laws = c_hail }
		
		IF = {
			limit = {
				d_hail = { is_titular = yes }
			}
			character_event = { 
		id = nivve.0 tooltip = "Kingdom of Europa becomes the de jure liege of d_hail" 
				}
			}
		any_demesne_title = {
			limit = {
				tier = COUNT
				location = { 
					AND = {
						has_province_modifier = no_liege
						OR = {
							is_primary_holder_title = yes
							any_neighbor_province = {
								owner = { character = ROOT }
							}
						}
					}
				}
				OR = {
					d_hail = { is_titular = yes }
					FROM = { has_character_flag = creating_title_loop }
				}
			}
			de_jure_liege = d_hail
			hidden_tooltip = {
				location = {
					add_province_modifier = {
						name = d_hail_de_jure_liege
						duration = -1
					}
					remove_province_modifier = no_liege
				}
			}
			hidden_tooltip = { FROM = {	set_character_flag = creating_title_loop } }
		}
		hidden_tooltip = { clr_character_flag = creating_title_loop }

	}
	allow = {
		OR = {
			AND = {
			
				primary_title = { title = c_hail }
				primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = no_liege } }
				OR = {
					AND = {
						num_of_count_titles = 3
						NOT = { num_of_count_titles = 6 }
					}
					primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = isolated } }
				}
			}
			d_hail = {
				is_titular = no
			}
		}

	}
}

			limit = {
				title = k_bahrein
				OR = {
					e_bahrein = { is_titular = yes }
					FROM = { has_character_flag = creating_title_loop }
				}
			}
			de_jure_liege = e_bahrein
			hidden_tooltip = { FROM = {	set_character_flag = creating_title_loop } }
		}
		hidden_tooltip = { clr_character_flag = creating_title_loop }

	}
	allow = {
		OR = {
			AND = {
			
				primary_title = { title = k_bahrein }
				num_of_king_titles = 3
			}
			e_bahrein = {
				is_titular = no
			}
		}

	}
}

d_alexandria = {
	color = { 102 221 136 }
	color2 = { 255 255 255 }
	capital = 802
	gain_effect = {
		primary_title = { copy_title_laws = c_alexandria }
		
		IF = {
			limit = {
				d_alexandria = { is_titular = yes }
			}
			character_event = { 
		id = nivve.0 tooltip = "Kingdom of Europa becomes the de jure liege of d_alexandria" 
				}
			}
		any_demesne_title = {
			limit = {
				tier = COUNT
				location = { 
					AND = {
						has_province_modifier = no_liege
						OR = {
							is_primary_holder_title = yes
							any_neighbor_province = {
								owner = { character = ROOT }
							}
						}
					}
				}
				OR = {
					d_alexandria = { is_titular = yes }
					FROM = { has_character_flag = creating_title_loop }
				}
			}
			de_jure_liege = d_alexandria
			hidden_tooltip = {
				location = {
					add_province_modifier = {
						name = d_alexandria_de_jure_liege
						duration = -1
					}
					remove_province_modifier = no_liege
				}
			}
			hidden_tooltip = { FROM = {	set_character_flag = creating_title_loop } }
		}
		hidden_tooltip = { clr_character_flag = creating_title_loop }

	}
	allow = {
		OR = {
			AND = {
			
				primary_title = { title = c_alexandria }
				primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = no_liege } }
				OR = {
					AND = {
						num_of_count_titles = 3
						NOT = { num_of_count_titles = 6 }
					}
					primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = isolated } }
				}
			}
			d_alexandria = {
				is_titular = no
			}
		}

	}
}

			de_jure_liege = e_gabiyaha
			hidden_tooltip = { FROM = {	set_character_flag = creating_title_loop } }
		}
		hidden_tooltip = { clr_character_flag = creating_title_loop }

	}
	allow = {
		OR = {
			AND = {
			
				primary_title = { title = k_gabiyaha }
				num_of_king_titles = 3
			}
			e_gabiyaha = {
				is_titular = no
			}
		}

	}
}

d_delta = {
	color = { 9 255 80 }
	color2 = { 255 255 255 }
	capital = 798
	gain_effect = {
		primary_title = { copy_title_laws = c_delta }
		
		IF = {
			limit = {
				d_delta = { is_titular = yes }
			}
			character_event = { 
		id = nivve.0 tooltip = "Kingdom of Europa becomes the de jure liege of d_delta" 
				}
			}
		any_demesne_title = {
			limit = {
				tier = COUNT
				location = { 
					AND = {
						has_province_modifier = no_liege
						OR = {
							is_primary_holder_title = yes
							any_neighbor_province = {
								owner = { character = ROOT }
							}
						}
					}
				}
				OR = {
					d_delta = { is_titular = yes }
					FROM = { has_character_flag = creating_title_loop }
				}
			}
			de_jure_liege = d_delta
			hidden_tooltip = {
				location = {
					add_province_modifier = {
						name = d_delta_de_jure_liege
						duration = -1
					}
					remove_province_modifier = no_liege
				}
			}
			hidden_tooltip = { FROM = {	set_character_flag = creating_title_loop } }
		}
		hidden_tooltip = { clr_character_flag = creating_title_loop }

	}
	allow = {
		OR = {
			AND = {
			
				primary_title = { title = c_delta }
				primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = no_liege } }
				OR = {
					AND = {
						num_of_count_titles = 3
						NOT = { num_of_count_titles = 6 }
					}
					primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = isolated } }
				}
			}
			d_delta = {
				is_titular = no
			}
		}

	}
}

		IF = {
			limit = {
				d_quena = { is_titular = yes }
			}
			character_event = { 
		id = nivve.0 tooltip = "Kingdom of Europa becomes the de jure liege of d_quena" 
				}
			}
		any_demesne_title = {
			limit = {
				tier = COUNT
				location = { 
					AND = {
						has_province_modifier = no_liege
						OR = {
							is_primary_holder_title = yes
							any_neighbor_province = {
								owner = { character = ROOT }
							}
						}
					}
				}
				OR = {
					d_quena = { is_titular = yes }
					FROM = { has_character_flag = creating_title_loop }
				}
			}
			de_jure_liege = d_quena
			hidden_tooltip = {
				location = {
					add_province_modifier = {
						name = d_quena_de_jure_liege
						duration = -1
					}
					remove_province_modifier = no_liege
				}
			}
			hidden_tooltip = { FROM = {	set_character_flag = creating_title_loop } }
		}
		hidden_tooltip = { clr_character_flag = creating_title_loop }

	}
	allow = {
		OR = {
			AND = {
			
				primary_title = { title = c_quena }
				primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = no_liege } }
				OR = {
					AND = {
						num_of_count_titles = 3
						NOT = { num_of_count_titles = 6 }
					}
					primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = isolated } }
				}
			}
			d_quena = {
				is_titular = no
			}
		}

	}
}

				}
			}
			de_jure_liege = d_negev
			hidden_tooltip = {
				location = {
					add_province_modifier = {
						name = d_negev_de_jure_liege
						duration = -1
					}
					remove_province_modifier = no_liege
				}
			}
			hidden_tooltip = { FROM = {	set_character_flag = creating_title_loop } }
		}
		hidden_tooltip = { clr_character_flag = creating_title_loop }

	}
	allow = {
		OR = {
			AND = {
			
				primary_title = { title = c_negev }
				primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = no_liege } }
				OR = {
					AND = {
						num_of_count_titles = 3
						NOT = { num_of_count_titles = 6 }
					}
					primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = isolated } }
				}
			}
			d_negev = {
				is_titular = no
			}
		}

	}
}

d_monreal = {
	color = { 47 253 52 }
	color2 = { 255 255 255 }
	capital = 778
	bedouin_arabic = "Wadi Musa"
	maghreb_arabic = "Wadi Musa"
	levantine_arabic = "Wadi Musa"
	egyptian_arabic = "Wadi Musa"
	andalusian_arabic = "Wadi Musa"
	gain_effect = {
		primary_title = { copy_title_laws = c_monreal }
		
		IF = {
			limit = {
				d_monreal = { is_titular = yes }
			}
			character_event = { 
		id = nivve.0 tooltip = "Kingdom of Europa becomes the de jure liege of d_monreal" 
				}
			}
		any_demesne_title = {
			limit = {
				tier = COUNT
				location = { 
					AND = {
						has_province_modifier = no_liege
						OR = {
							is_primary_holder_title = yes
							any_neighbor_province = {
								owner = { character = ROOT }
							}
						}
					}
				}
				OR = {
					d_monreal = { is_titular = yes }
					FROM = { has_character_flag = creating_title_loop }
				}
			}
			de_jure_liege = d_monreal
			hidden_tooltip = {
				location = {
					add_province_modifier = {
						name = d_monreal_de_jure_liege
						duration = -1
					}
					remove_province_modifier = no_liege
				}
			}
			hidden_tooltip = { FROM = {	set_character_flag = creating_title_loop } }
		}
		hidden_tooltip = { clr_character_flag = creating_title_loop }

	}
	allow = {
		OR = {
			AND = {
			
				primary_title = { title = c_monreal }
				primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = no_liege } }
				OR = {
					AND = {
						num_of_count_titles = 3
						NOT = { num_of_count_titles = 6 }
					}
					primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = isolated } }
				}
			}
			d_monreal = {
				is_titular = no
			}
		}

	}
}

			hidden_tooltip = { FROM = {	set_character_flag = creating_title_loop } }
		}
		hidden_tooltip = { clr_character_flag = creating_title_loop }

	}
	allow = {
		OR = {
			AND = {
			
				primary_title = { title = k_jaffa }
				num_of_king_titles = 3
			}
			e_jaffa = {
				is_titular = no
			}
		}

	}
}

d_ascalon = {
	color = { 12 205 43 }
	color2 = { 255 255 255 }
	capital = 780
	bedouin_arabic = "Asqalan"
	maghreb_arabic = "Asqalan"
	levantine_arabic = "Asqalan"
	egyptian_arabic = "Asqalan"
	andalusian_arabic = "Asqalan"
	gain_effect = {
		primary_title = { copy_title_laws = c_ascalon }
		
		IF = {
			limit = {
				d_ascalon = { is_titular = yes }
			}
			character_event = { 
		id = nivve.0 tooltip = "Kingdom of Europa becomes the de jure liege of d_ascalon" 
				}
			}
		any_demesne_title = {
			limit = {
				tier = COUNT
				location = { 
					AND = {
						has_province_modifier = no_liege
						OR = {
							is_primary_holder_title = yes
							any_neighbor_province = {
								owner = { character = ROOT }
							}
						}
					}
				}
				OR = {
					d_ascalon = { is_titular = yes }
					FROM = { has_character_flag = creating_title_loop }
				}
			}
			de_jure_liege = d_ascalon
			hidden_tooltip = {
				location = {
					add_province_modifier = {
						name = d_ascalon_de_jure_liege
						duration = -1
					}
					remove_province_modifier = no_liege
				}
			}
			hidden_tooltip = { FROM = {	set_character_flag = creating_title_loop } }
		}
		hidden_tooltip = { clr_character_flag = creating_title_loop }

	}
	allow = {
		OR = {
			AND = {
			
				primary_title = { title = c_ascalon }
				primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = no_liege } }
				OR = {
					AND = {
						num_of_count_titles = 3
						NOT = { num_of_count_titles = 6 }
					}
					primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = isolated } }
				}
			}
			d_ascalon = {
				is_titular = no
			}
		}

	}
}

			hidden_tooltip = { FROM = {	set_character_flag = creating_title_loop } }
		}
		hidden_tooltip = { clr_character_flag = creating_title_loop }

	}
	allow = {
		OR = {
			AND = {
			
				primary_title = { title = k_tiberias }
				num_of_king_titles = 3
			}
			e_tiberias = {
				is_titular = no
			}
		}

	}
}

d_tyrus = {
	color = { 8 202 67 }
	color2 = { 255 255 255 }
	capital = 771
	bedouin_arabic = "Sur"
	maghreb_arabic = "Sur"
	levantine_arabic = "Sur"
	egyptian_arabic = "Sur"
	andalusian_arabic = "Sur"
	gain_effect = {
		primary_title = { copy_title_laws = c_tyrus }
		
		IF = {
			limit = {
				d_tyrus = { is_titular = yes }
			}
			character_event = { 
		id = nivve.0 tooltip = "Kingdom of Europa becomes the de jure liege of d_tyrus" 
				}
			}
		any_demesne_title = {
			limit = {
				tier = COUNT
				location = { 
					AND = {
						has_province_modifier = no_liege
						OR = {
							is_primary_holder_title = yes
							any_neighbor_province = {
								owner = { character = ROOT }
							}
						}
					}
				}
				OR = {
					d_tyrus = { is_titular = yes }
					FROM = { has_character_flag = creating_title_loop }
				}
			}
			de_jure_liege = d_tyrus
			hidden_tooltip = {
				location = {
					add_province_modifier = {
						name = d_tyrus_de_jure_liege
						duration = -1
					}
					remove_province_modifier = no_liege
				}
			}
			hidden_tooltip = { FROM = {	set_character_flag = creating_title_loop } }
		}
		hidden_tooltip = { clr_character_flag = creating_title_loop }

	}
	allow = {
		OR = {
			AND = {
			
				primary_title = { title = c_tyrus }
				primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = no_liege } }
				OR = {
					AND = {
						num_of_count_titles = 3
						NOT = { num_of_count_titles = 6 }
					}
					primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = isolated } }
				}
			}
			d_tyrus = {
				is_titular = no
			}
		}

	}
}

		hidden_tooltip = { clr_character_flag = creating_title_loop }

	}
	allow = {
		OR = {
			AND = {
			
				primary_title = { title = k_aleppo }
				num_of_king_titles = 3
			}
			e_aleppo = {
				is_titular = no
			}
		}

	}
}

d_homs = {
	color = { 93 240 28 }
	color2 = { 255 255 255 }
	capital = 731
	gain_effect = {
		primary_title = { copy_title_laws = c_homs }
		
		IF = {
			limit = {
				d_homs = { is_titular = yes }
			}
			character_event = { 
		id = nivve.0 tooltip = "Kingdom of Europa becomes the de jure liege of d_homs" 
				}
			}
		any_demesne_title = {
			limit = {
				tier = COUNT
				location = { 
					AND = {
						has_province_modifier = no_liege
						OR = {
							is_primary_holder_title = yes
							any_neighbor_province = {
								owner = { character = ROOT }
							}
						}
					}
				}
				OR = {
					d_homs = { is_titular = yes }
					FROM = { has_character_flag = creating_title_loop }
				}
			}
			de_jure_liege = d_homs
			hidden_tooltip = {
				location = {
					add_province_modifier = {
						name = d_homs_de_jure_liege
						duration = -1
					}
					remove_province_modifier = no_liege
				}
			}
			hidden_tooltip = { FROM = {	set_character_flag = creating_title_loop } }
		}
		hidden_tooltip = { clr_character_flag = creating_title_loop }

	}
	allow = {
		OR = {
			AND = {
			
				primary_title = { title = c_homs }
				primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = no_liege } }
				OR = {
					AND = {
						num_of_count_titles = 3
						NOT = { num_of_count_titles = 6 }
					}
					primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = isolated } }
				}
			}
			d_homs = {
				is_titular = no
			}
		}

	}
}

	gain_effect = {

		any_demesne_title = {
			limit = {
				title = k_tortosa
				OR = {
					e_tortosa = { is_titular = yes }
					FROM = { has_character_flag = creating_title_loop }
				}
			}
			de_jure_liege = e_tortosa
			hidden_tooltip = { FROM = {	set_character_flag = creating_title_loop } }
		}
		hidden_tooltip = { clr_character_flag = creating_title_loop }

	}
	allow = {
		OR = {
			AND = {
			
				primary_title = { title = k_tortosa }
				num_of_king_titles = 3
			}
			e_tortosa = {
				is_titular = no
			}
		}

	}
}

d_tripoli = {
	color = { 75 154 36 }
	color2 = { 255 255 255 }
	capital = 767
	gain_effect = {
		primary_title = { copy_title_laws = c_tripoli }
		
		IF = {
			limit = {
				d_tripoli = { is_titular = yes }
			}
			character_event = { 
		id = nivve.0 tooltip = "Kingdom of Europa becomes the de jure liege of d_tripoli" 
				}
			}
		any_demesne_title = {
			limit = {
				tier = COUNT
				location = { 
					AND = {
						has_province_modifier = no_liege
						OR = {
							is_primary_holder_title = yes
							any_neighbor_province = {
								owner = { character = ROOT }
							}
						}
					}
				}
				OR = {
					d_tripoli = { is_titular = yes }
					FROM = { has_character_flag = creating_title_loop }
				}
			}
			de_jure_liege = d_tripoli
			hidden_tooltip = {
				location = {
					add_province_modifier = {
						name = d_tripoli_de_jure_liege
						duration = -1
					}
					remove_province_modifier = no_liege
				}
			}
			hidden_tooltip = { FROM = {	set_character_flag = creating_title_loop } }
		}
		hidden_tooltip = { clr_character_flag = creating_title_loop }

	}
	allow = {
		OR = {
			AND = {
			
				primary_title = { title = c_tripoli }
				primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = no_liege } }
				OR = {
					AND = {
						num_of_count_titles = 3
						NOT = { num_of_count_titles = 6 }
					}
					primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = isolated } }
				}
			}
			d_tripoli = {
				is_titular = no
			}
		}

	}
}

k_tripoli = {
	color = { 75 154 36 }
	color2 = { 255 255 255 }
	capital = 767
	gain_effect = {

		}
		hidden_tooltip = { clr_character_flag = creating_title_loop }

	}
	allow = {
		OR = {
			AND = {
			
				primary_title = { title = d_tripoli }
				num_of_duke_titles = 3
			}
			k_tripoli = {
				is_titular = no
			}
		}

	}

	}
	allow = {
		OR = {
			AND = {
			
				primary_title = { title = k_az_zarqa }
				num_of_king_titles = 3
			}
			e_az_zarqa = {
				is_titular = no
			}
		}

	}
}

d_amman = {
	color = { 131 255 12 }
	color2 = { 255 255 255 }
	capital = 724
	gain_effect = {
		primary_title = { copy_title_laws = c_amman }
		
		IF = {
			limit = {
				d_amman = { is_titular = yes }
			}
			character_event = { 
		id = nivve.0 tooltip = "Kingdom of Europa becomes the de jure liege of d_amman" 
				}
			}
		any_demesne_title = {
			limit = {
				tier = COUNT
				location = { 
					AND = {
						has_province_modifier = no_liege
						OR = {
							is_primary_holder_title = yes
							any_neighbor_province = {
								owner = { character = ROOT }
							}
						}
					}
				}
				OR = {
					d_amman = { is_titular = yes }
					FROM = { has_character_flag = creating_title_loop }
				}
			}
			de_jure_liege = d_amman
			hidden_tooltip = {
				location = {
					add_province_modifier = {
						name = d_amman_de_jure_liege
						duration = -1
					}
					remove_province_modifier = no_liege
				}
			}
			hidden_tooltip = { FROM = {	set_character_flag = creating_title_loop } }
		}
		hidden_tooltip = { clr_character_flag = creating_title_loop }

	}
	allow = {
		OR = {
			AND = {
			
				primary_title = { title = c_amman }
				primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = no_liege } }
				OR = {
					AND = {
						num_of_count_titles = 3
						NOT = { num_of_count_titles = 6 }
					}
					primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = isolated } }
				}
			}
			d_amman = {
				is_titular = no
			}
		}

	}
}

				d_marrakech = { is_titular = yes }
			}
			character_event = { 
		id = nivve.0 tooltip = "Kingdom of Europa becomes the de jure liege of d_marrakech" 
				}
			}
		any_demesne_title = {
			limit = {
				tier = COUNT
				location = { 
					AND = {
						has_province_modifier = no_liege
						OR = {
							is_primary_holder_title = yes
							any_neighbor_province = {
								owner = { character = ROOT }
							}
						}
					}
				}
				OR = {
					d_marrakech = { is_titular = yes }
					FROM = { has_character_flag = creating_title_loop }
				}
			}
			de_jure_liege = d_marrakech
			hidden_tooltip = {
				location = {
					add_province_modifier = {
						name = d_marrakech_de_jure_liege
						duration = -1
					}
					remove_province_modifier = no_liege
				}
			}
			hidden_tooltip = { FROM = {	set_character_flag = creating_title_loop } }
		}
		hidden_tooltip = { clr_character_flag = creating_title_loop }

	}
	allow = {
		OR = {
			AND = {
			
				primary_title = { title = c_marrakech }
				primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = no_liege } }
				OR = {
					AND = {
						num_of_count_titles = 3
						NOT = { num_of_count_titles = 6 }
					}
					primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = isolated } }
				}
			}
			d_marrakech = {
				is_titular = no
			}
		}

	}
}

				}
			}
			de_jure_liege = d_infa
			hidden_tooltip = {
				location = {
					add_province_modifier = {
						name = d_infa_de_jure_liege
						duration = -1
					}
					remove_province_modifier = no_liege
				}
			}
			hidden_tooltip = { FROM = {	set_character_flag = creating_title_loop } }
		}
		hidden_tooltip = { clr_character_flag = creating_title_loop }

	}
	allow = {
		OR = {
			AND = {
			
				primary_title = { title = c_infa }
				primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = no_liege } }
				OR = {
					AND = {
						num_of_count_titles = 3
						NOT = { num_of_count_titles = 6 }
					}
					primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = isolated } }
				}
			}
			d_infa = {
				is_titular = no
			}
		}

	}
}

d_tangiers = {
	color = { 51 255 9 }
	color2 = { 255 255 255 }
	capital = 841
	gain_effect = {
		primary_title = { copy_title_laws = c_tangiers }
		
		IF = {
			limit = {
				d_tangiers = { is_titular = yes }
			}
			character_event = { 
		id = nivve.0 tooltip = "Kingdom of Europa becomes the de jure liege of d_tangiers" 
				}
			}
		any_demesne_title = {
			limit = {
				tier = COUNT
				location = { 
					AND = {
						has_province_modifier = no_liege
						OR = {
							is_primary_holder_title = yes
							any_neighbor_province = {
								owner = { character = ROOT }
							}
						}
					}
				}
				OR = {
					d_tangiers = { is_titular = yes }
					FROM = { has_character_flag = creating_title_loop }
				}
			}
			de_jure_liege = d_tangiers
			hidden_tooltip = {
				location = {
					add_province_modifier = {
						name = d_tangiers_de_jure_liege
						duration = -1
					}
					remove_province_modifier = no_liege
				}
			}
			hidden_tooltip = { FROM = {	set_character_flag = creating_title_loop } }
		}
		hidden_tooltip = { clr_character_flag = creating_title_loop }

	}
	allow = {
		OR = {
			AND = {
			
				primary_title = { title = c_tangiers }
				primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = no_liege } }
				OR = {
					AND = {
						num_of_count_titles = 3
						NOT = { num_of_count_titles = 6 }
					}
					primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = isolated } }
				}
			}
			d_tangiers = {

			}

			AND = {

				primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = no_liege } }
				OR = {
					AND = {
						num_of_count_titles = 3
						NOT = { num_of_count_titles = 6 }
					}
					primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = isolated } }
				}
			}
			d_sijilmasa = {
				is_titular = no
			}
		}

	}
}

				OR = {

d_atlas_mnt = {
	color = { 49 196 83 }
	color2 = { 255 255 255 }
	capital = 833
	gain_effect = {
		primary_title = { copy_title_laws = c_atlas_mnt }
		
		IF = {
			limit = {
				d_atlas_mnt = { is_titular = yes }
			}
			character_event = { 
		id = nivve.0 tooltip = "Kingdom of Europa becomes the de jure liege of d_atlas_mnt" 
				}
			}
		any_demesne_title = {
			limit = {
				tier = COUNT
				location = { 
					AND = {
						has_province_modifier = no_liege
						OR = {
							is_primary_holder_title = yes
							any_neighbor_province = {
								owner = { character = ROOT }
							}
						}
					}
				}
				OR = {
					d_atlas_mnt = { is_titular = yes }
					FROM = { has_character_flag = creating_title_loop }
				}
			}
			de_jure_liege = d_atlas_mnt
			hidden_tooltip = {
				location = {
					add_province_modifier = {
						name = d_atlas_mnt_de_jure_liege
						duration = -1
					}
					remove_province_modifier = no_liege
				}
			}
			hidden_tooltip = { FROM = {	set_character_flag = creating_title_loop } }
		}
		hidden_tooltip = { clr_character_flag = creating_title_loop }

	}
	allow = {
		OR = {
			AND = {
			
				primary_title = { title = c_atlas_mnt }
				primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = no_liege } }
				OR = {
					AND = {
						num_of_count_titles = 3
						NOT = { num_of_count_titles = 6 }
					}
					primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = isolated } }
				}
			}
			d_atlas_mnt = {
				is_titular = no
			}
		}

	}
}

				primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = no_liege } }
				OR = {
					AND = {
						num_of_count_titles = 3
						NOT = { num_of_count_titles = 6 }
					}
					primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = isolated } }
				}
			}
			d_biskra = {
				is_titular = no
			}
		}

	}
}

		any_demesne_title = {
			limit = {

				OR = {

d_tlemcen = {
	color = { 43 190 77 }
	color2 = { 255 255 255 }
	capital = 834
	gain_effect = {
		primary_title = { copy_title_laws = c_tlemcen }
		
		IF = {
			limit = {
				d_tlemcen = { is_titular = yes }
			}
			character_event = { 
		id = nivve.0 tooltip = "Kingdom of Europa becomes the de jure liege of d_tlemcen" 
				}
			}
		any_demesne_title = {
			limit = {
				tier = COUNT
				location = { 
					AND = {
						has_province_modifier = no_liege
						OR = {
							is_primary_holder_title = yes
							any_neighbor_province = {
								owner = { character = ROOT }
							}
						}
					}
				}
				OR = {
					d_tlemcen = { is_titular = yes }
					FROM = { has_character_flag = creating_title_loop }
				}
			}
			de_jure_liege = d_tlemcen
			hidden_tooltip = {
				location = {
					add_province_modifier = {
						name = d_tlemcen_de_jure_liege
						duration = -1
					}
					remove_province_modifier = no_liege
				}
			}
			hidden_tooltip = { FROM = {	set_character_flag = creating_title_loop } }
		}
		hidden_tooltip = { clr_character_flag = creating_title_loop }

	}
	allow = {
		OR = {
			AND = {
			
				primary_title = { title = c_tlemcen }
				primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = no_liege } }
				OR = {
					AND = {
						num_of_count_titles = 3
						NOT = { num_of_count_titles = 6 }
					}
					primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = isolated } }
				}
			}
			d_tlemcen = {
				is_titular = no
			}
		}

	}
}

	gain_effect = {
		primary_title = { copy_title_laws = d_medjerda }
		
		any_demesne_title = {
			limit = {
				title = d_medjerda
				OR = {
					k_medjerda = { is_titular = yes }
					FROM = { has_character_flag = creating_title_loop }
				}
			}
			de_jure_liege = k_medjerda
			hidden_tooltip = { FROM = {	set_character_flag = creating_title_loop } }
		}
		hidden_tooltip = { clr_character_flag = creating_title_loop }

	}
	allow = {
		OR = {
			AND = {
			
				primary_title = { title = d_medjerda }
				num_of_duke_titles = 3
			}
			k_medjerda = {
				is_titular = no
			}
		}

	}
}

e_medjerda = {
	color = { 26 238 101 }
	color2 = { 255 255 255 }
	capital = 818
	short_name = yes
	gain_effect = {
		primary_title = { copy_title_laws = k_medjerda }
		
		any_demesne_title = {
			limit = {
				title = k_medjerda
				OR = {
					e_medjerda = { is_titular = yes }
					FROM = { has_character_flag = creating_title_loop }
				}
			}
			de_jure_liege = e_medjerda
			hidden_tooltip = { FROM = {	set_character_flag = creating_title_loop } }
		}
		hidden_tooltip = { clr_character_flag = creating_title_loop }

	}
	allow = {
		OR = {
			AND = {
			
				primary_title = { title = k_medjerda }
				num_of_king_titles = 3
			}
			e_medjerda = {
				is_titular = no
			}
		}

	}
}

d_bizerte = {
	color = { 29 241 104 }
	color2 = { 255 255 255 }
	capital = 819
	gain_effect = {
		primary_title = { copy_title_laws = c_bizerte }
		
		IF = {
			limit = {
				d_bizerte = { is_titular = yes }
			}
			character_event = { 
		id = nivve.0 tooltip = "Kingdom of Europa becomes the de jure liege of d_bizerte" 
				}
			}
		any_demesne_title = {
			limit = {
				tier = COUNT
				location = { 
					AND = {
						has_province_modifier = no_liege
						OR = {
							is_primary_holder_title = yes
							any_neighbor_province = {
								owner = { character = ROOT }
							}
						}
					}
				}
				OR = {
					d_bizerte = { is_titular = yes }
					FROM = { has_character_flag = creating_title_loop }
				}
			}
			de_jure_liege = d_bizerte
			hidden_tooltip = {
				location = {
					add_province_modifier = {
						name = d_bizerte_de_jure_liege
						duration = -1
					}
					remove_province_modifier = no_liege
				}
			}
			hidden_tooltip = { FROM = {	set_character_flag = creating_title_loop } }
		}
		hidden_tooltip = { clr_character_flag = creating_title_loop }

	}
	allow = {
		OR = {
			AND = {
			
				primary_title = { title = c_bizerte }
				primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = no_liege } }
				OR = {
					AND = {
						num_of_count_titles = 3
						NOT = { num_of_count_titles = 6 }
					}
					primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = isolated } }
				}
			}
			d_bizerte = {
				is_titular = no
			}
		}

	}
}

k_bizerte = {
	color = { 29 241 104 }
	color2 = { 255 255 255 }
	capital = 819

			AND = {
			
				primary_title = { title = d_djerba }
				num_of_duke_titles = 3
			}
			k_djerba = {
				is_titular = no
			}
		}

	}
}

	color = { 49 196 111 }
	color2 = { 255 255 255 }
	capital = 813
	short_name = yes
	gain_effect = {
		primary_title = { copy_title_laws = k_djerba }
		
		any_demesne_title = {
			limit = {
				title = k_djerba
				OR = {

					FROM = { has_character_flag = creating_title_loop }
				}
			}
			de_jure_liege = e_djerba

d_leptis_magna = {
	color = { 53 200 115 }
	color2 = { 255 255 255 }
	capital = 810
	gain_effect = {
		primary_title = { copy_title_laws = c_leptis_magna }
		
		IF = {
			limit = {
				d_leptis_magna = { is_titular = yes }
			}
			character_event = { 
		id = nivve.0 tooltip = "Kingdom of Europa becomes the de jure liege of d_leptis_magna" 
				}
			}
		any_demesne_title = {
			limit = {
				tier = COUNT
				location = { 
					AND = {
						has_province_modifier = no_liege
						OR = {
							is_primary_holder_title = yes
							any_neighbor_province = {
								owner = { character = ROOT }
							}
						}
					}
				}
				OR = {
					d_leptis_magna = { is_titular = yes }
					FROM = { has_character_flag = creating_title_loop }
				}
			}
			de_jure_liege = d_leptis_magna
			hidden_tooltip = {
				location = {
					add_province_modifier = {
						name = d_leptis_magna_de_jure_liege
						duration = -1
					}
					remove_province_modifier = no_liege
				}
			}
			hidden_tooltip = { FROM = {	set_character_flag = creating_title_loop } }
		}
		hidden_tooltip = { clr_character_flag = creating_title_loop }

	}
	allow = {
		OR = {
			AND = {
			
				primary_title = { title = c_leptis_magna }
				primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = no_liege } }
				OR = {
					AND = {
						num_of_count_titles = 3
						NOT = { num_of_count_titles = 6 }
					}
					primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = isolated } }
				}
			}
			d_leptis_magna = {
				is_titular = no
			}
		}

	}
}

e_tobruk = {
	color = { 40 158 71 }
	color2 = { 255 255 255 }
	capital = 805
	short_name = yes
	gain_effect = {
		primary_title = { copy_title_laws = k_tobruk }
		
		any_demesne_title = {
			limit = {
				title = k_tobruk
				OR = {
					e_tobruk = { is_titular = yes }
					FROM = { has_character_flag = creating_title_loop }
				}
			}
			de_jure_liege = e_tobruk
			hidden_tooltip = { FROM = {	set_character_flag = creating_title_loop } }
		}
		hidden_tooltip = { clr_character_flag = creating_title_loop }

	}
	allow = {
		OR = {
			AND = {
			
				primary_title = { title = k_tobruk }
				num_of_king_titles = 3
			}
			e_tobruk = {
				is_titular = no
			}
		}

	}
}

d_beni_yanni = {
	color = { 35 153 46 }
	color2 = { 255 255 255 }
	capital = 825
	gain_effect = {
		primary_title = { copy_title_laws = c_beni_yanni }
		
		IF = {
			limit = {
				d_beni_yanni = { is_titular = yes }
			}
			character_event = { 
		id = nivve.0 tooltip = "Kingdom of Europa becomes the de jure liege of d_beni_yanni" 
				}
			}
		any_demesne_title = {
			limit = {
				tier = COUNT
				location = { 
					AND = {
						has_province_modifier = no_liege
						OR = {
							is_primary_holder_title = yes
							any_neighbor_province = {
								owner = { character = ROOT }
							}
						}
					}
				}
				OR = {
					d_beni_yanni = { is_titular = yes }
					FROM = { has_character_flag = creating_title_loop }
				}
			}
			de_jure_liege = d_beni_yanni
			hidden_tooltip = {
				location = {
					add_province_modifier = {
						name = d_beni_yanni_de_jure_liege
						duration = -1
					}
					remove_province_modifier = no_liege
				}
			}
			hidden_tooltip = { FROM = {	set_character_flag = creating_title_loop } }
		}
		hidden_tooltip = { clr_character_flag = creating_title_loop }

	}
	allow = {
		OR = {
			AND = {
			
				primary_title = { title = c_beni_yanni }
				primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = no_liege } }
				OR = {
					AND = {
						num_of_count_titles = 3
						NOT = { num_of_count_titles = 6 }
					}
					primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = isolated } }
				}
			}
			d_beni_yanni = {
				is_titular = no
			}
		}

	}
}

			de_jure_liege = e_busaso
			hidden_tooltip = { FROM = {	set_character_flag = creating_title_loop } }
		}
		hidden_tooltip = { clr_character_flag = creating_title_loop }

	}
	allow = {
		OR = {
			AND = {
			
				primary_title = { title = k_busaso }
				num_of_king_titles = 3
			}
			e_busaso = {
				is_titular = no
			}
		}

	}
}

	color = { 157 6 63 }
	color2 = { 255 255 255 }
	capital = 872
	gain_effect = {
		primary_title = { copy_title_laws = c_berbera }
		
		IF = {
			limit = {
				d_berbera = { is_titular = yes }
			}
			character_event = { 
		id = nivve.0 tooltip = "Kingdom of Europa becomes the de jure liege of d_berbera" 
				}
			}
		any_demesne_title = {
			limit = {
				tier = COUNT
				location = { 
					AND = {
						has_province_modifier = no_liege
						OR = {
							is_primary_holder_title = yes
							any_neighbor_province = {
								owner = { character = ROOT }
							}
						}
					}
				}
				OR = {
					d_berbera = { is_titular = yes }
					FROM = { has_character_flag = creating_title_loop }
				}
			}
			de_jure_liege = d_berbera
			hidden_tooltip = {
				location = {
					add_province_modifier = {
						name = d_berbera_de_jure_liege
						duration = -1
					}
					remove_province_modifier = no_liege
				}
			}
			hidden_tooltip = { FROM = {	set_character_flag = creating_title_loop } }
		}
		hidden_tooltip = { clr_character_flag = creating_title_loop }

				primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = no_liege } }
				OR = {

	capital = 880
	gain_effect = {
		primary_title = { copy_title_laws = c_sennar }
		
		IF = {
			limit = {
				d_sennar = { is_titular = yes }
			}
			character_event = { 
		id = nivve.0 tooltip = "Kingdom of Europa becomes the de jure liege of d_sennar" 
				}
			}
		any_demesne_title = {
			limit = {
				tier = COUNT
				location = { 
					AND = {
						has_province_modifier = no_liege
						OR = {
							is_primary_holder_title = yes
							any_neighbor_province = {
								owner = { character = ROOT }
							}
						}
					}
				}
				OR = {
					d_sennar = { is_titular = yes }
					FROM = { has_character_flag = creating_title_loop }
				}
			}
			de_jure_liege = d_sennar
			hidden_tooltip = {
				location = {
					add_province_modifier = {
						name = d_sennar_de_jure_liege
						duration = -1
					}
					remove_province_modifier = no_liege
				}
			}
			hidden_tooltip = { FROM = {	set_character_flag = creating_title_loop } }
		}
		hidden_tooltip = { clr_character_flag = creating_title_loop }

	}
	allow = {
		OR = {
			AND = {
			
				primary_title = { title = c_sennar }
				primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = no_liege } }
				OR = {
					AND = {
						num_of_count_titles = 3
						NOT = { num_of_count_titles = 6 }
					}
					primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = isolated } }
				}
			}
			d_sennar = {
				is_titular = no
			}
		}

	}
}

k_sennar = {
	color = { 210 42 105 }
	color2 = { 255 255 255 }
	capital = 880
	gain_effect = {
		primary_title = { copy_title_laws = d_sennar }
		
		any_demesne_title = {
			limit = {
				title = d_sennar
				OR = {
					k_sennar = { is_titular = yes }
					FROM = { has_character_flag = creating_title_loop }
				}
			}
			de_jure_liege = k_sennar
			hidden_tooltip = { FROM = {	set_character_flag = creating_title_loop } }
		}
		hidden_tooltip = { clr_character_flag = creating_title_loop }

	}
	allow = {
		OR = {
			AND = {
			
				primary_title = { title = d_sennar }
				num_of_duke_titles = 3
			}
			k_sennar = {
				is_titular = no
			}
		}

	}
}

	}
	allow = {

			AND = {
			
				primary_title = { title = k_sennar }
				num_of_king_titles = 3
			}
			e_sennar = {
				is_titular = no
			}
		}

					FROM = { has_character_flag = creating_title_loop }
				}
			}
			de_jure_liege = d_makuria
			hidden_tooltip = {
				location = {
					add_province_modifier = {
						name = d_makuria_de_jure_liege
						duration = -1
					}
					remove_province_modifier = no_liege
				}
			}
			hidden_tooltip = { FROM = {	set_character_flag = creating_title_loop } }
		}
		hidden_tooltip = { clr_character_flag = creating_title_loop }

	}
	allow = {
		OR = {
			AND = {
			
				primary_title = { title = c_makuria }
				primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = no_liege } }
				OR = {
					AND = {
						num_of_count_titles = 3
						NOT = { num_of_count_titles = 6 }
					}
					primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = isolated } }
				}
			}
			d_makuria = {
				is_titular = no
			}
		}

	}
}

d_nubia = {
	color = { 47 194 126 }
	color2 = { 255 255 255 }
	capital = 792
	gain_effect = {
		primary_title = { copy_title_laws = c_nubia }
		
		IF = {
			limit = {
				d_nubia = { is_titular = yes }
			}
			character_event = { 
		id = nivve.0 tooltip = "Kingdom of Europa becomes the de jure liege of d_nubia" 
				}
			}
		any_demesne_title = {
			limit = {
				tier = COUNT
				location = { 
					AND = {
						has_province_modifier = no_liege
						OR = {
							is_primary_holder_title = yes
							any_neighbor_province = {
								owner = { character = ROOT }
							}
						}
					}
				}
				OR = {
					d_nubia = { is_titular = yes }
					FROM = { has_character_flag = creating_title_loop }
				}
			}
			de_jure_liege = d_nubia
			hidden_tooltip = {
				location = {
					add_province_modifier = {
						name = d_nubia_de_jure_liege
						duration = -1
					}
					remove_province_modifier = no_liege
				}
			}
			hidden_tooltip = { FROM = {	set_character_flag = creating_title_loop } }
		}
		hidden_tooltip = { clr_character_flag = creating_title_loop }

	}
	allow = {
		OR = {
			AND = {
			
				primary_title = { title = c_nubia }
				primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = no_liege } }
				OR = {
					AND = {
						num_of_count_titles = 3
						NOT = { num_of_count_titles = 6 }
					}
					primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = isolated } }
				}
			}

		hidden_tooltip = { clr_character_flag = creating_title_loop }

	}
	allow = {
		OR = {
			AND = {
			
				primary_title = { title = c_cumberland }
				primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = no_liege } }
				OR = {
					AND = {
						num_of_count_titles = 3
						NOT = { num_of_count_titles = 6 }
					}
					primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = isolated } }
				}
			}
			d_cumberland = {
				is_titular = no
			}
		}

	}
}

d_lancaster = {
	color = { 255 50 5 }
	color2 = { 255 255 255 }
	capital = 58
	gain_effect = {
		primary_title = { copy_title_laws = c_lancaster }
		
		IF = {
			limit = {
				d_lancaster = { is_titular = yes }
			}
			character_event = { 
		id = nivve.0 tooltip = "Kingdom of Europa becomes the de jure liege of d_lancaster" 
				}
			}
		any_demesne_title = {
			limit = {
				tier = COUNT
				location = { 
					AND = {
						has_province_modifier = no_liege
						OR = {
							is_primary_holder_title = yes
							any_neighbor_province = {
								owner = { character = ROOT }
							}
						}
					}
				}
				OR = {
					d_lancaster = { is_titular = yes }
					FROM = { has_character_flag = creating_title_loop }
				}
			}
			de_jure_liege = d_lancaster
			hidden_tooltip = {
				location = {
					add_province_modifier = {
						name = d_lancaster_de_jure_liege
						duration = -1
					}
					remove_province_modifier = no_liege
				}
			}
			hidden_tooltip = { FROM = {	set_character_flag = creating_title_loop } }
		}
		hidden_tooltip = { clr_character_flag = creating_title_loop }

	}
	allow = {
		OR = {
			AND = {
			
				primary_title = { title = c_lancaster }
				primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = no_liege } }
				OR = {
					AND = {
						num_of_count_titles = 3
						NOT = { num_of_count_titles = 6 }
					}
					primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = isolated } }
				}
			}
			d_lancaster = {
				is_titular = no
			}
		}

	}

	}
	allow = {
		OR = {
			AND = {
			
				primary_title = { title = c_leicester }
				primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = no_liege } }
				OR = {
					AND = {
						num_of_count_titles = 3
						NOT = { num_of_count_titles = 6 }
					}
					primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = isolated } }
				}
			}
			d_leicester = {
				is_titular = no
			}
		}

	}
}

k_leicester = {
	color = { 255 85 10 }
	color2 = { 255 255 255 }
	capital = 62
	gain_effect = {
		primary_title = { copy_title_laws = d_leicester }
		
		any_demesne_title = {
			limit = {
				title = d_leicester
				OR = {
					k_leicester = { is_titular = yes }
					FROM = { has_character_flag = creating_title_loop }
				}
			}
			de_jure_liege = k_leicester
			hidden_tooltip = { FROM = {	set_character_flag = creating_title_loop } }
		}
		hidden_tooltip = { clr_character_flag = creating_title_loop }

	}

			AND = {

				num_of_duke_titles = 3
			}
			k_leicester = {

d_lincoln = {
	color = { 255 90 20 }
	color2 = { 255 255 255 }
	capital = 61
	gain_effect = {
		primary_title = { copy_title_laws = c_lincoln }
		
		IF = {
			limit = {
				d_lincoln = { is_titular = yes }
			}
			character_event = { 
		id = nivve.0 tooltip = "Kingdom of Europa becomes the de jure liege of d_lincoln" 
				}
			}
		any_demesne_title = {
			limit = {
				tier = COUNT
				location = { 
					AND = {
						has_province_modifier = no_liege
						OR = {
							is_primary_holder_title = yes
							any_neighbor_province = {
								owner = { character = ROOT }
							}
						}
					}
				}
				OR = {
					d_lincoln = { is_titular = yes }
					FROM = { has_character_flag = creating_title_loop }
				}
			}
			de_jure_liege = d_lincoln
			hidden_tooltip = {
				location = {
					add_province_modifier = {
						name = d_lincoln_de_jure_liege
						duration = -1
					}
					remove_province_modifier = no_liege
				}
			}
			hidden_tooltip = { FROM = {	set_character_flag = creating_title_loop } }
		}
		hidden_tooltip = { clr_character_flag = creating_title_loop }

	}
	allow = {
		OR = {
			AND = {
			
				primary_title = { title = c_lincoln }
				primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = no_liege } }
				OR = {
					AND = {
						num_of_count_titles = 3
						NOT = { num_of_count_titles = 6 }
					}
					primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = isolated } }
				}
			}
			d_lincoln = {
				is_titular = no
			}
		}

	}
}

				title = d_essex
				OR = {
					k_essex = { is_titular = yes }
					FROM = { has_character_flag = creating_title_loop }
				}
			}
			de_jure_liege = k_essex
			hidden_tooltip = { FROM = {	set_character_flag = creating_title_loop } }
		}
		hidden_tooltip = { clr_character_flag = creating_title_loop }

	}
	allow = {
		OR = {
			AND = {
			
				primary_title = { title = d_essex }
				num_of_duke_titles = 3
			}
			k_essex = {
				is_titular = no
			}
		}

	}
}

e_essex = {
	color = { 241 25 25 }
	color2 = { 255 255 255 }
	capital = 72
	short_name = yes
	gain_effect = {
		primary_title = { copy_title_laws = k_essex }

			limit = {

				num_of_king_titles = 3

d_northampton = {
	color = { 255 110 5 }
	color2 = { 255 255 255 }
	capital = 68
	gain_effect = {
		primary_title = { copy_title_laws = c_northampton }
		
		IF = {
			limit = {
				d_northampton = { is_titular = yes }
			}
			character_event = { 
		id = nivve.0 tooltip = "Kingdom of Europa becomes the de jure liege of d_northampton" 
				}
			}
		any_demesne_title = {
			limit = {
				tier = COUNT
				location = { 
					AND = {
						has_province_modifier = no_liege
						OR = {
							is_primary_holder_title = yes
							any_neighbor_province = {
								owner = { character = ROOT }
							}
						}
					}
				}
				OR = {
					d_northampton = { is_titular = yes }
					FROM = { has_character_flag = creating_title_loop }
				}
			}
			de_jure_liege = d_northampton
			hidden_tooltip = {
				location = {
					add_province_modifier = {
						name = d_northampton_de_jure_liege
						duration = -1
					}
					remove_province_modifier = no_liege
				}
			}
			hidden_tooltip = { FROM = {	set_character_flag = creating_title_loop } }
		}
		hidden_tooltip = { clr_character_flag = creating_title_loop }

	}
	allow = {
		OR = {
			AND = {
			
				primary_title = { title = c_northampton }
				primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = no_liege } }
				OR = {
					AND = {
						num_of_count_titles = 3
						NOT = { num_of_count_titles = 6 }
					}
					primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = isolated } }
				}
			}
			d_northampton = {
				is_titular = no
			}
		}

	}
}

	color = { 255 110 5 }

	short_name = yes
	gain_effect = {
		primary_title = { copy_title_laws = k_gloucester }
		
		any_demesne_title = {
			limit = {
				title = k_gloucester
				OR = {
					e_gloucester = { is_titular = yes }
					FROM = { has_character_flag = creating_title_loop }
				}
			}
			de_jure_liege = e_gloucester
			hidden_tooltip = { FROM = {	set_character_flag = creating_title_loop } }
		}
		hidden_tooltip = { clr_character_flag = creating_title_loop }

	}
	allow = {
		OR = {
			AND = {
			
				primary_title = { title = k_gloucester }
				num_of_king_titles = 3
			}
			e_gloucester = {
				is_titular = no
			}
		}

	}
}

d_wiltshire = {
	color = { 241 95 45 }
	color2 = { 255 255 255 }
	capital = 23
	gain_effect = {
		primary_title = { copy_title_laws = c_wiltshire }
		
		IF = {
			limit = {
				d_wiltshire = { is_titular = yes }
			}
			character_event = { 
		id = nivve.0 tooltip = "Kingdom of Europa becomes the de jure liege of d_wiltshire" 
				}
			}
		any_demesne_title = {
			limit = {
				tier = COUNT
				location = { 
					AND = {
						has_province_modifier = no_liege
						OR = {
							is_primary_holder_title = yes
							any_neighbor_province = {
								owner = { character = ROOT }
							}
						}
					}
				}
				OR = {
					d_wiltshire = { is_titular = yes }
					FROM = { has_character_flag = creating_title_loop }
				}
			}
			de_jure_liege = d_wiltshire
			hidden_tooltip = {
				location = {
					add_province_modifier = {
						name = d_wiltshire_de_jure_liege
						duration = -1
					}
					remove_province_modifier = no_liege
				}
			}
			hidden_tooltip = { FROM = {	set_character_flag = creating_title_loop } }
		}
		hidden_tooltip = { clr_character_flag = creating_title_loop }

	}
	allow = {
		OR = {
			AND = {
			
				primary_title = { title = c_wiltshire }
				primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = no_liege } }
				OR = {
					AND = {
						num_of_count_titles = 3
						NOT = { num_of_count_titles = 6 }
					}
					primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = isolated } }
				}
			}
			d_wiltshire = {
				is_titular = no
			}
		}

	}
}

k_wiltshire = {
	color = { 241 95 45 }
	color2 = { 255 255 255 }

}

d_dorset = {
	color = { 241 25 70 }
	color2 = { 255 255 255 }
	capital = 27
	gain_effect = {
		primary_title = { copy_title_laws = c_dorset }
		
		IF = {
			limit = {
				d_dorset = { is_titular = yes }
			}
			character_event = { 
		id = nivve.0 tooltip = "Kingdom of Europa becomes the de jure liege of d_dorset" 
				}
			}
		any_demesne_title = {
			limit = {
				tier = COUNT
				location = { 
					AND = {
						has_province_modifier = no_liege
						OR = {
							is_primary_holder_title = yes
							any_neighbor_province = {
								owner = { character = ROOT }
							}
						}
					}
				}
				OR = {
					d_dorset = { is_titular = yes }
					FROM = { has_character_flag = creating_title_loop }
				}
			}
			de_jure_liege = d_dorset
			hidden_tooltip = {
				location = {
					add_province_modifier = {
						name = d_dorset_de_jure_liege
						duration = -1
					}
					remove_province_modifier = no_liege
				}
			}
			hidden_tooltip = { FROM = {	set_character_flag = creating_title_loop } }
		}
		hidden_tooltip = { clr_character_flag = creating_title_loop }

	}
	allow = {
		OR = {
			AND = {
			
				primary_title = { title = c_dorset }
				primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = no_liege } }
				OR = {
					AND = {
						num_of_count_titles = 3
						NOT = { num_of_count_titles = 6 }
					}
					primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = isolated } }
				}
			}
			d_dorset = {
				is_titular = no
			}
		}

	}
}

k_dorset = {
	color = { 241 25 70 }
	color2 = { 255 255 255 }
	capital = 27
	gain_effect = {
		primary_title = { copy_title_laws = d_dorset }
		
		any_demesne_title = {
			limit = {
				title = d_dorset
				OR = {
					k_dorset = { is_titular = yes }
					FROM = { has_character_flag = creating_title_loop }
				}
			}
			de_jure_liege = k_dorset
			hidden_tooltip = { FROM = {	set_character_flag = creating_title_loop } }
		}
		hidden_tooltip = { clr_character_flag = creating_title_loop }

	}
	allow = {
		OR = {
			AND = {
			
				primary_title = { title = d_dorset }
				num_of_duke_titles = 3
			}
			k_dorset = {
				is_titular = no
			}
		}

	}
}

e_dorset = {
	color = { 241 25 70 }
	color2 = { 255 255 255 }
	capital = 27
	short_name = yes
	gain_effect = {
		primary_title = { copy_title_laws = k_dorset }
		
		any_demesne_title = {
			limit = {
				title = k_dorset
				OR = {
					e_dorset = { is_titular = yes }
					FROM = { has_character_flag = creating_title_loop }
				}
			}
			de_jure_liege = e_dorset
			hidden_tooltip = { FROM = {	set_character_flag = creating_title_loop } }
		}
		hidden_tooltip = { clr_character_flag = creating_title_loop }

	}
	allow = {
		OR = {
			AND = {
			
				primary_title = { title = k_dorset }
				num_of_king_titles = 3
			}
			e_dorset = {
				is_titular = no
			}
		}

	}
