						has_province_modifier = no_liege
						OR = {
							is_primary_holder_title = yes
							any_neighbor_province = {
								owner = { character = ROOT }
							}
						}
					}
				}
				OR = {
					d_glamorgan = { is_titular = yes }
					FROM = { has_character_flag = creating_title_loop }
				}
			}
			de_jure_liege = d_glamorgan
			hidden_tooltip = {
				location = {
					add_province_modifier = {
						name = d_glamorgan_de_jure_liege
						duration = -1
					}
					remove_province_modifier = no_liege
				}
			}
			hidden_tooltip = { FROM = {	set_character_flag = creating_title_loop } }
		}
		hidden_tooltip = { clr_character_flag = creating_title_loop }

	}
	allow = {
		OR = {
			AND = {
			
				primary_title = { title = c_glamorgan }
				primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = no_liege } }
				OR = {
					AND = {
						num_of_count_titles = 3
						NOT = { num_of_count_titles = 6 }
					}
					primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = isolated } }
				}
			}
			d_glamorgan = {
				is_titular = no
			}
		}

	}
}

d_gwent = {
	color = { 160 75 5 }
	color2 = { 255 255 255 }
	capital = 20
	gain_effect = {
		primary_title = { copy_title_laws = c_gwent }
		
		IF = {
			limit = {
				d_gwent = { is_titular = yes }
			}
			character_event = { 
		id = nivve.0 tooltip = "Kingdom of Europa becomes the de jure liege of d_gwent" 
				}
			}
		any_demesne_title = {
			limit = {
				tier = COUNT
				location = { 
					AND = {
						has_province_modifier = no_liege
						OR = {
							is_primary_holder_title = yes
							any_neighbor_province = {
								owner = { character = ROOT }
							}
						}
					}
				}
				OR = {
					d_gwent = { is_titular = yes }
					FROM = { has_character_flag = creating_title_loop }
				}
			}
			de_jure_liege = d_gwent
			hidden_tooltip = {
				location = {
					add_province_modifier = {
						name = d_gwent_de_jure_liege
						duration = -1
					}
					remove_province_modifier = no_liege
				}
			}
			hidden_tooltip = { FROM = {	set_character_flag = creating_title_loop } }
		}
		hidden_tooltip = { clr_character_flag = creating_title_loop }

	}
	allow = {
		OR = {
			AND = {
			
				primary_title = { title = c_gwent }
				primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = no_liege } }
				OR = {
					AND = {
						num_of_count_titles = 3
						NOT = { num_of_count_titles = 6 }
					}
					primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = isolated } }
				}
			}
			d_gwent = {
				is_titular = no
			}
		}

	}
}

	}
	allow = {
		OR = {
			AND = {
			
				primary_title = { title = c_clydesdale }
				primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = no_liege } }
				OR = {
					AND = {
						num_of_count_titles = 3
						NOT = { num_of_count_titles = 6 }
					}
					primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = isolated } }
				}
			}
			d_clydesdale = {
				is_titular = no
			}
		}

	}
}

		any_demesne_title = {
			limit = {
				title = d_clydesdale
				OR = {
					k_clydesdale = { is_titular = yes }
					FROM = { has_character_flag = creating_title_loop }
				}

d_innse_gall = {
	color = { 20 60 243 }
	color2 = { 255 255 255 }
	capital = 35
	norwegian = "Sreyar"
	danish = "Sreyar"
	swedish = "Srarna"
	norse = "Sureyjar"
	gain_effect = {
		primary_title = { copy_title_laws = c_innse_gall }
		
		IF = {
			limit = {
				d_innse_gall = { is_titular = yes }
			}
			character_event = { 
		id = nivve.0 tooltip = "Kingdom of Europa becomes the de jure liege of d_innse_gall" 
				}
			}
		any_demesne_title = {
			limit = {
				tier = COUNT
				location = { 
					AND = {
						has_province_modifier = no_liege
						OR = {
							is_primary_holder_title = yes
							any_neighbor_province = {
								owner = { character = ROOT }
							}
						}
					}
				}
				OR = {
					d_innse_gall = { is_titular = yes }
					FROM = { has_character_flag = creating_title_loop }
				}
			}
			de_jure_liege = d_innse_gall
			hidden_tooltip = {
				location = {
					add_province_modifier = {
						name = d_innse_gall_de_jure_liege
						duration = -1
					}
					remove_province_modifier = no_liege
				}
			}
			hidden_tooltip = { FROM = {	set_character_flag = creating_title_loop } }
		}
		hidden_tooltip = { clr_character_flag = creating_title_loop }

	}
	allow = {
		OR = {
			AND = {
			
				primary_title = { title = c_innse_gall }
				primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = no_liege } }
				OR = {
					AND = {
						num_of_count_titles = 3
						NOT = { num_of_count_titles = 6 }
					}
					primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = isolated } }
				}
			}
			d_innse_gall = {
				is_titular = no
			}
		}

	}
}

			}
			hidden_tooltip = { FROM = {	set_character_flag = creating_title_loop } }

					add_province_modifier = {
						name = d_teviotdale_de_jure_liege
						duration = -1
					}
					remove_province_modifier = no_liege
				}
			}
			hidden_tooltip = { FROM = {	set_character_flag = creating_title_loop } }
		}
		hidden_tooltip = { clr_character_flag = creating_title_loop }

	}
	allow = {
		OR = {
			AND = {
			
				primary_title = { title = c_teviotdale }
				primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = no_liege } }
				OR = {
					AND = {
						num_of_count_titles = 3
						NOT = { num_of_count_titles = 6 }
					}
					primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = isolated } }
				}
			}
			d_teviotdale = {
				is_titular = no
			}
		}

	}
}

d_gowrie = {
	color = { 35 222 250 }
	color2 = { 255 255 255 }
	capital = 43
	gain_effect = {
		primary_title = { copy_title_laws = c_gowrie }
		
		IF = {
			limit = {
				d_gowrie = { is_titular = yes }
			}
			character_event = { 
		id = nivve.0 tooltip = "Kingdom of Europa becomes the de jure liege of d_gowrie" 
				}
			}
		any_demesne_title = {
			limit = {
				tier = COUNT
				location = { 
					AND = {
						has_province_modifier = no_liege
						OR = {
							is_primary_holder_title = yes
							any_neighbor_province = {
								owner = { character = ROOT }
							}
						}
					}
				}
				OR = {
					d_gowrie = { is_titular = yes }
					FROM = { has_character_flag = creating_title_loop }
				}
			}
			de_jure_liege = d_gowrie
			hidden_tooltip = {
				location = {
					add_province_modifier = {
						name = d_gowrie_de_jure_liege
						duration = -1
					}
					remove_province_modifier = no_liege
				}
			}
			hidden_tooltip = { FROM = {	set_character_flag = creating_title_loop } }
		}
		hidden_tooltip = { clr_character_flag = creating_title_loop }

	}
	allow = {
		OR = {
			AND = {
			
				primary_title = { title = c_gowrie }
				primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = no_liege } }
				OR = {
					AND = {
						num_of_count_titles = 3
						NOT = { num_of_count_titles = 6 }
					}
					primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = isolated } }
				}
			}
			d_gowrie = {
				is_titular = no
			}
		}

	}
}

	}

k_ross = {
	color = { 15 55 243 }
	color2 = { 255 255 255 }
	capital = 39
	gain_effect = {
		primary_title = { copy_title_laws = d_ross }
		
		any_demesne_title = {
			limit = {
				title = d_ross
				OR = {
					k_ross = { is_titular = yes }
					FROM = { has_character_flag = creating_title_loop }
				}
			}
			de_jure_liege = k_ross
			hidden_tooltip = { FROM = {	set_character_flag = creating_title_loop } }
		}
		hidden_tooltip = { clr_character_flag = creating_title_loop }

	}
	allow = {
		OR = {
			AND = {
			
				primary_title = { title = d_ross }
				num_of_duke_titles = 3
			}
			k_ross = {
				is_titular = no
			}
		}

	}
}

e_ross = {
	color = { 15 55 243 }
	color2 = { 255 255 255 }
	capital = 39
	short_name = yes
	gain_effect = {
		primary_title = { copy_title_laws = k_ross }
		
		any_demesne_title = {
			limit = {
				title = k_ross
				OR = {
					e_ross = { is_titular = yes }
					FROM = { has_character_flag = creating_title_loop }
				}
			}
			de_jure_liege = e_ross
			hidden_tooltip = { FROM = {	set_character_flag = creating_title_loop } }
		}
		hidden_tooltip = { clr_character_flag = creating_title_loop }

	}
	allow = {
		OR = {
			AND = {
			
				primary_title = { title = k_ross }
				num_of_king_titles = 3
			}
			e_ross = {
				is_titular = no
			}
		}

	}
}

d_buchan = {
	color = { 40 227 250 }
	color2 = { 255 255 255 }
	capital = 41
	gain_effect = {
		primary_title = { copy_title_laws = c_buchan }
		
		IF = {
			limit = {
				d_buchan = { is_titular = yes }
			}
			character_event = { 
		id = nivve.0 tooltip = "Kingdom of Europa becomes the de jure liege of d_buchan" 
				}
			}
		any_demesne_title = {
			limit = {
				tier = COUNT
				location = { 
					AND = {
						has_province_modifier = no_liege
						OR = {
							is_primary_holder_title = yes
							any_neighbor_province = {
								owner = { character = ROOT }
							}
						}
					}
				}
				OR = {
					d_buchan = { is_titular = yes }
					FROM = { has_character_flag = creating_title_loop }
				}
			}
			de_jure_liege = d_buchan
			hidden_tooltip = {
				location = {
					add_province_modifier = {
						name = d_buchan_de_jure_liege
						duration = -1
					}
					remove_province_modifier = no_liege
				}
			}
			hidden_tooltip = { FROM = {	set_character_flag = creating_title_loop } }
		}
		hidden_tooltip = { clr_character_flag = creating_title_loop }

	}
	allow = {
		OR = {
			AND = {
			
				primary_title = { title = c_buchan }
				primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = no_liege } }
				OR = {
					AND = {
						num_of_count_titles = 3
						NOT = { num_of_count_titles = 6 }
					}
					primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = isolated } }
				}
			}
			d_buchan = {
				is_titular = no
			}
		}

	}
}

	color = { 40 227 250 }
	color2 = { 255 255 255 }

d_caithness = {
	color = { 30 95 243 }
	color2 = { 255 255 255 }
	capital = 37
	norwegian = "Katanes"
	danish = "Katans"
	swedish = "Katans"
	norse = "Katans"
	gain_effect = {
		primary_title = { copy_title_laws = c_caithness }
		
		IF = {
			limit = {
				d_caithness = { is_titular = yes }
			}
			character_event = { 
		id = nivve.0 tooltip = "Kingdom of Europa becomes the de jure liege of d_caithness" 
				}
			}
		any_demesne_title = {
			limit = {
				tier = COUNT
				location = { 
					AND = {
						has_province_modifier = no_liege
						OR = {
							is_primary_holder_title = yes
							any_neighbor_province = {
								owner = { character = ROOT }
							}
						}
					}
				}
				OR = {
					d_caithness = { is_titular = yes }
					FROM = { has_character_flag = creating_title_loop }
				}
			}
			de_jure_liege = d_caithness
			hidden_tooltip = {
				location = {
					add_province_modifier = {
						name = d_caithness_de_jure_liege
						duration = -1
					}
					remove_province_modifier = no_liege
				}
			}
			hidden_tooltip = { FROM = {	set_character_flag = creating_title_loop } }
		}
		hidden_tooltip = { clr_character_flag = creating_title_loop }

	}
	allow = {
		OR = {
			AND = {
			
				primary_title = { title = c_caithness }
				primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = no_liege } }
				OR = {
					AND = {
						num_of_count_titles = 3
						NOT = { num_of_count_titles = 6 }
					}
					primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = isolated } }
				}
			}
			d_caithness = {
				is_titular = no
			}
		}

	}

k_tyrconnell = {
	color = { 25 190 31 }
	color2 = { 255 255 255 }
	capital = 3
	gain_effect = {
		primary_title = { copy_title_laws = d_tyrconnell }
		
		any_demesne_title = {
			limit = {
				title = d_tyrconnell
				OR = {
					k_tyrconnell = { is_titular = yes }
					FROM = { has_character_flag = creating_title_loop }
				}
			}
			de_jure_liege = k_tyrconnell
			hidden_tooltip = { FROM = {	set_character_flag = creating_title_loop } }
		}
		hidden_tooltip = { clr_character_flag = creating_title_loop }

	}
	allow = {
		OR = {
			AND = {
			
				primary_title = { title = d_tyrconnell }
				num_of_duke_titles = 3
			}
			k_tyrconnell = {
				is_titular = no
			}
		}

	}
}

e_tyrconnell = {
	color = { 25 190 31 }
	color2 = { 255 255 255 }
	capital = 3
	short_name = yes
	gain_effect = {
		primary_title = { copy_title_laws = k_tyrconnell }
		
		any_demesne_title = {
			limit = {
				title = k_tyrconnell
				OR = {
					e_tyrconnell = { is_titular = yes }
					FROM = { has_character_flag = creating_title_loop }
				}
			}
			de_jure_liege = e_tyrconnell
			hidden_tooltip = { FROM = {	set_character_flag = creating_title_loop } }
		}
		hidden_tooltip = { clr_character_flag = creating_title_loop }

	}
	allow = {
		OR = {
			AND = {
			
				primary_title = { title = k_tyrconnell }
				num_of_king_titles = 3
			}
			e_tyrconnell = {
				is_titular = no
			}
		}

	}
}

d_breifne = {
	color = { 40 230 65 }
	color2 = { 255 255 255 }
	capital = 8
	gain_effect = {
		primary_title = { copy_title_laws = c_breifne }
		
		IF = {
			limit = {
				d_breifne = { is_titular = yes }
			}
			character_event = { 
		id = nivve.0 tooltip = "Kingdom of Europa becomes the de jure liege of d_breifne" 
				}
			}
		any_demesne_title = {
			limit = {
				tier = COUNT
				location = { 
					AND = {
						has_province_modifier = no_liege
						OR = {
							is_primary_holder_title = yes
							any_neighbor_province = {
								owner = { character = ROOT }
							}
						}
					}
				}
				OR = {
					d_breifne = { is_titular = yes }
					FROM = { has_character_flag = creating_title_loop }
				}
			}
			de_jure_liege = d_breifne
			hidden_tooltip = {
				location = {
					add_province_modifier = {
						name = d_breifne_de_jure_liege
						duration = -1
					}
					remove_province_modifier = no_liege
				}
			}
			hidden_tooltip = { FROM = {	set_character_flag = creating_title_loop } }
		}
		hidden_tooltip = { clr_character_flag = creating_title_loop }

	}
	allow = {
		OR = {
			AND = {
			
				primary_title = { title = c_breifne }
				primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = no_liege } }
				OR = {
					AND = {
						num_of_count_titles = 3
						NOT = { num_of_count_titles = 6 }
					}
					primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = isolated } }
				}
			}
			d_breifne = {
				is_titular = no
			}
		}

	}
}

k_breifne = {
	color = { 40 230 65 }
	color2 = { 255 255 255 }
	capital = 8
	gain_effect = {
		primary_title = { copy_title_laws = d_breifne }

		}
		hidden_tooltip = { clr_character_flag = creating_title_loop }

	}
	allow = {
		OR = {
			AND = {
			
				primary_title = { title = d_breifne }
				num_of_duke_titles = 3
			}
			k_breifne = {
				is_titular = no
			}
		}

	}
}

d_connacht = {
	color = { 45 230 70 }
	color2 = { 255 255 255 }
	capital = 9
	gain_effect = {
		primary_title = { copy_title_laws = c_connacht }
		
		IF = {
			limit = {
				d_connacht = { is_titular = yes }
			}
			character_event = { 
		id = nivve.0 tooltip = "Kingdom of Europa becomes the de jure liege of d_connacht" 
				}
			}
		any_demesne_title = {
			limit = {
				tier = COUNT
				location = { 
					AND = {
						has_province_modifier = no_liege
						OR = {
							is_primary_holder_title = yes
							any_neighbor_province = {
								owner = { character = ROOT }
							}
						}
					}
				}
				OR = {
					d_connacht = { is_titular = yes }
					FROM = { has_character_flag = creating_title_loop }
				}
			}
			de_jure_liege = d_connacht
			hidden_tooltip = {
				location = {
					add_province_modifier = {
						name = d_connacht_de_jure_liege
						duration = -1
					}
					remove_province_modifier = no_liege
				}
			}
			hidden_tooltip = { FROM = {	set_character_flag = creating_title_loop } }
		}
		hidden_tooltip = { clr_character_flag = creating_title_loop }

	}
	allow = {
		OR = {
			AND = {
			
				primary_title = { title = c_connacht }
				primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = no_liege } }
				OR = {
					AND = {
						num_of_count_titles = 3
						NOT = { num_of_count_titles = 6 }
					}
					primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = isolated } }
				}
			}
			d_connacht = {
				is_titular = no
			}
		}

	}
}

d_kildare = {
	color = { 102 248 65 }
	color2 = { 255 255 255 }
	capital = 10
	gain_effect = {
		primary_title = { copy_title_laws = c_kildare }
		
		IF = {
			limit = {
				d_kildare = { is_titular = yes }
			}
			character_event = { 
		id = nivve.0 tooltip = "Kingdom of Europa becomes the de jure liege of d_kildare" 
				}
			}
		any_demesne_title = {
			limit = {
				tier = COUNT
				location = { 
					AND = {
						has_province_modifier = no_liege
						OR = {
							is_primary_holder_title = yes
							any_neighbor_province = {
								owner = { character = ROOT }
							}
						}
					}
				}

					FROM = { has_character_flag = creating_title_loop }
				}

			hidden_tooltip = {
				location = {
					add_province_modifier = {
						name = d_kildare_de_jure_liege
						duration = -1
					}
					remove_province_modifier = no_liege
				}
			}
			hidden_tooltip = { FROM = {	set_character_flag = creating_title_loop } }
		}
		hidden_tooltip = { clr_character_flag = creating_title_loop }

	}
	allow = {

				OR = {

						NOT = { num_of_count_titles = 6 }

d_dublin = {
	color = { 55 250 85 }
	color2 = { 255 255 255 }
	capital = 11
	norse = "Dyflinn"
	gain_effect = {
		primary_title = { copy_title_laws = c_dublin }
		
		IF = {
			limit = {
				d_dublin = { is_titular = yes }
			}
			character_event = { 
		id = nivve.0 tooltip = "Kingdom of Europa becomes the de jure liege of d_dublin" 
				}
			}
		any_demesne_title = {
			limit = {
				tier = COUNT
				location = { 
					AND = {
						has_province_modifier = no_liege

							is_primary_holder_title = yes

								owner = { character = ROOT }
							}
						}
					}
				}

					FROM = { has_character_flag = creating_title_loop }
				}
			}
			de_jure_liege = d_dublin
			hidden_tooltip = {
				location = {
					add_province_modifier = {
						name = d_dublin_de_jure_liege
						duration = -1
					}
					remove_province_modifier = no_liege
				}
			}
			hidden_tooltip = { FROM = {	set_character_flag = creating_title_loop } }
		}
		hidden_tooltip = { clr_character_flag = creating_title_loop }

	}

				primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = no_liege } }
				OR = {
					AND = {
						num_of_count_titles = 3
						NOT = { num_of_count_titles = 6 }
					}
					primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = isolated } }
				}
			}
			d_dublin = {
				is_titular = no
			}
		}

	}

d_leinster = {
	color = { 65 210 85 }
	color2 = { 255 255 255 }
	capital = 16
	norwegian = "Veisafjord"
	swedish = "Veisafjord"
	danish = "Veisafjord"
	norse = "Veisafjorr"
	gain_effect = {
		primary_title = { copy_title_laws = c_leinster }
		
		IF = {
			limit = {
				d_leinster = { is_titular = yes }
			}
			character_event = { 
		id = nivve.0 tooltip = "Kingdom of Europa becomes the de jure liege of d_leinster" 
				}
			}
		any_demesne_title = {
			limit = {
				tier = COUNT
				location = { 
					AND = {
						has_province_modifier = no_liege
						OR = {
							is_primary_holder_title = yes
							any_neighbor_province = {
								owner = { character = ROOT }
							}
						}
					}
				}
				OR = {
					d_leinster = { is_titular = yes }
					FROM = { has_character_flag = creating_title_loop }
				}
			}
			de_jure_liege = d_leinster
			hidden_tooltip = {
				location = {
					add_province_modifier = {
						name = d_leinster_de_jure_liege
						duration = -1
					}
					remove_province_modifier = no_liege
				}
			}
			hidden_tooltip = { FROM = {	set_character_flag = creating_title_loop } }
		}
		hidden_tooltip = { clr_character_flag = creating_title_loop }

	}
	allow = {
		OR = {
			AND = {
			
				primary_title = { title = c_leinster }
				primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = no_liege } }
				OR = {
					AND = {
						num_of_count_titles = 3
						NOT = { num_of_count_titles = 6 }
					}
					primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = isolated } }
				}
			}
			d_leinster = {
				is_titular = no
			}
		}

	}
}

		any_demesne_title = {
			limit = {
				title = d_ossory
				OR = {
					k_ossory = { is_titular = yes }
					FROM = { has_character_flag = creating_title_loop }
				}
			}
			de_jure_liege = k_ossory
			hidden_tooltip = { FROM = {	set_character_flag = creating_title_loop } }
		}
		hidden_tooltip = { clr_character_flag = creating_title_loop }

	}
	allow = {
		OR = {
			AND = {
			
				primary_title = { title = d_ossory }
				num_of_duke_titles = 3
			}
			k_ossory = {
				is_titular = no
			}
		}

	}
}

e_ossory = {
	color = { 60 210 80 }
	color2 = { 255 255 255 }
	capital = 12

	gain_effect = {

d_thomond = {
	color = { 90 221 111 }
	color2 = { 255 255 255 }
	capital = 13
	norwegian = "Hlymrek"
	danish = "Lymrek"
	swedish = "Lymrek"
	norse = "Hlymrek"
	gain_effect = {
		primary_title = { copy_title_laws = c_thomond }
		
		IF = {
			limit = {
				d_thomond = { is_titular = yes }
			}
			character_event = { 
		id = nivve.0 tooltip = "Kingdom of Europa becomes the de jure liege of d_thomond" 
				}
			}
		any_demesne_title = {
			limit = {
				tier = COUNT
				location = { 
					AND = {
						has_province_modifier = no_liege
						OR = {
							is_primary_holder_title = yes
							any_neighbor_province = {
								owner = { character = ROOT }
							}
						}
					}
				}
				OR = {
					d_thomond = { is_titular = yes }
					FROM = { has_character_flag = creating_title_loop }
				}
			}
			de_jure_liege = d_thomond
			hidden_tooltip = {
				location = {
					add_province_modifier = {
						name = d_thomond_de_jure_liege
						duration = -1
					}
					remove_province_modifier = no_liege
				}
			}
			hidden_tooltip = { FROM = {	set_character_flag = creating_title_loop } }
		}
		hidden_tooltip = { clr_character_flag = creating_title_loop }

	}
	allow = {
		OR = {
			AND = {
			
				primary_title = { title = c_thomond }
				primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = no_liege } }
				OR = {
					AND = {
						num_of_count_titles = 3
						NOT = { num_of_count_titles = 6 }
					}
					primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = isolated } }
				}
			}
			d_thomond = {
				is_titular = no
			}
		}

	}
}

			}

				}
			}

						has_province_modifier = no_liege

							is_primary_holder_title = yes

							}

					}

				}
			}
			hidden_tooltip = { FROM = {	set_character_flag = creating_title_loop } }

				OR = {

k_araouane = {
	color = { 130 180 61 }
	color2 = { 255 255 255 }
	capital = 917
	gain_effect = {
		primary_title = { copy_title_laws = d_araouane }
		
		any_demesne_title = {
			limit = {
				title = d_araouane
				OR = {
					k_araouane = { is_titular = yes }
					FROM = { has_character_flag = creating_title_loop }
				}
			}
			de_jure_liege = k_araouane
			hidden_tooltip = { FROM = {	set_character_flag = creating_title_loop } }
		}
		hidden_tooltip = { clr_character_flag = creating_title_loop }

	}
	allow = {
		OR = {
			AND = {
			
				primary_title = { title = d_araouane }
				num_of_duke_titles = 3
			}
			k_araouane = {
				is_titular = no
			}
		}

	}
}

e_araouane = {
	color = { 130 180 61 }
	color2 = { 255 255 255 }
	capital = 917
	short_name = yes
	gain_effect = {
		primary_title = { copy_title_laws = k_araouane }
		
		any_demesne_title = {
			limit = {
				title = k_araouane
				OR = {
					e_araouane = { is_titular = yes }
					FROM = { has_character_flag = creating_title_loop }
				}
			}
			de_jure_liege = e_araouane
			hidden_tooltip = { FROM = {	set_character_flag = creating_title_loop } }
		}
		hidden_tooltip = { clr_character_flag = creating_title_loop }

	}
	allow = {
		OR = {
			AND = {
			
				primary_title = { title = k_araouane }
				num_of_king_titles = 3
			}
			e_araouane = {
				is_titular = no
			}
		}

	}
}

d_taghaza = {
	color = { 130 180 61 }
	color2 = { 255 255 255 }
	capital = 916
	gain_effect = {
		primary_title = { copy_title_laws = c_taghaza }
		
		IF = {
			limit = {
				d_taghaza = { is_titular = yes }
			}
			character_event = { 
		id = nivve.0 tooltip = "Kingdom of Europa becomes the de jure liege of d_taghaza" 
				}
			}
		any_demesne_title = {
			limit = {
				tier = COUNT
				location = { 
					AND = {
						has_province_modifier = no_liege
						OR = {
							is_primary_holder_title = yes
							any_neighbor_province = {
								owner = { character = ROOT }
							}
						}
					}
				}
				OR = {
					d_taghaza = { is_titular = yes }
					FROM = { has_character_flag = creating_title_loop }
				}
			}
			de_jure_liege = d_taghaza
			hidden_tooltip = {
				location = {
					add_province_modifier = {
						name = d_taghaza_de_jure_liege
						duration = -1
					}
					remove_province_modifier = no_liege
				}
			}
			hidden_tooltip = { FROM = {	set_character_flag = creating_title_loop } }
		}
		hidden_tooltip = { clr_character_flag = creating_title_loop }

	}
	allow = {
		OR = {
			AND = {
			
				primary_title = { title = c_taghaza }
				primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = no_liege } }
				OR = {
					AND = {
						num_of_count_titles = 3
						NOT = { num_of_count_titles = 6 }
					}
					primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = isolated } }
				}
			}
			d_taghaza = {
				is_titular = no
			}
		}

	}
}

k_taghaza = {
	color = { 130 180 61 }
	color2 = { 255 255 255 }
	capital = 916
	gain_effect = {
		primary_title = { copy_title_laws = d_taghaza }
		
		any_demesne_title = {
			limit = {
				title = d_taghaza
				OR = {
					k_taghaza = { is_titular = yes }
					FROM = { has_character_flag = creating_title_loop }
				}
			}
			de_jure_liege = k_taghaza
			hidden_tooltip = { FROM = {	set_character_flag = creating_title_loop } }
		}
		hidden_tooltip = { clr_character_flag = creating_title_loop }

	}
	allow = {
		OR = {
			AND = {
			
				primary_title = { title = d_taghaza }
				num_of_duke_titles = 3
			}
			k_taghaza = {
				is_titular = no
			}
		}

	}
}

e_taghaza = {
	color = { 130 180 61 }
	color2 = { 255 255 255 }
	capital = 916
	short_name = yes
	gain_effect = {
		primary_title = { copy_title_laws = k_taghaza }
		
		any_demesne_title = {
			limit = {
				title = k_taghaza
				OR = {
					e_taghaza = { is_titular = yes }
					FROM = { has_character_flag = creating_title_loop }
				}
			}
			de_jure_liege = e_taghaza
			hidden_tooltip = { FROM = {	set_character_flag = creating_title_loop } }
		}
		hidden_tooltip = { clr_character_flag = creating_title_loop }

	}
	allow = {
		OR = {
			AND = {
			
				primary_title = { title = k_taghaza }
				num_of_king_titles = 3
			}
			e_taghaza = {
				is_titular = no

		}

	}

d_ghana = {
	color = { 130 180 61 }
	color2 = { 255 255 255 }
	capital = 913
	gain_effect = {
		primary_title = { copy_title_laws = c_ghana }
		
		IF = {
			limit = {
				d_ghana = { is_titular = yes }
			}
			character_event = { 
		id = nivve.0 tooltip = "Kingdom of Europa becomes the de jure liege of d_ghana" 
				}
			}
		any_demesne_title = {
			limit = {
				tier = COUNT
				location = { 
					AND = {
						has_province_modifier = no_liege
						OR = {
							is_primary_holder_title = yes
							any_neighbor_province = {
								owner = { character = ROOT }
							}
						}
					}
				}
				OR = {
					d_ghana = { is_titular = yes }
					FROM = { has_character_flag = creating_title_loop }
				}
			}
			de_jure_liege = d_ghana
			hidden_tooltip = {
				location = {
					add_province_modifier = {
						name = d_ghana_de_jure_liege
						duration = -1
					}
					remove_province_modifier = no_liege
				}
			}
			hidden_tooltip = { FROM = {	set_character_flag = creating_title_loop } }
		}
		hidden_tooltip = { clr_character_flag = creating_title_loop }

	}
	allow = {
		OR = {
			AND = {
			
				primary_title = { title = c_ghana }
				primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = no_liege } }
				OR = {
					AND = {
						num_of_count_titles = 3
						NOT = { num_of_count_titles = 6 }
					}
					primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = isolated } }
				}
			}
			d_ghana = {
				is_titular = no
			}
		}

	}
}

			hidden_tooltip = { FROM = {	set_character_flag = creating_title_loop } }
		}
		hidden_tooltip = { clr_character_flag = creating_title_loop }

	}
	allow = {
		OR = {
			AND = {
			
				primary_title = { title = d_mali }
				num_of_duke_titles = 3
			}
			k_mali = {
				is_titular = no
			}
		}

	}
}

d_bambuk = {
	color = { 130 180 61 }
	color2 = { 255 255 255 }
	capital = 926
	gain_effect = {
		primary_title = { copy_title_laws = c_bambuk }
		
		IF = {
			limit = {
				d_bambuk = { is_titular = yes }
			}
			character_event = { 
		id = nivve.0 tooltip = "Kingdom of Europa becomes the de jure liege of d_bambuk" 
				}
			}
		any_demesne_title = {
			limit = {
				tier = COUNT
				location = { 
					AND = {
						has_province_modifier = no_liege
						OR = {
							is_primary_holder_title = yes
							any_neighbor_province = {
								owner = { character = ROOT }
							}
						}
					}
				}
				OR = {
					d_bambuk = { is_titular = yes }
					FROM = { has_character_flag = creating_title_loop }
				}
			}
			de_jure_liege = d_bambuk
			hidden_tooltip = {
				location = {
					add_province_modifier = {
						name = d_bambuk_de_jure_liege
						duration = -1
					}
					remove_province_modifier = no_liege
				}
			}
			hidden_tooltip = { FROM = {	set_character_flag = creating_title_loop } }
		}
		hidden_tooltip = { clr_character_flag = creating_title_loop }

	}
	allow = {
		OR = {
			AND = {
			
				primary_title = { title = c_bambuk }
				primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = no_liege } }
				OR = {
					AND = {
						num_of_count_titles = 3
						NOT = { num_of_count_titles = 6 }
					}
					primary_title = { location = { has_province_modifier = isolated } }
				}
			}
			d_bambuk = {
				is_titular = no
			}
		}

	}
}

		any_demesne_title = {
			limit = {
				title = k_zarma
				OR = {
					e_zarma = { is_titular = yes }
					FROM = { has_character_flag = creating_title_loop }
				}
			}
			de_jure_liege = e_zarma
			hidden_tooltip = { FROM = {	set_character_flag = creating_title_loop } }
		}
		hidden_tooltip = { clr_character_flag = creating_title_loop }

	}
	allow = {
		OR = {
			AND = {
			
				primary_title = { title = k_zarma }
				num_of_king_titles = 3
			}
			e_zarma = {
				is_titular = no
			}
		}

	}
}
